title: Tagliatelle with Spinach and Macadamia Nuts
description: Fry the nuts together with the garlic in a pan over low heat until golden brown in hot oil, 2-3 minutes. Add the spinach, tomatoes and basil, mix well and add along with the drained pasta to the pan. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Vegan', 'Vegan Lunch', 'Vegan Dinner', 'Vegan Entree', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Nut']

title: Tagliatelle with Pancetta and Capers
description: Cook the pancetta and garlic in the oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Add the capers, lemon juice, lemon zest, the drained pasta, and a little of the pasta water to the pan. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Remove the leave from the oregano, and add to the pasta. Serve on plates.

title: Pasta Salad with Blue Cheese and Arugula
description: Rinse arugula and spin dry. Tear into smaller pieces if desired. Rinse chile pepper, halve and remove seeds, chop finely.

title: Gorgonzola Macaroni and Cheese
description: Boil the macaroni in salted water until very al dente. Heat the cream in a saucepan, crumble in the Gorgonzola and mix in the grated cheese. Rinse the thyme, shake dry and add the leaves to the cheese sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta. Mix with the sauce and pour into greased cups or ramekins. Place in the oven and bake for about 20 minutes until golden brown.

title: Pasta with Tuna and Lime Zest
description: In the meantime, rinse the tuna, pat dry, roll in the sesame seeds and season with pepper. Saute in hot oil on all sides briefly. Remove and set aside.

title: Green Tagliatelle with Spinach and Chiles
description: Cook tagliatelle in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain, reserving 5 tablespoons cooking water. Toss pasta with olive oil, cream, chiles and thyme. Stir in spinach and cooking water. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve immediately, sprinkled with Parmesan.

title: Pasta with Salmon and Cherry Tomatoes
description: Rinse and halve the cherry tomatoes. Peel the garlic and chop finely.

title: Pappardelle Noodles with Fresh Spinach, Pine Nuts and Bacon
description: Mix the hot pappardelle noodles immediately with 2-3 tablespoons olive oil, spinach, bacon, pine nuts and lemon zest. Add 2-3 tablespoons cooking water and mix. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: For the tomato sauce: Peel shallots and garlic and chop finely, then sauté in a saucepan until translucent in hot olive oil. Stir in tomato paste, add tomatoes and gently simmer for about 20 minutes. Season with salt, sugar and pepper.

title: Pasta with Shrimp and Vegetables
description: Rinse and trim the zucchini and cut into thin strips. Peel the carrot and cut lengthwise or cut into thin slices. Rinse and halve the bell pepper, remove the seeds and ribs and cut into very thin strips. Peel and finely chop the garlic cloves.

title: Lobster Ravioli with Creamy Tomato Sauce
description: For the lobster: Put the lobster head first into boiling water for 3 minutes, remove, and rinse with cold water. Crack the lobster and remove the lobster meat from the tail, claws, and joints. Stir together 125 grams (approximately 1/4 pound) of the lobster meat with the creme fraiche and then puree. Season the lobster puree with the orange zest, salt, and pepper. Cut the remaining lobster meat into small cubes and stir into the lobster puree. Stir in the basil.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: For the tomato sauce: peel shallots and garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute shallots and garlic until translucent. Add tomato paste, tomatoes and simmer for about 20 minutes. Season with salt, sugar and pepper.

title: Tortellini with Mushroom Sauce
description: For the filling, peel the hot potatoes and press through a ricer. Rinse the remaining ingredients. Peel or brush and cut very small. Sauté in butter.

title: Tagliatelle with Chive Oil and Mushrooms
description: For the chive oil, mix the remaining chives, 3 tablespoons of olive oil, the peeled garlic, chili, parmesan cheese, and a little pasta water.

title: Farfalle with Broccoli, Tomatoes and Cheese
description: For the tomato sauce, peel and finely chop the garlic and shallots. Sauté the shallots and garlic in the olive oil until translucent, then stir in the tomato paste. Add the tomato juice and rosemary, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and sugar. Simmer for 15 minutes, then add the tomatoes and simmer an additional 5 minutes. Remove the rosemary from the tomato mixture.

title: Soba Noodles with Shiitake, Soy and Sesame
description: Toast the sesame seeds quickly in the oil, and add the mushrooms. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Add the noodles and soybeans, and season with soy sauce, fish sauce, and cayenne pepper. Serve immediately.
types: ['Soy', 'lactose-free', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Japanese', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Quick', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'mushroom', 'Main Course']

title: Polenta Sandwich with Vegetables and Ricotta
description: The day before serving, bring the water to a boil in a large pot and season with salt. Gradually sprinkle the cornmeal into the boiling water, stirring constantly and cook over low heat for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat, cover and let stand 1 hour.

title: Mushroom Lasagna with Ricotta
description: Trim the mushrooms and slice thinly. Heat the butter in a pan and fry the mushrooms on all sides. Reduce the heat and add soy creamer. Stir in the porcini powder. Let the liquid boil for 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper and keep warm.

title: Rigatoni Gratin
description: Cook rigatoni in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Heat oil in a pan and cook ground meat until crumbly. Peel onion and dice finely, add to meat and saute briefly. Collect all resulting liquid form the pan. Chop canned tomatoes and combine with meat juices, add to meat. Drain pasta and combine with ricotta cheese. Add pasta to meat, add vegetable broth. Place mixture into a baking dish and sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake in preheated oven at 180°C (approximately 350°F) for about 20 minutes. Arrange salad on plates and top with gratin. Serve.

title: Spinach and Ham Lasagna with Crunchy Cereal Crust
description: Rinse and trim the spinach and blanch in a large saucepan over medium heat. Drain the spinach well and chop.

title: Spicy Spaghetti (Aglio, Olio E Peperoncino)
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Rinse and trim the chilis, then finely chop.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: Individually soak the lasagna in cold water for about 15 minutes. Rinse the eggplant, trim and dice. Peel the onion and chop finely. Cut an "X" in the base of each tomato, blanch in boiling water, rinse under cold water peel, quarter, core and roughly chop. Melt the butter in a large frying pan, sauté the onions until translucent, add the eggplant and simmer for about 5 minutes. Stir in the diced tomatoes and season with salt, pepper and thyme.

title: Pasta with Broccoli and Prosciutto
description: Rinse the broccoli and divide into florets. Coarsely chop any young leaves on the broccoli stock. Cook briefly in hot oil with the garlic and chile. Add the broth and simmer for 6-8 minutes until tender.

title: Pasta with Squid and Tomato
description: Cook the squid in hot oil in a frying pan for 4-5 minutes. Add the garlic, sauté and then pour in the wine. Add the tomatoes, season with salt and pepper and simmer for about 15 minutes over low heat. Add a little water if needed.

title: Lasagna with Spinach
description: Rinse the spinach and remove the thick stems. Boil the eggs in plenty of water for 8 minutes until hard-boiled and remove from the heat. Peel and finely chop. Blanch the tomatoes, rinse with cold water, peel, cut in half, remove seeds and finely chop. In a saucepan, heat 2 tablespoons butter, stir in the flour and gradually pour in the milk. Simmer for 10 minutes on low heat. Season with salt and pepper. Peel the onion and garlic, finely chop both and fry in olive oil. Add the spinach and cook briefly. Remove from heat. Grease a baking dish, distribute some sauce on it and line it with lasagna sheets. Layer some spinach, diced tomatoes, pine nuts, chopped eggs, grated cheese and more sauce. Repeat the procedure, with as the final layer being cheese and sauce on top. Top with remaining butter and bake in the oven about 40 minutes. Serve on warmed plates.
types: ['Lasagne', 'Casserole', 'Noodle Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'Vegetarian Casserole', 'baked dish', 'Vegetable', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Seed', 'Pasta', 'Spinach Lasagne', 'Pasta with spinach']

title: Pasta with Tomatoes and Chanterelles
description: Brush chanterelles thoroughly and, depending on the size, leave whole or cut in half.

title: Linguine with Mushrooms and Shrimp
description: Rinse and dry the shrimp.

title: Pasta with Spring Vegetables and Cream Sauce
description: Peel bottom third of asparagus, cut off tops, cut in half lengthwise and cut stalks into 3 cm (approximately 1-inch) long pieces.

title: Spaghetti with Eggplant and Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse eggplant, trim and cut lengthwise into slices. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, season with salt and pepper and drizzle with olive oil. Roast in oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes, turning once.

title: Spaghetti with Mussels
description: Add the mussels and wine into a pot. Cover and cook over low heat for 8 minutes, until the mussels have opened. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Remove the mussels from the cooking liquid, and keep warm. Discard any mussels that haven't opened.

title: Penne with Tomato Sauce and Arugula
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Sauté in the olive oil, then add the sugar and tomato paste. Add the red wine and tomatoes, and simmer. Mix in the oregano and the pasta, with a little of the pasta cooking water. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Tagliatelle with Shrimp and Lime
description: Cook the tagliatelle in boiling salted water according to the package directions until al dente. Rinse the shrimp, and then simmer in the sauce for 3-4 minutes. Divide the pasta onto plates, top with the sauce, and garnish with the lime zest.

title: Turkish Dumplings with Yogurt Sauce and Paprika Butter
description: For the filling, peel and finely chop onion. Combine onion with ground lamb, mint, parsley and paprika, season with salt and pepper and mix well.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, and drain. Sauté the diced tomatoes in the butter, then add the clams and fish stock. bring to a boil, add the parsley, and simmer for 3-4 minutes. Add the pasta, and toss to combine. Add the clam cooking liquid, and season to taste with salt pepper, then serve immediately.

title: Lamb Shank with Vegetables
description: Peel carrot and cut into small cubes. Rinse celery, trim and cut into thin slices. Peel the onions and garlic and chop finely.

title: Rigatoni with Spicy Mint Sauce
description: Finely chop the chile pepper and combine with 4 tablespoons of hot water, the vinegar and sugar. Stir the mint and olive oil into the chile mixture. Drain the pasta and toss with the mint sauce until coated. To serve, divide between plates and sprinkle with Parmesan.

title: Baked Ravioli
description: Stir together the ricotta, spices, parmesan, breadcrumbs and egg.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Peas
description: Cook Farfalle pasta according to package in salted water until firm.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: Rinse and trim the spinach and blanch in salt water for 1-2 minutes. Rinse in cold water, squeeze out the excess water and chop. Mix with the pine nuts.

title: Spring Pasta Salad
description: Peel shallots, coarsely chop. Blanch together with cauliflower and broccoli in boiling salted water for about 3 to 4 minutes.
types: ['Pasta Salad', 'Healthy Eating', 'Light Cooking', 'grilling side dishes', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta', 'Vegetable Salad']

title: Two-Cheese Ravioli with Spinach and Bell Pepper
description: For the filling, thoroughly mix paneer, Parmesan, egg yolk and basil. Season with salt and nutmeg.

title: Cheese Ravioli in Chicken Broth
description: For ravioli dough: Combine pastry flour, eggs and oil with 1 teaspoon salt and knead into a smooth, pliable dough. Add a little water or flour if necessary. Shape dough into a ball and let rest, covered, about 30 minutes.

title: Pasta with Tuna and Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse the tuna, pat dry and chop.

title: Pasta with Sausage, Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: Peel the garlic and chop finely. Sauté in 2 tablespoons hot olive oil until fragrant, stir in the tomato paste and deglaze with the red wine. Add the tomatoes and simmer, stirring, for about 10-15 minutes. Season with salt, pepper and sugar.

title: Orecchiette with Arugula and Tomato
description: Heat the olive oil in a pan, and sauté the onions. Pas the garlic through a press, then add to the onions. Mix in the tomatoes and the broth, and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the arugula and cook until wilted.

title: Tagliatelle with Bacon, Beans and Spinach
description: Rinse beans in a colander in cold water and drain. Fry the bacon and garlic in hot oil, add the spinach, mix well and deglaze with the white wine. Mix in beans, simmer for 2-3 minutes and toss with drained pasta. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Meat and Mushroom Sauce
description: Heat oil in a pan and saute onion and peeled and squeezed through a garlic press garlic for a few minutes. Add prepared vegetables and saute briefly. Add ground meat and cook until meat is crumbly, stirring. Season with salt and pepper, add chopped tomatoes and simmer for about 30 minutes. Add chopped herbs.

title: Pasta Gratin with Tomatoes and Ham
description: Rinse, trim and thinly slice the scallions.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs and Arugula
description: Rinse arugula, drain and arrange on plates.

title: Pasta with Dried Tomatoes and Pine Nuts
description: Drain the dried tomatoes and collect the oil. Chop the tomatoes coarsely. Rinse the arugula, trim, shake dry and chop coarsely.

title: Spicy Pasta with Tuna, Tomatoes and Onions
description: Peel and dice onion. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute onion, garlic and chile pepper. Add broth and bring to a boil. Add tomatoes and simmer for a few minutes.

title: Rotini with Shrimp and Zucchini
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Sauté the zucchini and garlic in the olive oil. Add the lemon and shrimp, and cook for 2-3 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper, and stir in the lemon zest.

title: Chicken, Corn and Arugula Cannelloni
description: For the filling, rinse arugula, drain, spin dry and chop finely. Drain corn and mix with arugula and chicken.

title: Pasta with Broccoli, Cheese and Pine Nuts
description: Peel and dice the onion. Toast the pine nuts in a dry pan until golden. Remove the nuts from the pan. Add the oil and sauté the onion until translucent. Deglaze with vegetable stock. Bring to a simmer and let reduce slightly.

title: Tagliatelle with Shrimp and Sole
description: Sauté the shrimp in the oil over low heat. Heat the broth in a saucepan, then add the fish, lemon juice, and minced garlic. Leave the fish in the broth until poached thoroughly.

title: Meatballs and Spaghetti
description: For the tomato sauce: Peel the shallots and garlic and chop finely. Heat the oil in a skillet and saute the shallots and garlic until translucent. Stir in the tomato paste and the tomatoes and simmer 20 minutes. Stir in the sugar and season the sauce with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Sausage and Spinach Sauce
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions in plenty of salted water until al dente. Reserve some of the pasta water for the sauce, then drain the pasta. Season the sauce with salt and pepper, then mix together with the rinsed spinach. Serve the sauce and sausage on top of the warm pasta. Serve immediately.

title: Cheese-Filled Ravioli with Hazelnut Sauce
description: Divide the dough into several pieces and on a lightly floured work surface roll out to about 1/8-inch thickness. Cut into 6-8 cm (approximately  21/2-3-inch) squares. Spoon about 1 teaspoon of the filling in the center of each square. Fold the sides over and press with the tines of a fork to seal. Repeat with all the dough and the filling. Cook the ravioli in a pot of boiling salted water until they bob to the surface and are done cooking, 3-5 minutes. Drain.

title: Pasta with Tomatoes, Olives and Capers
description: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion with garlic and olive. Deglaze pan with wine and simmer for approximately 5 minutes.

title: Pasta with Mediterranean Vegetables and Feta Cheese
description: Cook pasta according to package instructions in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Meatballs
description: Mix the ground meat with the garlic, egg and parsley. Mix in breadcrumbs until mixture becomes firm and easy to work with. Season with salt and pepper and shape into small meatballs.

title: Lamb Stew
description: In the meantime, rinse, halve, seed and dice bell peppers. Stir in peppers and wine after about 30 minutes' cooking time. Add tomato paste and cinnamon then braise until finished (uncovered, so sauce boils down smoothly.) Season again with salt and pepper. Stir in parsley just before serving.

title: Classic Lasagna with Bechamel Sauce
description: Peel, rinse and finely dice celery and carrots.

title: Kale Stuffed Ravioli with Tomato Sauce
description: For the filling: Rinse and trim kale and cook for about 5 minutes in boiling salted water. Remove and place into a bowl of cold water. Drain and chop finely. Peel the carrot and dice finely. Cut bacon into small cubes. Peel onion and garlic, also finely chop and fry in hot oil. Add carrots, bacon and kale and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add sage and season with salt and nutmeg. Allow to cool.

title: Pasta with Cauliflower and Raisins
description: Drain the cauliflower and fold into the curry mixture. Drain the pasta and mix with the rinsed currants and cauliflower. Arrange on plates, drizzle with oil, sprinkle with pine nuts and serve.

title: Braised Turkey Mediterranean Style
description: Rinse the turkey breasts and pat dry, cut into bite-size pieces and season with salt and pepper. Rinse, trim and cut the snow peas diagonally into pieces. Rinse, trim and chop the celery. Rinse the thyme, shake dry, pluck off the leaves and chop finely.

title: Macaroni and Potato Pot
description: In the meantime, rinse chives and cut into very small rings. Grate cheese coarsely and mix with cream.

title: Pasta and Vegetable Soup
description: Peel and dice the carrot and onion.

title: Pasta with Pumpkin and Flaked Almonds
description: Heat butter in a pan. Saute shallot for about 3 minutes. Add pumpkin cubes and saute for another 5 minutes. Add orange juice and vegetable broth and simmer for about 15 minutes on low heat.

title: Pasta Sheets with Mint Pesto
description: Divide the dough into 2 or 3 parts (wrap the unused pieces in plastic wrap), place one piece on lightly floured surface and roll out to a flat disc. Using a pasta machine, roll the dough out to the thinnest possible setting. It is alright to have uneven pieces. Continue with the remaining dough. Cut all sheets into uneven pieces about 5 x 5 cm to 5 x 8 cm (approximately 2 x 2 to 2 x 3 inches). Lay the sheets on a work surface and let dry slightly.

title: Pasta with Chicken, Green Asparagus and Tomatoes
description: Rinse asparagus and blanch in boiling salted water for about 5 minutes, then drain. Rinse cherry tomatoes and halve. Peel garlic and chop finely. Rinse chicken, pat dry and cut into bite-sized pieces.

title: Bacon Wrapped Perch Fillet with Chervil Ravioli
description: For the filling, mix the ricotta, Parmesan, breadcrumbs, egg and finely chopped chervil. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna with Walnuts
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F).

title: Lasagna
description: For the meat sauce, rinse and blanch the tomatoes. Peel and cut into small pieces. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic.

title: Spaghetti with Spicy Sauce
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Peel the garlic. Finely dice the garlic with the anchovies and the chili. Heat the oil in a pan, and sauté the garlic mixture. Add the tomatoes and wine, and simmer gently for 5 minutes.

title: Salmon Lasagne
description: Cook the lasagne sheets in salted boiling water, lift out with a slotted spoon and drain on a kitchen towel. Brush the pasta sheets with olive oil.

title: Meat Lasagna with Chorizo
description: Melt the butter in a pot. Stir in the flour and allow to foam. Gradually pour in the milk while stirring, season with salt and pepper and simmer over low heat for about 5 minutes.

title: Pasta with Tomato-meat Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Swabian Sauerkraut Rolls
description: Cut roll into 8 equally sized pieces. In a large skillet, heat oil and arrange rolls, seam side down,  next to each other in a pan. Cook for about 2 minutes. Turn over carefully and cook for 2 more minutes. Add broth and simmer, covered, for about 20 minutes on meduim heat. Arrange on plates and sprinkle with parsley. Serve hot.

title: Ravioli with Arugula and Parmesan
description: For the dough, mix the flour, egg, 1 teaspoon olive oil and 1 teaspoon salt. Knead and add a little water or flour if necessary. Roll the dough into a ball, wrap with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes.

title: Penne with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: For the meatballs: In a bowl, mix together the ground meat, onion, parsley, thyme, chile powder, egg, and bread crumbs and season with salt. Knead until well combined.  With moistened hands, shape into small balls. Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a pan and saute the meatballs until golden brown all over. Remove and drain on paper towels and place in the tomato sauce. Cook the pasta according to package directions, drain and  transfer to plates, Serve with the sauce and 3- 4 meatballs per person. Season to taste with Parmesan shavings and garnish with sprigs of thyme.

title: Asian Noodles with Squid and Mango
description: Peel garlic. Puree anchovy fillets with garlic, 2 tablespoons oil and lemon juice in a blender.
types: ['Pasta', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Pescetarian', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Australian', 'Exotic', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Meal for Four', 'Guest', 'Gourmet', 'Fish', 'Octopus', 'Fruit', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Herb Ravioli in Cream Sauce
description: For the filling: Rinse herbs, pluck leaves from stems and blanch in salted water. Remove, drain and mince. Peel and mince shallot and garlic. Heat butter in a pan and fry shallot and garlic. Add herbs, cream cheese and parmesan. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Eggplant Cannelloni
description: Rinse and dice eggplant. Lightly salt and soak in water for about 10 minutes. Remove and pat dry. Peel and mince garlic. Rinse tomatoes, remove stalks and chop coarsely except one. Cut remaining tomato into quarters, remove seeds and finely chop, set aside. Combine eggplant, garlic and tomatoes in a bowl. Pluck rosemary needles from stems, mince needles and combine with capers and half the parmesan. Add to vegetables. Stir in 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Celery, Tuna and Cucumber
description: Divide cucumber and celery slices among four plates and top with loosely rolled lasagna noodles. Drizzle with dressing and top with remaining vegetable slices. Scatter tuna decoratively over vegetables and drizzle with remaining sauce.

title: Tortellini with Spring Vegetables
description: Meanwhile, rinse and trim the zucchini and cut into slices. Set aside.

title: Spaghetti with Creamy Tuna Vegetable Sauce
description: To serve, divide the spaghetti between plates and top with the tuna vegetable sauce.

title: Spaghetti with Fresh Herbs
description: Add the dill, tarragon, and chives to the pan, and deglaze with the orange and lemon juice. Season to taste with salt and pepper, then simmer for 5 minutes.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetable Sauce
description: Add the capers to the vegetable ragout, and season to taste with the vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Sprinkle with the cheese  and garnish with the thyme.

title: Pasta with Squid
description: Rinse and pat dry squid tubes, cut crosswise into thin rings. Peel garlic. Pat dry anchovy fillets. Puree with garlic, 4 tablespoons of oil, lemon juice and oregano. Cook pasta according to package instructions in boiling salted water until al dente. Heat remaining oil in a pan and saute squid for 4 minutes, add anchovy cream and simmer on low heat for about 3 minutes.

title: Macaroni Casserole with Paprika
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F). Grease a baking dish with the oil.

title: Spaghetti with Pesto
description: Rinse and dry the basil. Remove the basil from the stems.

title: Filled Pasta and Herb Oil Sauce
description: Meanwhile, rinse the herbs, shake dry, finely chop the leaves and mix with the ricotta, Parmesan, creme fraiche and the egg yolk. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Spaghetti with Herbs
description: Rinse the herbs, shake dry and chop the leaves. Peel the garlic, chop and blend with the herbs, capers and oil in a food processor. Season with salt, pepper and a dash of lemon juice.

title: Carrot Noodles with Yogurt and Nuts
description: Blanche carrot noodles in boiling water and lemon juice. Drain and then rinse in cold water for 2 minutes. Sprinkle with the chopped hazelbuts. Serve chilled.

title: Pasta with Spicy Parsley Pesto
description: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Drain and serve with pesto on plates. Garnish with chile rings.

title: Fettuccine with Peas, Broad Beans and Parmesan
description: Rinse scallions, trim and cut into narrow rings. Remove garlic and finely chop.

title: Spaghetti with Cherry Tomatoes, Eggplant and Pine Nuts
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Heal the oil in a pan, and sweat the garlic for 1-2 minutes until translucent. Wipe the eggplant, then add to the pan with the tomatoes and pine nuts. Sauté for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

title: Asian Soup with Rice Noodles
description: Peel garlic and ginger and cut into thin slices. Rinse lemongrass, trim and cut into pieces. Rinse mint, shake dry and pluck leaves. Reserve some mint leaves for garnish.

title: Oxtail with Noodles
description: Take out oxtail pieces, set aside and leave the vegetables in the pot. Sauté 3-4 minutes while stirring, add the tomato paste and spices and let take some color. Deglaze with a little red wine and let boil down completely. Pour in the rest of the red wine and the stock and season well with salt and pepper.

title: Stir-Fried Pork with Noodles and Mushrooms
description: Meanwhile, cook noodles in a large pot of boiling water until al dente.
types: ['Pork', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Meal for Four', 'Guest', 'Spicy', 'weekend cooking', 'Meat', 'Sprout', 'Pasta', 'mushroom', 'marinade', 'Main Course']

title: Ricotta and Spinach Ravioli
description: For the filling, rinse and trim the spinach. Transfer to a pot of boiling salted water and blanch for 1 minute. Drain, cool in ice water, squeeze dry and coarsely chop. Peel the onion, chop finely and saute in butter. Stir together the ricotta, Parmesan cheese and cream. Stir in the spinach and onion. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Tuna and White Beans
description: Break apart tuna with 2 forks. Peel and chop the onion and garlic.

title: Tagliatelle with Shrimp and Vegetables
description: Combine the lemon juice with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, the chopped herbs, salt and pepper, and the reserved pasta water. Mix with the noodles and vegetables. Saute the shrimp in the remaining oil for 4 minutes. Gently stir the caviar into the noodle and vegetable mixture. Arrange on plates and serve garnished with lemon slices.

title: Spaghetti Nests with Cheese and Scallions
description: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions until al dente.

title: Spinach and Sausage Dumpling Soup
description: For the filling, soak bread in warm milk. Peel onion, finely chop and saute in butter until translucent. Rinse spinach, shake dry, blanch in boiling salted water, rinse, squeeze and finely chop. Mix with squeezed bread, onion, meat and egg in a bowl and mix. Season well with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Prawn and Vegetable Udon Noodle Stir-Fry
description: Heat the sesame oil in a wok (or large frying pan). Add the leeks and ginger, and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Remove them to a plate. Add the carrots to the pan, pour in the broth and cook for 5 minutes. Remove the carrots to a plate.
types: ['Shrimp', 'non-alcoholic', 'meat-free', 'Pescetarian', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Guest', 'weekend cooking', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Seafood', 'Shellfish', 'Pasta', 'Main Course']

title: Chicken Soup with Kohlrabi, Pasta and Lemon
description: Place the kohlrabi, carrots and pasta in boiling broth with the thyme and simmer for about 5 minutes. Then add the peas, chicken and lemon slices and simmer for another 8 minutes.

title: Lamb Stew with Orzo and Cheese
description: Melt the butter in a large, deep skillet and brown the meat in portions. Place all the meat in the pan and add the onions and garlic. Saute until the onions are translucent. Stir in tomatoes and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally for 5 minutes. Stir in tomato paste and 500 ml (approximately 17 ounces)
types: ['Lamb', 'skillet dish', 'skillet vegetables', 'skillet noodle dish', 'European', 'Greek', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Meal for Four', 'Meat', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Onion', 'Pasta', 'Lunch', 'Main Course']

title: Pasta with Roasted Parsnips
description: Peel parsnips, rinse and cut into thin sticks. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and finely chop leaves. Peel garlic and cut into sticks. Rinse tomatoes and cut into eighths.

title: Tagliatelle with Arugula Pesto
description: Cook the tagliatelle in boiling salted water until al dente. Puree the arugula, basil, garlic, pine nuts, and parmesan with 100 ml (approximately 3 ounces) of olive oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Sauté the mushrooms in the remaining oil, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.

title: Fusilli with Chicken, Green Asparagus and Peppers
description: Mix the lime juice with soy sauce and 2 tablespoons oil and let the chicken strips marinate in the mixture in the refrigerator for 1 hour.

title: Pasta Gratin with Zucchini and Tomatoes
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salt water until al dente, rinse and drain. Rinse the zucchini and tomatoes and slice into 1/2 cm pieces.

title: Tuna Steak with Sesame, Asian Noodles and Vegetables
description: Blanch the noodles with boiling water until just tender.
types: ['saltwater\xa0Fish', 'meat-free', 'Pescetarian', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Steak', 'Asian', 'grilling', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Guest', 'Quick', 'weekend cooking', 'Fish', 'Legume', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Pasta', 'Asparagus Pasta', 'Main Course']

title: Meat Ravioli with Mixed Vegetables
description: For the filling, combine the meat with the chopped onion and fry in butter until crumbly. Mix in the Parmesan and season with salt, pepper, and rosemary. Let cool. Divide the dough into 2 equal parts and roll each half thinly on a floured surface. Place teaspoons of the filling evenly spaced, about 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) apart on 1 sheet of the dough. Brush the dough with egg yolk and place the second sheet of dough on top. Press down between the filling to seal the ravioli and cut out small squares with a pastry wheel. Dust the ravioli with flour and set aside.

title: Spaghetti with Tomatoes, Olives and Capers
description: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water, then remove. Peel and quarter the tomatoes, then remove the core and finely dice. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Sauté the garlic and chili pepper in the oil. Add in the anchovies and tomato paste, sauté briefly, and add the tomatoes. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Add the capers and olives, then season to taste with salt and pepper. Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain the pasta, then add to the sauce, and toss to combine. Divide into plates, garnish with basil, and serve.

title: Pasta with Seafood
description: Meanwhile, cook penne in plenty of salted water until al dente. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Rinse the chives, shake dry, and chop finely. Stir into the sauce. Add in the mussels, cover and simmer a few minutes. Drain the pasta and mix immediately with the sauce. Serve hot.

title: Ravioli with Pumpkin
description: For the filling: Dice pumpkin flesh into small cubes and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Drain well. Drain mostarda well and finely dice the fruit. Mix pumpkin and diced mostarda fruit with cheese, egg yolk and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Aglio E Olio Spaghetti
description: Peel garlic and cut into thin slices. Crumble dried peperoncini.

title: Dessert Pasta with Berry-cream Sauce
description: Sort through berries, rinse if necessary and let drain. Whisk yogurt with vanilla sugar and lemon juice until smooth. Whip cream to soft peaks and fold into yogurt.

title: Rice Noodle Soup with Pancetta and Bok Choy
description: Meanwhile, separate the leaves from the bok choy. Rinse the bok choy leaves, shake dry and slice into strips. Rinse the bok choy stems and leave whole or cut into large pieces. Rinse the radishes and slice. Peel the eggs. Rinse the lemongrass, pat dry and finely chop. Rinse the scallions and slice into long narrow strips.

title: Macaroni with Walnuts and Spices
description: Halve walnuts and toast in a dry frying pan until browned. Remove from pan. Add butter and cook until melted. Stir in macaroni, cinnamon, cloves and cardamom. Sweeten with sugar and stir in walnuts. Divide macaroni among four small bowls. Rinse lemon with hot water and finely grate zest. Serve pasta garnished with zest.

title: Coconut Chicken Soup with Rice Noodles and Vegetables
description: Rinse bell peppers, halve, remove seeds and ribs. Rinse, dry and cut scallions into 3-4 cm (approximately 1-1,5 inches) long pieces. Rinse soybean sprouts and bamboo shoots.

title: Farfalle With Salmon And Broccoli Sauce
description: Rinse the broccoli and blanch in boiling salted water for 4-5 minutes, until al dente. Blanch in ice water and drain. Rinse and dice the salmon.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara with Cabbage and Poached Eggs
description: For the sauce: Mix the egg yolks with the cream in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper to taste and whisk the mixture together. Cut the bacon into small cubes. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Rinse the cabbage, remove the core and cut into thin strips.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara with Capers
description: Mix egg yolks with the cream in a bowl and add capers. Season with salt and pepper and whisk until well mixed. Cut the pancetta into strips. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat the oil in a pan auté the pancetta until lightly browned. Add the garlic, sauté briefly and toss with the drained spaghetti and Parmesan. Turn off the heat and mix in the egg-cream mixture.

title: Noodles with Vegetables and Kassler (Smoked Pork)
description: In a pan, sauté the onions in butter, add the smoked pork cubes and the leeks, season with salt and pepper and simmer, covered, for about 10 minutes.
types: ['Pasta', 'Grandma's', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'European', 'German', 'Quick', 'Meal for Four', 'Home Cooking', 'leftover', 'Pork', 'Onion', 'Cheese', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Lunch', 'Main Course']

title: Ricotta and Spinach Ravioli
description: For the filling, bring plenty of salted water to a boil. Rinse and trim the spinach, blanch, drain, squeeze out excess water and chop finely. Pass the ricotta through a sieve and mix with half the Parmesan, 1 egg, flour, and spinach. Season with nutmeg. The mixture should be very firm.
types: ['Pasta', 'Dough', 'Dumpling', 'European', 'Italian', 'Spring', 'Spring Dish', 'Spring Vegetable', 'Vegetable', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Cheese', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Steelhead Trout Lasagna
description: Pluck basil leaves from stems. Peel garlic and grind in a mortar with a little salt until finely ground. Add 2 handfuls of basil and grind. Stir in 4 tablespoons of oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Baked Spinach Cannelloni
description: For the filling: Rinse spinach and blanch in boiling salted water. Drain, rinse with cold water, squeeze out liquid and coarsely chop. Peel and mince shallot and garlic. Heat oil in a pan and cook shallot and garlic. Remove from heat and let cool.

title: Pecorino and Asparagus Ravioli with Shiitake Mushrooms and Lemon Butter
description: For the filling, peel the bottom third of the asparagus, cut off the woody ends and cut the asparagus into 1 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) pieces. In a frying pan with 1 tablespoon melted butter, sauté the asparagus briefly. Pour in the broth and simmer for about 5 minutes over medium heat until the liquid has completely evaporated. Remove the pan from the heat and let cool. Mix the ricotta with pecorino, egg and asparagus and season with salt, pepper and a pinch of nutmeg.

title: Roast Beef Cannelloni with Black Truffles
description: Fo the dough: Boil potatoes in salted water, covered, until tender, about 25 minutes. Drain potatoes drain and return to heat to evaporate excess liquid. Peel potatoes while still hot and press through a ricer.

title: Bucatini with Roasted Vegetables and Pecorino
description: Rinse and peel the vegetables. Peel the bell peppers with a peeler and cut the fennel into small cubes. Peel the onions and garlic and chop finely. Cut the zucchini into bite-sized pieces, halve the tomatoes and mix with the remaining vegetables, onions and garlic. Spread on a baking sheet, season with salt and pepper and drizzle with olive oil. Roast in preheated oven about 30 minutes, turning occasionally.

title: Tuna Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes and Fennel Seeds
description: Add tuna, tomatoes and fennel seeds. Pour in the wine and toss well. Drain the pasta, mix with the parsley and tuna mixture and season with salt and pepper. Arrange on warmed plates and serve.

title: Mushroom Lasagna Rolls
description: Cook lasagna noodles in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente, drain, rinse with cold water, drain and pat dry. Cut noodles lengthwise into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2 inch) wide strips. Cover each noodle with mushroom mixture and roll up. Heat broth in a pot. Place rolled pasta on a deep baking sheet with remaining mushrooms and pour hot broth over everything. Serve immediately.

title: Wasabi Tagliatelle with Baby Corn and Carrots
description: Trim mushrooms and wipe with a paper towel. Peel carrot and cut diagonally into thin slices. Rinse snow peas, trim, blanch for 2 minutes in a pot of boiling salted water, drain, rinse with cold water and drain again. Rinse bell pepper, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut into narrow strips. Rinse soy sprouts in a sieve with hot water and drain well.
types: ['Pasta', 'non-alcoholic', 'egg-free', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegan', 'Vegan Entree for Christmas', 'Vegan Entree', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Spicy', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Legume', 'Sprout', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Spices', 'Main Course']

title: Bean and Noodle Soup
description: Rinse, peel and finely chop carrots, celery root and scallions. Rinse celery and cut into thin slices.

title: Pasta with Radicchio
description: Rinse and halve radicchio, remove hard stalks and cut into fine strips. Peel garlic and shallot and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute garlic, shallot and radicchio briefly.

title: Tagliatelle with Peas, Tomatoes and Pancetta
description: Rinse the lettuce leaves, pat dry and place in bowls. Then spread the drained tagliatelle and vegetables over the lettuce leaves.

title: Pasta Shells with Spinach and Tomato Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, drain, rinse with cold water and drain well.

title: Colorful Noodles with Zucchini and Tomato Sauce
description: For the white dough, knead all ingredients into a smooth, firm dough. If necessary, add a little water or flour to the dough to reach desired consistency.

title: Mediterranean Roast Pork Roll
description: Rinse the meat, pat dry, spread out on work surface and season with salt and pepper. Drain the sun-dried tomatoes and olives and chop. Mix with 2 tablespoons tomato oil, 2 tablespoons olive oil, pine nuts and Parmesan and distribute over the meat. Roll tightly and tie with kitchen twine.

title: Broccoli and Cheese Pasta
description: Rinse and blanch the broccoli for 5 minutes in boiling salt water. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain.

title: Fried Mie Noodles with Tofu and Vegetables
description: Rinse the broccoli and baby corn and drain. Blanch together in boiling salted water for about 2 minutes. Rinse in cold water and drain. Rinse the chilies and cut into rings. Thaw the water chestnuts.
types: ['Pasta', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet dish', 'skillet vegetables', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Meal for Four', 'Vegetable', 'flowering vegetables', 'Cabbage', 'Onion', 'Tofu', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Stuffed Conchiglioni with Green Asparagus
description: Sauté the vegetables together briefly in 2 tablespoons of hot oil, add thyme and deglaze with white wine. Remove from the heat and leave until done. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Saffron Ravioli with Sardinian Caviar
description: To make the filling: Drain the tomatoes. In a sauté pan, sauté the tomatoes and scallions briefly.

title: Pork Chops with Whole Wheat Pasta, Apple Sauce and Broccoli
description: Rinse pork chops, pat dry and season with salt and pepper. Crush mustard seeds in a mortar and rub into the meat.

title: Rolled Lasagna Noodles with Shrimp
description: For the lasagna, cook the lasagna sheets in salted water according to package directions. Then individually lift out of the water, rinse with cold water, drain and lay next to each other on plastic wrap.

title: Pasta with Beef and Bell Peppers
description: Meanwhile, rinse beef, pat dry, trim off fat and tendons and cut into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2 inch) narrow strips. Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut into bite-size pieces. Peel garlic and onion and cut garlic into small cubes and onion into rings.

title: Turkey Piccata Milanese
description: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions in plenty of salted water until al dente. Finely grate Parmesan. Rinse and pat dry turkey cutlets and season with pepper. Lightly coat with flour. Whisk eggs with cream and parmesan and dip each cutlet into a mixture. Heat remaining oil in a pan and cook cutlets until golden brown on both sides.

title: Beef Goulash with Pappardelle
description: In a saucepan, heat the oil and fry the beef cubes over high heat. Remove, set aside and and add the onion to the pan with the garlic. Sauté over medium heat until translucent. Add beef, bell peppers and tomatoes, deglaze with the wine and pour in the stock.

title: Ravioli with Herbs and Parmesan
description: For the filling, rinse the herbs, pat dry, pluck off the leaves and chop. Mix with the ricotta and egg, season with salt, pepper, lemon zest and lemon juice.

title: Tortelloni with Cabbage and Thyme
description: Add cabbage strips and cook 1-2 minutes while stirring. Add 100 ml (approximately 1/3 cup) of water and a pinch of salt, bring to a boil and simmer gently, covered, for 4-5 minutes. Add tomatoes, garlic and thyme and gently cook, covered, another 8-10 minutes. Add a little water if needed. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg and chili powder.

title: Chicken in Honey-Chili Sauce with Vegetables on Wide Noodles
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Rinse the zucchini, pat dry and halve lengthwise. Clean the mushrooms and cut into slices. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan, lift the chicken from the marinade and saute briefly. Add the tomatoes and the tomato puree and simmer 5-8 minutes. Meanwhile cook the noodles cook in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Heat the remaining oil in a pan and sauté the zucchini 3 minutes, then add the mushrooms and sauté briefly. Add the pasta, to the chicken along with the orange zest, and season with salt and pepper. Transfer to plates and serve garnished with parsley.

title: Whole Wheat Pasta with Sweet Onion and Ricotta
description: Rinse spinach, trim, drain and spin dry. Chop chile peppers.

title: Salmon Rice Paper Parcels
description: Cook the rice noodles according to package instructions, and drain.

title: Linguine with Shrimp and Bacon
description: Drain the linguine, reserving some of the pasta cooking water. Mix the pasta into the bacon mixture, then add 2-3 tablespoons of the cooking water. Transfer the pasta onto plates. Top with the shrimp, garnish with the parsley, and serve.

title: Pasta with Goat Sausages, Pumpkin and Tomatoes
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Rigatoni with Chorizo and Tomatoes
description: Add the tomatoes, and sauté for 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat and season with salt (the chorizo is already relatively salty). Cook the rigatoni in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain the pasta, reserving some of the pasta water. Mix the rigatoni with 1 tablespoon of butter and 3 tablespoons of the pasta water. Toss to combine, then transfer to plates. Top with the sauce and basil leaves. Garnish with the pecorino cheese, and serve immediately.

title: Pasta Caprese with Arugula
description: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente and drain. Collect the cooking water and set aside.

title: Pappardelle with Pumpkin and Beets
description: Peel shallot and cut into wedges. Cut the pumpkin into pieces. Peel beet and cut into thin strips. Heat an oven-proof pan, add butter and sugar and add the prepared vegetables. Sauté briefly, season with salt and pepper and pour in the lemon juice and broth. Add thyme and braise in the oven until the liquid has almost completely evaporated, about 30 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Tortellini
description: For the pasta: Combine flour and salt on the work surface. Create a well in the center and add eggs, oil, and about 3 tablespoons cold water. Knead everything into a smooth dough, shape into a ball and wrap with a damp tea towel. Let rest for 30 minutes.

title: Green Tagliatelle with Smoked Salmon
description: Rinse the basil, shake dry and pluck off the leaves. Peel garlic and cut into cubes. Toast the pine nuts in a dry frying pan until golden and remove. Add the basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and olive oil to a bowl and puree with an immersion blender. Season with salt and pepper. Cut the smoked salmon into strips. Drain tagliatelle, mix with the pesto and smoked salmon, twirl into nests with a fork and arrange on a preheated serving dish. Garnish with basil leaves and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Cherry Tomatoes
description: Rinse the tomatoes, set some aside for garnish and pick the rest off stems. Cut tomatoes in half. Distribute tomatoes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and season with salt and pepper. Bake in preheated oven at 200°C (fan oven 180°C; gas mark 3) (approximately 400°F/convection 350°F) on the middle rack for about 10 minutes.

title: Pasta with Chile Pepper Tomato Sauce
description: Preheat a large pasta bowl. Finely grate Parmesan. Rinse parsley, shake dry, pluck leaves and chop finely. Cut pancetta into strips. Cook spaghetti until al dente and drain. Place tomato sauce and bacon strips into the (emptied) pasta dish, cover with spaghetti and mix well. Sprinkle pasta with Parmesan and parsley and serve immediately.

title: Pasta with Tomato and Sausage Sauce
description: Add tomatoes and season with salt, pepper and oregano. Simmer for 15-20 minutes over medium heat. Drain pasta, add to the pan and mix with the sauce. Serve in bowls.

title: Pasta Muffins with Carrots
description: Cook the pasta in salted boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain and rinse well. Rinse, peel and grate the carrots. Combine the eggs, cream and parmesan cheese and mix well. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg and mix with the pasta and carrots. Distribute into buttered muffin tins and bake until golden brown, 20-25 minutes.

title: Pasta with Tomato, Almonds and Parmesan (pasta Alla Trapanese)
description: Blanch tomatoes in hot water, rinse in cold water and peel. Quarter and remove seeds, cut into small cubes. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute almonds and chopped anchovies briefly. Add tomatoes and saute briefly. Deglaze pan with vinegar. Season with pepper and sugar, add pasta and toss well. Add basil and Parmesan and mix. Arrange pasta in preheated deep plates and garnish with basil leaves. Serve.

title: Whole-wheat Pasta with Beef and Bell Pepper Tomato Sauce
description: Fry the beef in hot oil. Add the onions and garlic and cook them, too. Add the bell pepper pieces and sauté. Deglaze with the wine, pour in the tomato puree, stir in the ajvar, season with salt and pepper and toss in the tomato pieces. Drain the pasta and serve with the beef and sauce in deep plates.

title: Whole Wheat Spaghetti with Mushroom Sauce
description: Rinse the mushrooms, wipe with a paper towel and cut into thin slices. Rinse the scallions and cut diagonally into rings. Peel the garlic, finely chop and sauté with the scallions in a hot pan with oil. The Add the mushrooms and sauté while occasionally stirring. Season with salt and pepper, toss with the well-drained spaghetti and chopped parsley, season to taste, garnish with parsley and serve in warmed plates.

title: Green Ribbon Pasta with Arugula, Goat Cheese and Grilled Peppers
description: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water. Peel shallots and cube. Peel garlic and finely chop. Melt butter in a small saucepan and briefly sauté shallots and garlic. Rinse peppers, halve, remove seeds and ribs. Place skin side up on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes, or until the skins starts to bubble and turn black. Cover with a slightly cool cloth and remove the skin. Cut into strips.Rinse basil and arugula and dry, removing any stems.  Mix all ingredients together and season with vegetable broth and pepper.

title: Pasta with Almond Pesto
description: Add the parmesan cheese and the olive oil to the almond mixture. Add 2-3 tablespoons of the pasta cooking water, then puree until a thick and creamy pesto forms. Season to taste with pepper. If the pesto is too thick, add a little pasta water. Drain the pasta, and mix with the pesto. Transfer to plates, garnish with the reserved almonds and the basil, and serve.

title: Frutti Di Mare Lasagna
description: Rinse mussels and put in a pan with 250 ml (approximately 1 cup) boiling water. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes. Cook until the mussels have opened. Remove from the pot, let cool slightly and remove them from their shells.

title: Penne with Tomatoes and Lentil Sprouts
description: Cook penne in salted water until al dente.

title: Saffron Pappardelle with Sole
description: Add sole and deglaze with white wine. Mix in the tomatoes and simmer for about 8 minutes. Then mix in herbs and season with salt and pepper. Add drained pappardelle to the pan with a little cooking water and stir to combine. Arrange on warmed plates and serve.

title: Pasta and Tuna Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse and dry celery, cut into thin slices.

title: Italian Pasta Salad
description: Rinse the lettuce, spin dry and cut into strips. Rinse and slice the zucchini. Pat dry and chop the anchovy fillets.

title: Spicy Spaghetti with Arugula and Garlic
description: For the spaghetti, bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Peel and chop the garlic, and crumble the chili into pieces. Heat the olive oil in a pan, then add the garlic and chili.

title: Spaghetti with Smoked Salmon
description: Rinse, trim, and cut the leeks into wide pieces. Rinse half a lemon in hot water and pat dry. Finely grate 1/2 teaspoon of the zest, and squeeze the juice from the lemon. Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water. Remove from the water and peel. Cut into quarters, remove the seeds, and finely dice. Rinse and dry the basil, then coarsely chop the leaves.

title: Colorful Pasta Salad with Arugula and Bacon
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again. Mix pasta with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Place bacon slices on a baking sheet and bake until crispy, about 10 minutes. Let cool slightly.

title: Pasta Gratin with Tomatoes and Goat Cheese
description: Butter baking dish (or 4 serving ramekins) and arrange pasta mixture into it. Sprinkle with grated goat cheese. Slice goat cheese and arrange on top. Bake in preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F) for about 20 minutes. Remove from oven and serve.

title: Asian Style Meatloaf with Pineapple and Sesame
description: Cut pineapple into quarters, remove the core and chop.

title: Ravioli with Zucchini and Tomatoes
description: For the filling, rinse the spinach, trim, and blanch in salted water. Rinse in cold water, drain well, squeezing out excess water, and finely chop.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse and halve the cherry tomatoes. Season the tomato sauce with salt, pepper, and sugar. Add the cherry tomatoes to the sauce and return to a boil. Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain thoroughly then mix into the sauce and toss to combine. Transfer the pasta to plates, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, and serve.

title: Ravioli with Herb Stuffing
description: For the filling, peel the potatoes, cut into quarters and cook in boiling salted water for 20 minutes. Cut the bread slices into very small cubes. Sauté the bread in 1 tablespoon butter until golden brown, let cool. Set aside a few for garnish. Peel shallot and very finely chop. Rinse herbs, spin dry and very finely chop. Drain the potatoes, mash, let cool slightly, and stir in the remaining butter, herbs, croutons, and crème fraîche. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta Salad with Romaine Lettuce, Tomatoes and Zucchini
description: Make dressing: Mix lemon juice with mustard. Add chopped anchovies and season with salt and pepper. Whisk in olive oil. Mix together pasta with vegetables. Sprinkle with crumbled feta and season with salt and pepper. Toss salad with dressing and serve garnished with basil.

title: Eggplant Lasagna
description: For the vegetables, rinse the eggplant, clean, cut crosswise into slices, season with salt and let stand for about 30 minutes.

title: Tagliatelle with Green Asparagus and Salmon
description: Rinse limes. Finely grate a little of the zest from one lime and squeeze the juice. Cut the other lime into very thin slices. Slice salmon very thinly and arrange with lime slices on a plate. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Rinse and finely chop dill, then sprinkle on fish. Sprinkle with half of the lime juice. Heat butter in a pan and add cooked asparagus and cream. Heat until warmed through and season with remaining lime juice, salt and pepper. Drain pasta and mix with asparagus and cream sauce. Transfer pasta to a large preheated dish and top with salmon slices.

title: Pappardelle with Spiced Onion Sauce
description: Cook the pappardelle in boiling salted water until al dente. Sauté the onions in the remaining oil. Mix in the peppers, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Deglaze with the red wine and the vegetable broth. Add the bay leaf, rosemary, and the thyme and simmer gently for 5-6 minutes. Remove the herbs and season the sauce with salt and pepper. Tear the mozzarella into pieces, then mix into the sauce. Drain the pasta, and place onto plates. Top with the onion sauce and 1-2 tablespoons of the herb salsa, and serve immediately.

title: Fried Prawns with Vegetables with Noodles
description: Mix the shrimp with sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, cilantro, and season with salt and pepper. Let marinate.

title: Lasagna with Two Fillings
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Wholewheatl Rigatoni with Chunky Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse the pepper and cut in half. Remove the seeds and membranes, and finely dice. Blanch the beefsteak tomatoes in boiling water. Remove from the water and peel. Cut in half, remove the core and finely dice. Add to the sauce with the peppers, and simmer for 3-5 minutes, then mix in 1 tablespoon of parsley. Drain the pasta and arrange on plates. Top with the sauce, garnish with the remaining parsley and the parmesan cheese, and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Shrimp and Capers
description: Drain the spaghetti and mix with the Parmesan shrimp mixture. Arrange in preheated bowls and serve sprinkled with the remaining capers.

title: Lasagna
description: Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop. Trim the mushrooms and finely chop.

title: Pasta Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse beans and soak in salted water for about 4 minutes. Blanch. Drain and cut in half. Rinse the celery, cut into slices and soak in the salt water for about 2 minutes. Blanch.

title: Green Ravioli with Peppers and Cheese
description: Mix ricotta with Pecorino, basil, lemon zest, and oil. Season with salt, pepper and press through a sieve.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce and Cheese Turkey Cutlets
description: For the cheese sauce: heat butter in a pan and add flour, saute briefly. Deglaze pan with wine and broth, season with  salt, pepper and nutmeg. Cut cheese into pieces and add to the sauce. Simmer, stirring, until cheese is melted. Remove from heat and keep warm.

title: Pasta with Spicy Chicken
description: Heat oil in a pan. Fry chicken at a high temperature for about 10 minutes. Wrap chicken in foil and keep warm in oven at 80°C (approximately 175°F). Cook pasta according to package label in abundant salted water. For sauce fry bacon in a frying pan.

title: Baked Mushroom Tortellini
description: For the filling, thaw spinach, squeeze juice and chop finely. Press ricotta through a sieve, place into a bowl, mix with spinach, Parmesan and egg yolk and season with salt and pepper.

title: Dumplings Filled with Ground Meat and Vegetables
description: For the dough, mix together the pastry flour, a pinch of salt and egg. If necessary add a little water to create a smooth, pliable dough. Cover and let rest about 30 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad with Sausage and Pine Nuts
description: Cook sausages in a non-stick pan on all sides. Remove from pan and cut into slices. Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a pan. Add onion and sauté briefly. Add peppers and sauté a few minutes more. Set aside.

title: Tortellini with Vegetables
description: Meanwhile, cook tortellini according to package instructions. Sauté peppers with remaining oil and garlic in frying pan, add eggplant and cook 2-3 minutes. Remove tortellini from water using skimmer, add to vegetables, mix in basil leaves and season with balsamic crema, salt and pepper. Serve in bowls.

title: Spaghetti with Sage
description: Melt the butter with the oil in a pan and add the chile pepper and garlic. Cook briefly, then stir in the sage, remove the pan from the heat and let it cool slightly. Drain the spaghetti and mix with the sage butter.

title: Seafood Lasagna
description: In a second pan, heat 2 teaspoons butter and gently sear scallops and shrimp on both sides. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Hare Ragout
description: Rinse thyme and rosemary, shake dry and pluck leaves/needles from stems. Remove hare from the marinade, drain, pat dry and cut into cubes. Remove tea bags from marinade. Heat oil in a large pot and sear hare on all sides. Add tomatoes and season with salt, pepper and thyme. Pour in marinade, cover and simmer for 1.5-2 hours.

title: Spaghetti with Cherry Tomatoes
description: Drain the pasta, and transfer to plates. Top with the sauce, garnish with the parmesan cheese, and serve.

title: Ravioli with Ham and Spinach
description: For the filling: Trim mushrooms and thinly slice. Rinse spinach and blanch in boiling water, drain, squeeze out excess moisture and chop finely. Mix mushrooms and spinach with Parmesan, parsley, finely chopped ham and ricotta. Mix in egg, season with nutmeg, salt and pepper and then add breadcrumbs.

title: Pasta with Broad Beans and Ricotta
description: Cook the pasta according to the package directions until al dente.

title: Pasta with Artichokes, Strawberries and Pine Nuts
description: Cut artichokes into slices. Heat oil in a pan and saute artichokes, deglaze pan with wine. Add strawberries, pine nuts and rosemary and cook on medium heat for about 5 minutes.
types: ['Pasta', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegan', 'Vegan Lunch', 'Vegan Entree', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Meal for Four', 'Quick', 'Vegetable', 'flowering vegetables', 'Seed', 'Herb', 'Fruit']

title: Pasta with Grilled Apple Slices and Gorgonzola
description: Remove from heat and add onions and celery to pan, mix well. Drain pasta, toss in a bowl with salad greens, celery, walnuts, apple slices, onions and Gorgonzola.

title: Spaghetti Gratin
description: Mix Parmesan with breadcrumbs, chili flakes and thyme. Place pasta mixture into 4 buttered ramekins and spread with breadcrumb mixture. Bake in preheated oven at 180°C (approximately 350°F) for about 25-30 minutes. Remove from oven and invert onto plates. Garnish with bell pepper and thyme, serve.

title: Pasta Salad with Olives, Artichokes and Buffalo Mozzarella
description: Drain tomatoes. Cut tomatoes into small cubes. Drain olives. Drain mozzarella and cut into 2 cm (approximately 3/4 inch) cubes. Drain artichoke hearts and cut into wedges. Peel onion, halve and cut into thin half-rings. Blanch onion in boiling salted water, rinse cold and drain. Rinse basil, shake dry and cut into fine strips.

title: Beef Stew with Noodles
description: Cook on high heat until the pressure indicator rises, then reduce the temperature so that the pressure is maintained. Cook for 45 minutes. Turn off, set aside and let the pressure reduce. When the valve is fully down, open the lid, season with salt and pepper and remove the bay leaves.

title: Beef Broth with Ravioli
description: For the dough: Pile flour on a work surface, make a well in the center. Pour in eggs, salt and oil. Use a fork to mix more flour from the edge, then knead by hand into a smooth dough. Add some water, if necessary. Shape into a ball, wrap in foil and let rest for 20 minutes.

title: Ravioli with Spinach-Ricotta Filling and Vanilla Butter
description: For the filling: Rinse and blanch spinach in salted water. Squeeze out excess water and chop finely. Then, in a bowl, mix with ricotta, parmesan, salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Ravioli with Vegetable Filling
description: Rinse eggplant and tomato, pat dry, trim and cut into very small cubes. Rinse and trim scallions, finely chop the white part, cut the green in small rings and set aside. Peel garlic and chop finely. Sauté in 1 tablespoon butter and add the white scallions. Add eggplant and tomato and simmer until the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg, basil and thyme, ricotta and green tops of scallions, mix and allow to cool.

title: Pasta with Mozzarella
description: Roll the mozzarella in the flour and roll through the egg-parmesan mixture. Saute in hot oil for 1-2 minutes, until golden brown on each side. Season the tomato sauce with salt and pepper. Mix in the basil and drained pasta. Arrange the pasta on plates and top with the mozzarella. Serve garnished with basil leaves.
types: ['Pasta', 'meat-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet noodle dish', 'European', 'Italian', 'Family', 'Meal for Four', 'College Cooking', 'Vintage', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Sprout', 'Onion', 'Cheese', 'Spaghetti', 'Tomato Sauce', 'Main Course']

title: Filled Pasta with Butter and Tomato
description: Drain pasta, spread on plates, mix Parmesan with parsley in a bowl and add to the pan. mix briefly and pour over pasta. Serve immediately and season with salt and pepper.

title: Vegetarian Cannelloni with Tomato
description: For the sauce, peel shallots and garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute shallot and garlic briefly. Add tomatoes, mix and simmer over medium heat for about 10 minutes. Add cheese and season to taste with sugar.

title: Whole Wheat Tagliatelle with Tomato Caper Sauce
description: Cook tagliatelle in plenty of salted water according to package instructions.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna with Tomato Salad
description: Rinse and trim zucchini, eggplant and bell peppers. Cut zucchini and eggplant into thin slices. Cut bell peppers in half, put on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and toast under a preheated oven grill until skin begins to bubble and starts to turn black. Remove bell pepper halves, cover with a damp kitchen towel, let rest briefly and peel skin. Cut flesh into strips. Reduce oven temperature to 180°C (approximately 350°F). Peel garlic and finely chop. Rinse fresh herbs and also finely chop. Brown pine nuts in a dry frying pan and add to the vegetables. Melt butter in a pan, sprinkle with flour, lightly sauté and pour in the milk. Stir vigorously with a whisk so that no lumps form. Let simmer about 5 minutes until thick and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Remove from heat and let cool. Mix ricotta with eggs, the cooled bechamel sauce, garlic and the herbs and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Grease a baking dish about 30 x 15 cm (approximately 12 x 6 inch) with oil and put a first layer of noodles in the dish side by side. Then spread some of the ricotta mixture. Lay vegetables on top, sprinkle with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper. Place the second layer of pasta. According to this method, use up remaining ingredients for each layer and conclude with noodles. On the top layer of noodles spread with sour cream and sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese. Bake in preheated oven until golden brown for 35-40 minutes.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: For the lasagna, peel the onions and garlic and chop finely. Rinse the paprika, clean and cut into small pieces or short strips. Rinse the eggplant and dice. Clean mushrooms and cut into slices. Fry the onions and garlic in 30 grams (approximately 1 ounce) hot butter. Add the eggplant and cook. Add the paprika and cook briefly. Add the canned whole peeled tomatoes and vegetable broth, cook briefly, and season. Thicken as needed with the cornstarch mixed with a little water.

title: Butterfly Pasta with Shrimp and Asparagus
description: Heat the butter in a pan and sauté the lemon slices along with the asparagus. Add the peas and shrimp and sauté briefly. Remove the lemon slices, pour in the cream and heat through. Season with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta, mix in all the ingredients and arrange on 4 plates. Garnish with lemon slices and serve sprinkled with lemon juice.

title: Shrimp Pasta with Green Asparagus
description: Meanwhile, peel the garlic and finely chop. Cook along with the prawns in oil over medium heat, turning as needed. Rinse the parsley, finely chop and mix in with the shrimp. Rinse lemon, squeeze out the juice into a little bowl and add to the shrimp.

title: Lasagna with Swiss Chard and Kohlrabi
description: For the bechamel, melt the butter in a pot. Sprinkle with the flour and stir until well combined. Gradually pour in the milk while stirring. Bring to a boil and cook briefly until thickened. Remove from the heat and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Peas and Broad Beans
description: Cook fettuccine in boiling salted water until al dente and drain well.

title: Baked Pasta with Ground Meat and Zucchini
description: Heat 3 tablespoons of oil in a pan and cook zucchini briefly. Remove from pan, add ground meat to the pan and saute until crumbly. Add chopped vegetables and saute briefly, add tomatoes and season with salt, pepper and oregano. Simmer for 20-25 minutes on medium heat.

title: Monkfish with Spinach and Noodles
description: Peel and finely chop the shallot and garlic. Saute in a pan with 1 tablespoon hot oil. Add the spinach and lightly saute until wilted. Pour in the wine and simmer until reduced. Remove from heat and let cool. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Beef Roulades with Pasta and Tomato Sauce
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, drain well. Remove kitchen strings from roulades and cut them into slices. Arrange pasta and meat on plates, drizzle with sauce and sprinkle with Parmesan. Serve.

title: Spicy Pasta with Mussels
description: In a pan heat cook garlic and chile in hot oil, 1-2 minutes. Deglaze with white wine and 250 ml (approximately 1 cup) water. Season with salt and pepper and add mussels. Cook over high heat until mussels have opened, 8-10 minutes. Remove any mussels that have not opened. Set aside 16 mussels.

title: Beef Stew and Noodles
description: Add the broth and wine and cook for 30 minutes covered, then remove the lid and add the paprika, salt and pepper and simmer for 30 more minutes with the lid off. At the same time, cook the noodles in plenty of salted water according to package label. Melt the butter in a small saucepan, drain the pasta, swirl in the butter and serve with the stew in bowls. Garnish with fresh herbs.

title: Pasta Gratin with Tuna and Capers
description: Drain tuna well, pick apart with a fork and mix with tomato sauce. Season to taste. Add pasta and spread everything in a greased baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese and bake in preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F) for about 30-35 minutes. Remove from oven, sprinkle with remaining capers and garnish with chopped basil. Place lemon wedge into each corner and serve.

title: Spelt Tagliatelle with Parsley and Cheese
description: Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop finely. Peel the garlic and thinly slice. Drain the anchovies and finely chop.

title: Pasta with Pancetta, Spinach and Cherry Tomatoes
description: Rinse the cherry tomatoes. Cut the pancetta into strips. Rinse the spinach, shake dry, sort and cut into wide strips. Drain the white beans.

title: Pasta with Brocoletto and Pine Nuts
description: Toast the pine nuts until golden brown in a dry pan, remove from heat, let cool briefly and then finely chop. Fry the pancetta with the oil, garlic, scallions and broccoli stalks, sauté briefly then deglaze with the wine. Simmer gently over a medium heat for 5 minutes, then add the cabbage leaves and stir together. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Drain the pasta and mix into the pan. Toss everything well and serve on warmed plates with the pine nuts and freshly grated parmesan.

title: Vegetable Pasta Gratin
description: Mix the eggs with the cream and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Spread the pasta in a greased baking dish. Pour in the egg cream. Alternately layer the tomato and zucchini slices. Sprinkle with the cheese and leek. Bake for 30-35 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve immediately.

title: Curried Pasta with Cauliflower
description: Remove, drain and place in a pan with melted butter. Season with salt and pepper, sprinkle with sesame seeds, toss briefly and serve on the drained pasta in a dish. Serve immediately.

title: Sausage, Bell Pepper and Pasta Stew
description: Heat the oil in a pan and saute the sausage until browned. Remove from the pan. Add the shallot and garlic and saute until translucent. Add the bell peppers and saute briefly. Stir in the tomato puree.  Add the broth and simmer for 40 minutes over medium heat.

title: Ravioli with Calf Tail and Salsa Verde
description: Heat 4 tablespoons of olive oil and fry the calf tail slices. Season with salt and pepper. Add the carrots, onions, tomatoes, garlic, thyme, bay leaves, juniper berries, and tomato paste. Fry briefly and then pour in Marsala. Simmer for about 1 1/2 hours at low heat, adding water as needed.

title: Pasta with Salmon and Fennel
description: Trim fennel, rinse bulb, wipe dry and cut into strips. Chop the fennel leaves and set aside.

title: Tagliatelle with Ricotta and Lemon
description: Meanwhile, rinse the scallions, trim, separete green portion from the white and set greens aside, Finely chop the white portion of the scallions. Rinse the lemon in hot water, finely grate the peel, then cut the fruit and squeeze the juice. For the garnish, cut green portion of scallions lengthwise into narrow strips and pull gently over the back of a knife to curl.

title: Halibut with Spaghetti and Asparagus
description: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a pan and sprinkle in  2 tablespoons of flour. Add the cream and a bit of asparagus cooking liquid and cook over medium heat for 5-10 minutes. Season with salt, pepper and lemon juice.

title: Tagliatelle with Cherry Tomatoes and Goat Cheese
description: Rinse spinach, blanch in boiling salted water, rinse with cold water and drain.

title: Noodle Soup with Beans
description: Peel onion and chop finely. Peel carrot, rinse celery, peel celery root, cut everything into small cubes.

title: Green Vegetable Soup with Pesto
description: For the soup: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, drain, rinse and then drain well. Peel asparagus, remove ends, cut spears into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2 inch) long pieces and cook for 6 minutes in boiling water with a pinch of salt, sugar and a dash of lemon. Drain, plunge into ice cold water, drain well and halve lengthwise.

title: Parsley Stuffed Tortellini
description: Whisk the eggs in a bowl, whisk, add salt, pour in the olive oil and gradually mix in the flour from the edges using fingers.

title: Sweet Pasta with Apricot Compote
description: Melt butter in a saucepan. Add breadcrumbs and cook until golden-brown. Add pasta and toss until heated through. Mix in sugar and cinnamon. Serve pasta with topped with apricot compote. Garnish with mint and fresh apricots.

title: Pasta with Cream Sauce and Smoked Salmon
description: Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and cook briefly. Pour in cream and lemon juice, add herbs and simmer about 4 minutes. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper. Mix sauce with pasta and divide among plates. Place salmon alongside pasta. Garnish with herbs and cress.

title: Pasta with Asparagus and Parsley
description: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente and drain.

title: Pasta with Ham and Bell Peppers
description: Chop the ham coarsely and fry in some butter until crispy. Remove and set aside.

title: Asian Chicken Soup
description: Rinse, halve, remove the seeds and ribs, and chop the chile peppers. Rinse and slice the celery. Add 4 tablespoons of soy sauce and ginger to the broth. Add the prepared vegetables and chicken. Heat over medium heat for 12-15 minutes. Rinse and chop the spinach.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted until al dente. Drain well, then arrange on plates. Top with the sauce, garnish with parsley and grated parmesan cheese, and serve immediately.

title: Macaroni and Ground Meat Casserole
description: For the béchamel sauce: In a pan, melt butter. Stir in flour and cook for a few minutes. Gradually whisk in milk. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes. Reduce heat to low and stir in cream and 1 tablespoon Parmesan. Fill a buttered baking dish with half of the pasta. Spread meat mixture over pasta, and sprinkle with half of cheese. Layer with remaining noodles and pour in béchamel sauce. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in a preheated oven (200°C or approximately 400°F) until top is brown, about 25 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.

title: Pasta with Vegetable Sauce
description: Peel the shallots and garlic and finely chop.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
description: Heat oil in a frying pan and saute onion and garlic until soft. Add tomatoes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring. Season with salt, pepper, hot pepper and basil. Cook pasta according to package instructions in boiling salted water until al dente. Combine with sauce and serve immediately.

title: Spinach Pasta Rolls
description: For the filling: Rinse spinach, and blanch in boiling salted water. Drain and squeeze out excess water. Finely chop.

title: Pasta with Green Beans and Parmesan
description: Bring plenty of saltwater with 3 savory branches to a boil, add spaghetti and green beans and cook until al dente.

title: Baked Macaroni
description: Preheat oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F). Mix pasta with the sauce and place in a buttered baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes until golden brown. Serve immediately garnished with Parmesan cheese if desired.

title: Pork Medallions with Pasta
description: Peel carrots and cut diagonally into thin slices.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce and Carrots
description: Rinse tomatoes, quarter, remove stalk and dice.

title: Lasagne with White Sauce
description: Peel carrot and celery and finely dice.

title: Ravioli with Mushroom and Ricotta Filling
description: For the filling: Rinse mushrooms and chop finely. Peel and finely chop the onion. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onion until soft. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring constantly until the liquid has evaporated. Leave to cool. When lukewarm, mix with the ricotta and Pecorino. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
description: Mix the vinegar, salt, pepper and sugar. Peel and squeeze the garlic through a press. Whisk with the olive oil. Mix all of the prepared ingredients together and allow to marinade for about 30 minutes.

title: Salad with Tortellini
description: Rinse cucumber and cut into thin slices.

title: Garlic Spaghetti with Tomato
description: Fry the garlic in some oil (with skin) over medium heat until golden brown.

title: Pasta with Spinach
description: Rinse and halve cocktail tomatoes.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Dough', 'European', 'Italian', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Seed', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach']

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Heat the oil in a pan, then sweat the shallots briefly. Add the tomatoes (minus 2 tablespoons), and season to taste with salt, pepper, and sugar. Simmer gently over low heat for 15 minutes.

title: Rice Noodles with Tofu, Shrimp and Chicken
description: Cut the tofu into cubes.

title: Pasta with Clams
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Penne with Tomato Sauce
