description: Wash the zucchinis, slice and cook in the olive oil without browning. Add the tomato paste, 100 ml (approximately 1/3 cup) of water, the diced tomato and the ketchup and bring to a boil while stirring. Add the basil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Goat Cheese and Arugula
description: Rinse the arugula, shake dry and remove the tough stems. Peel, halve and finely chop the onion and garlic. Rub mushrooms with a paper towel, peeled, if desired, and cut into slices. Heat butter in a skillet and saute the mushrooms, onion and garlic until tender. Add the tomatoes and simmer until heated through. Season with salt, pepper and ketchup. Drain the pasta and toss with the arugula and tomato sauce. Spoon pasta onto warmed plates. Serve sprinkled with goat cheese and Parmesan cheese.

title: Vegetable Orzo
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain well.

title: Bean Soup with Sausage and Tortellini
description: Rinse and spin dry spinach. Cut sausage into slices. Add tortellini to the soup and cook for 2 minutes. Add sausage and spinach, remove pan from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste, pour into bowls and sprinkle with cheese. Serve with toasted bread.

title: Chicken Schnitzel and Linguine
description: Place the flour in a shallow bowl, season with salt and pepper. Beat the eggs and cream in another bowl and place the breadcrumbs in a third bowl. Dredge first in flour, then dip in the egg mixture, allowing the excess to drip off and finally in the breadcrumbs, patting to adhere.

title: Pasta Gratin
description: Drain the pasta and mix with the spinach and onion. Spread in a baking dish.

title: Pasta with Spinach and Roquefort
description: Cook pasta until al dente in boiling salted water.

title: Spaghetti with Mushroom Cream Sauce
description: Meanwhile, clean mushrooms, if necessary. Fry briefly in hot olive oil over high heat, then add salt, pepper and sage. Stir in the lemon juice, pour in the cream and season to taste.

title: Pasta with Spinach and Bacon
description: Cut the bacon into strips.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Dough', 'skillet dish', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Cream Sauce']

title: Pasta Salad with Sweet Potatoes
description: Cook pasta in plenty of salted water until al dente and drain. Combine pasta with potatoes, peas, 4 tablespoons of olive oil and chile rings in a big bowl. Cool slightly, then stir in lemon juice. Serve lukewarm.

title: Pappardelle Turkey
description: Rinse arugula, drain and chop.

title: Chicken Breasts with Carrot Pasta
description: Rinse the chicken breasts, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Coat the chicken breasts with flour, dip into beaten egg and finally roll in breadcrumbs. Press the breadcrumbs over chicken breasts with your fingers well.

title: Pasta Salad with Yogurt Dressing
description: Mix together milk, yogurt and apple cider vinegar. Season with herbal salt. Pour dressing over vegetables, pasta and ham. Mix well. Add additional herbal salt, if desired. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
types: ['Pasta Salad', 'non-alcoholic', 'egg-free', 'food-combining', 'Food-Combining Dinner', 'Food-Combining Lunch', 'grilled', 'Grilled Salad', 'Family', 'Garden Party', 'Birthday', 'Party', 'Picnic', 'College Cooking', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Legume', 'Root Vegetable', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Pasta', 'Hearty Salad', 'Party Salad', 'Lunch', 'Dinner']

title: Spicy Spaghetti with Cherry Tomatoes
description: Halve chile lengthwise, remove seeds and ribs and finely chop.

title: Bean and Vegetable Soup
description: For the pistou, rinse the basil, pat dry and pluck the leaves. Peel the garlic and chop small. Grind the garlic finely with basil in a large mortar or puree with the blender. Add one third of the tomatoes and olive oil, and puree into a paste. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Vegetable Lasagna Stacks with 3 Sauces
description: For the zucchini sauce, rinse zucchini, drain and wipe dry and cut into 1 cm (approximately 1/3 inch) cubes. Peel shallots and garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and sauté shallots and garlic. Add zucchini to pan. Season with salt and pepper and add cream and cook for about 4 minutes. Season with thyme.

title: Pasta with Meat Sauce
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente and drain. Combine with meat sauce and arrange on plates. Serve.

title: Spicy Garlic Spaghetti
description: Peel and thinly slice the garlic. Heat the oil in a pan and sauté the garlic briefly, then remove. Remove 3-4 tablespoons of the oil, and transfer to a separate pan. Heat the oil, and sauté the chili briefly. Add 50 ml (approximately 2 ounces) of the pasta cooking water. Drain the pasta, then mix with the herbs, garlic, and chili mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with some of the chili and serve.

title: Pasta with Walnut Pesto
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of salted water according to package instructions until al dente, drain and mix with the pesto. Serve garnished with walnut halves.

title: Chicken Pasta with Vegetable Sauce
description: Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, heat oil, fry chicken then remove from the pan. Sauté the onions and garlic, ​​add the vegetables and fry briefly. Pour in the broth and add the tomato paste. Add parsley, salt and pepper to taste. Mix the pasta with the fried chicken and add the vegetable sauce. Serve with freshly grated parmesan cheese, as desired.

title: Noodles with Beef
description: Cut also the leaves of the swiss chard. Briefly sauté the mustard seeds, garlic and chilli in oil. Add the white swiss chard pieces and meat, reduce heat and briefly let simmer, but do not let brown. Add the vegetable broth and soy sauce, cover and cook for 3 minutes over low heat. Add the swiss chard leaves and cook for another 7 minutes. Finally, combine it with the pasta, heat and serve.

title: Noodles with Beef and Corn
description: Cook the noodles in plenty of salted water, according to package, until al dente, then drain and rinse. Rinse the pepper, remove the seeds and cut into narrow slices. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Pat the meat dry and cut into small pieces.

title: Tortellini with Ground Meat Sauce
description: Cook the tortellini according to package directions.

title: Spaghetti with Shrimp, Tomatoes and Arugula
description: Rinse shrimp and pat dry.

title: Pasta with Mushroom Sauce
description: For the mushroom sauce, clean mushrooms. Rinse scallions, trim and cut the white parts into about 10 cm (approximately 4 inch) long strips. Slice the green parts into rings.

title: Pasta and Fruity Meatballs
description: Rinse chile peppers, cut lengthwise, remove the seeds and ribs and dice.

title: Lasagne
description: For the béchamel-bacon sauce: Cut about half of bacon slices into thin strips. In a sauté pan, heat the butter, add the bacon strips, and cook until crsip. Stir in the flour and then stir in milk and cream. Bring to a gentle simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes quietly. Lightly beat the egg yolk with a little water and stir it into the béchamel-bacon sauce. Do not return to a boil. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Fettuccine with Asparagus and Broccoli
description: Roll dough by hand or with a pasta machine to roll thinly and cut into strips. Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Chicken Soup with Pasta
description: Boil the broth with lemon juice and saffron. Add the chicken, vegetables and pasta, boil again and cook for about 12 minutes until the pasta is al dente. Season with salt and pepper and sprinkle with parsley.

title: Pasta with Pesto and Pumpkin
description: Drain the tomatoes and cut into strips.

title: Minestrone
description: Drain the corn.

title: Mediterranean Chicken with Pasta
description: Mix the lemon juice, chopped chile pepper, sage and olive oil in a bowl to make a marinade. Season well with pepper. Toss the chicken pieces with the marinade and leave for about 1½ hours in the refrigerator. Toss the chicken pieces once in between.

title: Farfalle with Mediterranean Vegetable Ragout
description: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan. Sauté the zucchini, eggplant and garlic. Stir in the plum tomatoes, mushrooms and artichokes. Season with pepper and oregano to taste and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the ketchup. Drain the farfalle and divide between plates. Top with sauce. Sprinkle with parsley and garnish with olives.

title: Vegetable Pasta Salad
description: Peel the onion and cut into strips.

title: Pasta with Spinach and Cream Sauce
description: Heat the cream and season with salt, nutmeg and pepper. Arrange pasta in shallow bowls. Spoon the spinach over the pasta evenly and then pour over the heated cream. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with chopped walnuts. Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Ravioli
description: Peel the beets and potatoes, dice and cook in a little water for 20 minutes. Drain, allow to cool and puree.

title: Roast Duck with Orange Sauce and Vegetables
description: With a paring knife, follow the curve of the remaining orange and remove the peel and white pith. Cut in between the membranes to release the fruit. Garnish the duck with the sauce and the orange segments.

title: Crackers with Vegetable Monster Faces
description: Stir together cream cheese with milk and season with salt, pepper, and paprika. Rinse bell pepper and cut into strips. Rinse tomatoes and cucumbers and slice. Rinse scallions, trim and cut into thin rings. Cut olives into rings. Rinse chives and shake dry.

title: Pasta with Tomatoes, Garlic, and Herbs
description: Rinse basil and pluck the leaves. Rinse arugula and remove the tough stems. Save some leaves for garnish, and then chop the rest.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetable Sauce
description: Sautée the shallot with the crushed garlic, add the ​​vegetables and let simmer for about 3 minutes. Stir in the tomato paste, salt and pepper and let simmer for about 15 minutes. Finally stir in the herbs.

title: Meatballs in Beef Broth
description: Squeeze bread and mix in a bowl with beef, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Rinse parsley, shake dry and chop. Knead into meat mixture. Form small meatballs and set aside.

title: Easy Pasta Primavera
description: Peel shallots and garlic and chop finely.

title: Tomato Broth with Asparagus Tortellini
description: Strain stock mixture into another saucepan through a fine sieve, discarding solids.

title: Apple Cinnamon Ravioli
description: Mix eggs and liquid evenly with a fork, then gradually mix in flour from the edge of the trough until all flour is incorporated and a viscous dough forms. If dough is too hard and crumbly, add a little water. Knead dough vigorously, wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

title: Pasta and Ground Meat Gratin
description: Heat butter in a pan and add flour, saute briefly. Add milk, whisking, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for about 10 minutes on very low heat, stirring occasionally. Whisk in egg yolk gradually.

title: Pasta with Macadamia Nut Sauce
description: Toast chopped nuts in a dry pan, then set aside.

title: Rice Noodle Soup
description: When the broth has boiled vigorously once, reduce heat and simmer until reduced to 2.5-3 liters (approximately 10 1/2 to 12 1/2 cups) of liquid, 2-3 hours. While broth cooks, skim off foam occasionally. Pour broth carefully through a damp cloth strainer or a fine sieve. Discard solids.

title: Noodles with Chicken
description: Add the sage leaves. Pour in broth, wine, lemon juice and creme fraiche. Simmer over low heat for about 8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Arugula Pesto
description: Drain the pasta, reserving 2-3 tablespoons cooking water. Toss pasta with pesto and stir in cooking water, if needed. Serve sprinkled with toasted pine nuts.

title: Pasta with Tomato Chicken Stew
description: Remove the seeds and stalks from the blanched tomatoes and chop the pulp.

title: Noodle Soup with Vegetables
description: Boil lemongrass, ginger, soy sauce and lime juice in the vegetable stock. Simmer over medium heat for about 5 minutes.

title: Pasta with Pepper Sauce
description: In a pan, sauté onion and garlic in 3 tablespoons hot olive oil. Add roasted peppers. Cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, 5-6 minutes. Puree peppers, onion and garlic with almonds. Season with salt, pepper and chili powder. Fold in raw, diced peppers.

title: Mushroom Soup
description: Meanwhile, rinse mushrooms, cut off stem ends and slice. Heat butter and cook mushrooms until golden brown on both sides. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Minestrone
description: Heat the olive oil in a pan, fry bacon and onions in it briefly, add the remaining vegetables and cook for about 5 minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Let simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the noodles and continue to cook the soup until the noodles are tender. Season with salt, pepper, cayenne pepper and thyme.

title: Beans and Ground Meat Sauce
description: Add drained beans and peppercorns and simmer for 10 minutes more. Sprinkle with peppercorns and serve.

title: Farfalle Salad with Vegetables
description: Peel garlic, chop finely and mix with vinegar and oil. Season with pepper. Toss salad with dressing and let stand for 30 minutes. Serve.

title: Pasta with Mixed Vegetables
description: Heat oil in a pan and saute carrots and zucchini for about 8 minutes. Add squeezed garlic, drained pasta, Parmesan, pine nuts, basil and 2 tablespoons of olive oil, mix well and season with salt and pepper.

title: Goulash with Mushrooms
description: Instead of normal noodles, venison goulash with mushrooms can also be served with wholemeal pasta. This provides the body with more dietary fibre to aid digestion and the meal lasts longer.

title: Hearty Baked Pasta
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, drain and rinse in cold water, drain well.

title: Tagliatelle with Pork and Vegetables
description: Sear meat portions in the hot oil. Pour in the balsamic vinegar and tomato purée and let simmer for 2 minutes. Season with salt, pepper and sugar. Stir sour cream into the sauce, to taste. Serve with noodles , garnished with the zucchini gratings.

title: Lentils with Pasta
description: Heat oil in a pan and saute onion, chile pepper and pressed garlic for a few minutes. Add lentils with soaking water and wine and simmer for about 40 minutes. Add remaining vegetables 10 minutes before the end of cooking (except tomatoes) and mix well. Add arugula and tomatoes at the end of cooking, simmer briefly and season with salt, pepper and balsamic vinegar.

title: Orecchiette with Broccoli
description: Drain pasta and mix with the broccoli florets. Fold in olive oil, garlic and chopped chile. Season with salt and pepper. To serve, place on a warm plate and sprinkle with Parmesan.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Cook the lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain, rinse in cold water and drain again.

title: Crab and Zucchini Pasta
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salt water until al dente.

title: Salmon with Pasta and Lemon Sauce
description: Boil the cream, salt, pepper and lemon zest in a pan and cook over high heat for about 2 -3 minutes. Reduce the heat and add salmon. Cook about 3-4 minutes. Remove the salmon and set aside.

title: Cannelloni with Fish Filling
description: Rinse and trim scallions and cut into thin rings. Rinse lemon in hot water. Cut mozzarella into cubes.

title: White Fish Cannelloni
description: Trim, rinse and cut spring onions into thin rings. Rinse lemon in hot water. Cut mozzarella into cubes.

title: Lasagna
description: Heat the oil and sauté the onion and garlic. Add the mushrooms and ground beef. Add the tomatoes, crush them, and let simmer for 10 minutes. Season the sauce with salt, pepper, bouillion and herbs.

title: Baked Spaghetti Nests
description: Peel and finely chop shallots and garlic.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Cream Sauce
description: Peel onion and garlic and chop finely. Rinse chile pepper, slit lengthwise, remove seeds and finely chop. Heat butter in a pan and sautée the onions until soft, add the garlic and chile and let sautée briefly. Stir in tomato paste, then stir in broth and season with salt and pepper. Mix the creme fraiche with the sauce, heat and finally stir in the vodka and herbs.

title: Colored Farfalle with Tomato Sauce
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, drain.

title: Seafood Pasta
description: Peel onion and garlic and chop finely. Remove mussels and clams from the pot, cover and keep warm. Discard any unopened shells. Heat oil in a pan, add shrimp, onions and garlic and fry while stirring. Deglaze the pan with mussel broth. Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes. Cook spaghetti in a pot with plenty of boiling salted water.

title: Kugel with Raisins
description: Beat the eggs and season with salt, plenty of pepper and nutmeg. Pour over pasta and mix well. Fold in raisins. Add pasta and egg raisin mixture to a baking dish and bake at 150°C (approximately 300°F) for about 1 hour until a golden crust forms. Serve hot.

title: Ricotta Ravioli
description: For the dough, mix together all ingredients, knead quickly and form dough into a smooth ball. Cover and let rest for 20 minutes.

title: Vegetable Pasta Salad
description: Rinse, halve and remove the seeds from the peppers. Cut into thin strips. Rinse and slice the celery. Rinse the mushrooms, halving or quartering them. Drain the tuna.

title: Vegetable Pasta Gratin
description: Mix the ricotta, cream, milk and eggs. Season with salt and pepper. Press the garlic and mix into the cream.

title: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Rinse and trim the scallion and cut into rings.

title: Lasagna with White Sauce
description: Cook lasagna noodles in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, then drain.

title: Fish Ravioli
description: For the filling, peel the onion and chop finely. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the onions, sprinkle with thyme and cook until translucent. Rinse chile, slit lengthwise, remove seeds and finely chop. Peel and grate the carrots.

title: Pasta with Pumpkin Sauce
description: Heat butter in a pan. Add diced shallots, leeks and celery and cook for about 3 minutes. Then add pumpkin cubes and simmer another 5 minutes. Add orange juice and vegetable broth and let boil for 15 minutes at low heat.

title: Pasta, Vegetable and Melon Salad
description: Thaw the seafood. Peel and finely chop the shallot. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a skillet, add the seafood, and saute briefly. Add the wine to the skillet, remove from the heat, and cool to room temperature. Rinse the celery and the cucumber. Thinly slice the celery. Quarter the cucumber lengthwise, and cut into  0.5 cm (approximately 1/4-inch) wide pieces.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Drain and slice the mozzarella. Layer the mozzarella with the tomatoes on a plate.

title: Spaghetti with Shrimp and Tomato
description: Peel shrimp down to the tail segment, devein, rinse and pat dry.

title: Tortellini Artichoke Salad with Tomato Sauce
description: Drain artichokes and cut into quarters. Drizzle with lemon juice. Rinse and halve cherry tomatoes. Rinse and dry scallions, cut into rings. Rinse arugula adn spin dry. Cut one third of arugula into strips.

title: Pasta with Broccoli
description: Cook pasta and curry powder in plenty of salted boiling water until pasta is al dente. Add broccoli 5 minutes before the end of the cooking time.

title: Ravioli with Ricotta Filling
description: Chop basil leaves finely, mix with garlic, ricotta, egg and Parmesan. Season with salt and cayenne pepper.

title: Chicken Breast with Shiitake Mushrooms and Noodles
description: Cook the linguine in plenty of salted water until al dente.

title: Linguine with Tomatoes
description: Rinse the basil, pat dry, and finely chop. Mix into the sauce. Drain the pasta, then mix into the sauce.

title: Tagliatelle with Vegetables
description: Heat the oil and sauté the onions, snow peas and broccoli for about 5 minutes, then pour in the broth until it begins to boil, and season with salt and pepper.

title: Penne with Meat and Tomato Sauce
description: Mix minced meat in a bowl with spices and salt and pepper.

title: Quick Spaghetti with Meat Sauce
description: Cook the macaroni, according to the package, in plenty of salted water until al dente, then drain and mix immediately with the sauce. Serve with the marjoram garnish that you previously set aside.

title: Vegetable Pasta Salad
description: Rinse and slice the zucchini. Peel the onion, cut in half lengthwise and cut into very thin strips. Rinse asparagus, peel the bottom third, cut the ends and boil in salt water for 10 minutes. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain. Cut the asparagus into pieces.

title: Pasta with Fish and Tomato
description: Divide pasta and tomatoes among four large pieces of aluminum foil. Top with fish fillets, drizzle with a little broth and seal foil. Place foil packets on a grill and cook 15-20 minutes. Open packets, sprinkle with paprika and serve immediately.

title: Meatballs with Tomato Sauce and Spaghetti
description: Peel onions and garlic, dice and sauté in a saucepan with 2 tablespoons hot oil until decreased by half. Reserve half of onion and garlic mixture.

title: Conchiglione Salad with Bacon and Melon
description: Cut bacon into cubes.

title: Spaghetti with Asparagus and Tomato Sauce
description: Cut off the lower ends of the asparagus and cut the stalks on a diagonal in 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) long pieces. Bring a large amount of salted water to a boil and cook the asparagus for 8 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and rinse. Drain well in a colander. Save the asparagus water.

title: Ravioli with Ricotta and Eggplant Filling
description: Cut the eggplant into small cubes. Rinse the bell pepper, cut in half and roast under the oven broiler until the skin peels off, then cut into cubes. Cook garlic in a pan with heated oil. Add the eggplant cubes and cook until golden brown. Finally, add the peppers, briefly sauté, and allow to cool.

title: Dumplings with Cheese, Leek and Carrot Filling
description: For the filling, trim the leek, cut in half and rinse. Peel the carrot and cut with the leek into small cubes.

title: Pasta with Salmon and Vegetables in Cream Sauce
description: Peel carrots and cut into thin slices, then cook in boiling salted water for about 6 minutes. Plunge into ice water and drain.

title: Roast Pork
description: Coat meat with the marinade.

title: Spaghetti Frittata
description: Blanch tomatoes in boiling water for a few seconds. Drain, peel, quarter, core and cut tomatoes into small cubes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Mix the eggs with the cream and 50 g (approximately 2 ounces) of the parmesan cheese. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Potato Ravioli
description: For the filling: Scrub the potatoes and boil in salt water for about 25 minutes. Peel and press through a potato ricer and let sit until all the water has evaporated. Mix with the cottage cheese, chives, parmesan and grappa. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Dried Cod and Potato Soup
description: Blanch tomatoes for a few seconds, then rinse, peel, quarter, core and chop. Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pot, sauté garlic in hot oil. Add tomatoes and herbs and simmer about 10 minutes. Add potatoes and fish stock. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add fish and continue cooking until fish and potatoes are soft, but not falling apart, about 10 minutes. Add additional water if needed to ensure that the ingredients remain barely covered.

title: Cannelloni
description: Peel the onions and chop finely. Heat the oil in a pan and saute the onions until translucent. Add the ground beef and cook until browned. Add the tomatoes. Season with salt, pepper and a few splashes of hot pepper sauce. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.

title: Penne with Mushroom Cream Sauce
description: Pour cream and vegetable broth in a saucepan and boil to reduce to about 1/3. Meanwhile, clean the mushrooms, cut into slices and mix with the lemon juice. Briefly cook the mushrooms in hot butter in a pan. Season with porcini powder, salt and pepper and mix with the cream sauce. To serve, garnish with chopped parsley.

title: Penne with Tomato Sauce
description: Stir in tomatoes and tomato paste and simmer over low heat while stirring until a thickish sauce has formed. Rinse scallions, trim, slice into rings and add to sauce with the olives. Briefly heat sauce. For the penne, cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and serve with the sauce.

title: Pasta with Egg and Tomato
description: Combine the tomatoes and the onions and fry for 5 minutes. Mix with salt, pepper and chopped basil. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions. Drain. Peel eggs, cut in half horizontally and remove the yolk with a spoon. Mix egg yolks with breadcrumbs, remaining olive oil, salt and pepper until crumbly.

title: Pasta with Tomato and Lentil Sauce
description: Peel and finely chop onion, fry together with the bacon in the olive oil, add garlic (pressed through a garlic press), then add soup vegetables and lentils and cook briefly. Add the laurel and thyme, pour in broth, add tomatoes with juice (making sure to break the tomatoes up a little), season with salt, sugar and pepper, and boil for about 30 minutes. Simmer until the lentils are tender, season to taste, stir in parsley.

title: Pappardelle with Porcini Mushrooms
description: Cook the pasta until al dente in boiling salted water.

title: Red Pasta with Clams
description: Drain tomatoes, cut into pieces and add to the pot. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes and season with salt and pepper. Cut olives into slices. Drain pasta and immediately add to the pot. Mix well and serve immediately in deep plates with olives and rosemary.

title: Cod with Vegetables
description: Rinse, trim and dice eggplants and zucchini. Season eggplants with salt and let stand briefly. Rinse and halve bell peppers, remove seeds and ribs, dice. Peel garlic and chop finely. Rinse basil and chop finely half of basil. Rinse and drain eggplants well.

title: Crepe Vegetable Lasagna with Cheese
description: For the filling, peel carrot and cut into small cubes. Rinse and scrub mushrooms and chop finely. Peel onions and garlic and chop finely. In a skillet, sauté onions and garlic in 1 tablespoon olive oil until translucent. Stir mushrooms and carrots into skillet and sauté about 5 minutes. Stir tomatoes into skillet and sauté about 5 more minutes. Stir thyme, oregano and parsley into skillet and season with salt and pepper.

title: Lasagne with Meat Sauce
description: Peel anf finely chop the onion and the carrot. In a pan heat 2 tablespoons butter.  Add carot and onion and cook until soft Gradually add gound beef and sausage in small portions, and cook until crumbly. Add salt and pepper.

title: Spinach Mushroom Lasagna Triangles with Cream Sauce
description: For the sauce, peel onion and chop finely. In the same skillet, sauté onion in butter until translucent. Deglaze skillet with wine, stir in sour cream and heavy cream and boil down until reduced by about 1/3. Season sauce with salt and pepper and keep warm.

title: Stuffed Chicken Fillet with Noodles
description: Drain the pasta and toss with the tomato sauce to coat. To serve, arrange plates on plates with a piece of chicken on top.

title: Vegetarian Lasagne
description: For the vegetables, rinse the eggplant, trim, dice, sprinkle with salt and let stand for about 30 minutes. Rinse zucchini, trim, and dice. Blanch tomatoes for a few seconds in boiling water, rinse in cold water, peel and dice. Peel the onion and chop finely. Fry the onion in hot oil, mix in the zucchini and tomatoes. Simmer for about 10 minutes, remove from the heat and add the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Drain the eggplant and add to the vegetables, cooking briefly.

title: Wild Salmon with Asparagus Pappardelle
description: Peel white asparagus and remove the woody ends. Rinse the green asparagus and remove the woody ends. Cook the asparagus in butter and just enough salted water to cover, 10 to 12 minutes. Cook noodles in boiling salted water according to package instructions, until al dente. Drizzle salmon with orange juice, then cook in a pan in clarified butter. Remove the asparagus from the cooking water, and cut the asparagus stalks diagonally into bite-size pieces. Drain the pasta and toss with pesto. Stir in the asparagus, arrange the pasta on plates, arrange the salmon on top and serve garnished with orange zest.

title: Seafood Lasagna with Béchamel Sauce
description: Blanch tomatoes for a few seconds and peel, quarter, core and cut into small cubes.

title: Pasta with Chicken
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water according to package instructions until al dente.

title: Pasta with Beef and Tomatoes
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes.

title: Flower Pasta with Seafood Cream Sauce
description: Cut salmon and scallops into 1 cm (approximately 1/3 inch) cubes. Combine fish stock with cream, pepper, saffron, cayenne pepper and omit salt. Simmer over low heat.

title: Meat-Filled Wontons with Ginger and Soy
description: Ginger and garlic peel and finely chop.

title: Tagliatelle with Borlotti Bean Sauce
description: Meanwhile, cook the tagliatelle in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain.

title: Pasta with Cherry Tomato Sauce
description: Cut remaining tomatoes into eighths. Add to sauce and heat until warmed through. Season to taste. Mix sauce with pasta and grated Parmesan cheese. Divide among plates and serve with shaved Parmesan (use a potato peeler or truffle slicer), if desired. Serve garnished with rosemary.

title: Smoked Salmon-Wrapped Monkfish with Tagliatelle
description: For the vegetable tagliatelle: Rinse the carrots, celery and summer squash. Peel the carrots and celery root and cut into long, thin strips. Halve the summer squash lengthwise, remove seeds and slice into half-moon slices.

title: Noodle Soup with Vegetables and Lentils
description: Peel and thinly slice carrots. Rinse celery and dice. Add both to lentils and season soup with salt, pepper and herbs. Add pasta and cook for about 10 minutes or until pasta and vegetables are tender.

title: Pasta with Artichokes and Mozzarella
description: Drain artichoke hearts and cut into quarters.

title: Ricotta and Herb Ravioli
description: For the dough: In a bowl, mix together the spinach, flour, 3 eggs, wine and a little salt and knead to a smooth dough. Flatten to a disk, wrap in plastic wrap and let stand 1 hour at room temperature.

title: Pork Tenderloin with Apples
description: Mix cornstarch with cold water. Deglaze pan with apple juice and add cornstarch and water and whisk until sauce thickens. Stir in cream and marjoram and whisk until sauce is smooth and creamy.

title: Pasta with Bacon, Broccoli and Cheese
description: At the same time, boil the broccoli in salted water for about 5 minutes.

title: Seafood Pasta
description: Heat remaining oil in a pan. Peel garlic and chop finely, saute for a few minutes, add remaining seafood and saute for 5 minutes on medium heat. Blanch tomatoes in hot water, rinse in cold water and peel, quarter and remove seeds, dice finely. Rinse parsley and chop finely, add to the pan and add lemon juice. Drain spaghetti and toss with seafood and clams, add tomato cubes  and season with salt and pepper. Arrange on plates and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Tomatoes
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Peel and finely dice the shallot and garlic. Mix the vinegar with the mustard, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and sugar. Gradually incorporate the oil, mix in the shallots and garlic, then add the tomatoes.

title: Vegetable Soup with Mushroom and Goat Cheese Ravioli
description: Wipe the mushrooms with a damp cloth, chop finely and sauté in hot butter for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the parsley and goat cheese. Season with a pinch of freshly grated nutmeg, salt and pepper.

title: Pasta and Caviar
description: Stir the sour cream and heavy cream with the lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Vegetables and Feta
description: Blanch tomatoes in boiling water for a few seconds, then rinse, peel, remove seeds and chop.

title: Tortellini with Vegetables and Gorgonzola Cheese Sauce
description: Heat the olive oil in a skillet and saute the zucchini until al dente. Add the tomatoes and saute briefly, season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta and Vegetable Gratin
description: Cook pasta in salted boiling water for about 8 minutes. Rinse and trim zucchini, slice thinly. Rinse and halve bell peppers, remove seeds and ribs and cut into strips. Peel, halve and slice onion. Drain pasta and spread together with vegetables in gratin pans. Whisk eggs with cream, milk, Parmesan cheese and crème fraîche. Season with salt and pepper and  add peeled and squeezed through a press garlic. Pour mixture over pasta with vegetables and sprinkle with breadcrumbs. Drain mozzarella, cut into slices and spread on top. Bake in preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F) for about 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from the pan and serve.

title: Conchiglie with Tomato and Olives
description: Rinse and quarter the tomatoes. Remove the seeds and finely dice. Peel and finely dice the onion. Cut the olives into slices. Heat the oil in a pan, and sauté the onion until translucent. Add the tomatoes, olives and oregano to the pan. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Drain the conchiglie, mix into the sauce, and toss until combined. Arrange the conchiglie on plates, and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Bacon and Peas
description: Cut bacon into strips. Peel garlic and cut into slices. Peel onions and cut into pieces. Sauté onions with the garlic and bacon in a pan with butter for 3-4 minutes. Add peas with a little pasta cooking water and finish cooking for 2-3 minutes. Allow liquid to evaporate. Season with salt and pepper. Add the drained spaghetti to pan, toss and serve.

title: Saffron Pasta with Squid
description: Rinse squid and pat dry. Peel garlic and cut into thin slices. Rinse and halve chile pepper, remove seeds and ribs and chop finely. Heat remaining oil in a pan and saute chile pepper and garlic briefly. Add squid and saute for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Spaghetti with Clams and Raspberry Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling, salted water until al dente.

title: Vegetable Cannelloni
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F). Grease the baking pan.

title: Pasta with Pumpkin and Nuts
description: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Salmon and Vegetables
description: Rinse romanesco and drain. Peel bottom thirds of asparagus and cut stalks into 2-3 cm (approximately 1 inch) long pieces. Rinse bell pepper, halve and remove seeds and ribs, cut into pieces. Rinse peas and drain.

title: Pasta Nests with Spinach, Eggs, Tomatoes and Ham
description: Defrost the spinach. Peel the shallot and chop finely. Fry shallot in oil, add the spinach and cook with a little water until the spinach is completely thawed. Season well with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Pelmeni
description: For the filling, rinse the spinach, trim and blanch in boiling, salted water. Squeeze the excess liquid and chop finely. Cut the bacon into wide strips. Peel and dice the shallot peel. Heat the butter in a pan and saute the shallots until translucent. Remove from heat and stir in the spinach. Mince finely. Mix with the cheese and egg. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Duck
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Chicken Pasta Salad
description: Boil the broth. Rinse the chicken breasts and add to the broth. Simmer on low heat for about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and allow to cool in the broth. Then remove from the broth, drain on kitchen paper and brush with the marinade.

title: Stuffed Pasta Rolls
description: For the filling: Rinse the vegetables. Trim the zucchini and eggplant and thinly slice lengthwise. Peel the peppers with a vegetable peeler, cut in half, remove the stem and seeds and cut into wide strips. Peel the garlic and mince. Rinse the herbs, shake dry, pluck the leaves and chop finely. Mix with the garlic and tomato oil and season with salt and pepper. Add the prepared vegetables and toss to combine. Let stand for about 20 minutes to marinate then grill in an aluminum pan for about 10 minutes.

title: Farfalle Salad with Peppers and Feta Cheese
description: Rinse peppers and halve, remove seeds and ribs and cut into thin strips. Rinse and pat dry chives, cut into 1-2 cm (approximately 0.5 inch) small pieces. Combine pasta with peas, peppers, nuts and chives in a large bowl. Prepare dressing by mixing vinegar with orange juice and both oils. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle salad with the dressing and let stand for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with crumbled feta cheese and serve.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and sauté the scallions, chile and fennel until the fennel softens slightly. Add the clams, wine and saffron. Increase the heat to high, cover and simmer for about 6 minutes. Remove the clams and discard any unopened clams.

title: Pork Medallions with Pasta and Vegetables
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Ravioli with Tomato Sauce
description: For the filling: Separate the egg. Remove the stems from the herbs and finely chop the leaves. Peel and finely chop the shallot and garlic. Cook the shallot and garlic in hot butter until translucent. Remove from heat, let cool slightly, then mix in a bowl with the herbs, the egg yolk, the well drained ricotta and parmesan. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Vegetables
description: Rinse and halve tomatoes, remove seeds and cut into small cubes. Cook spaghetti in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Heat oil in a large pan and saute shallot and garlic for a few minutes. Deglaze pan with white wine and broth. Add broccoli and peas, saute for about 3 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse and spin lettuce dry, then tear into bite-sized pieces. Peel and finely chop garlic. Rinse, trim and cut scallions on the diagonal. Drain olives. In a large bowl, mix pasta with snow peas, olives, garlic and scallions. Stir in olive oil and vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Let stand briefly. Place lettuce in another large bowl and top with pasta salad. Serve with shaved Parmesan.

title: Asian Noodle Soup with Chicken Meatballs
description: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain.

title: Simple Beef Stroganoff
description: Cook the pappardelle in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Rigatoni with Vegetables
description: Add grated vegetables to pan and fry, stirring, 1-2 minutes. Add cooked pasta, lemon juice and curry powder and mix until combined. Season with salt and pepper, divide among plates and serve sprinkled with Parmesan.

title: Pasta with Mussels
description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Vegetables
description: Rinse and halve peppers, remove seeds and ribs and cut into bite-sized pieces. Rinse zucchini, trim ends and dice. Rinse, core and cut tomato into small cubes. Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, sauté garlic in olive oil until translucent. Add peppers and zucchini add and sauté 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomato and season with salt and pepper. Fold in drained rotini (along with 2-3 tablespoons pasta water) and divide pasta among plates. Serve garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and parsley.

title: Goat Cheese Ravioli with Spinach Sauce
description: For the spinach sauce: Trim the spinach, rinse and drain. Peel the shallot and garlic and finely dice. Sauté the shallot and garlic in 2 tablespoons butter until softened. Add the spinach and sauté briefly. Add the stock and cream and then purée. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Vegetables
description: Rinse the zucchini, cut off ends and cut into 7 cm (approximately 3 inches) long pins. Rinse the peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut lengthwise into strips. Peel the onion and garlic, dice the garlic finely and cut the onion into strips. Clean the mushrooms and cut in half.

title: Pasta with Salmon
description: Roll out dough on a floured surface thinly (or with a pasta machine) and cut into about 1 cm thick tagliatelle (approximately 1/2 inch). Arrange on a floured kitchen towel and let dry.

title: Homemade Colored Pasta
description: Divide the dough into three equal portions.

title: Ricotta Ravioli
description: For the filling: Stir ricotta in a bowl until smooth, Rinse herbs, pat dry, mince and stir into ricotta. Add Parmesan and egg yolks to ricotta. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Ground Meat Sauce and Salsa
description: Drain the kidney beans, add to the ground meat sauce and simmer for another 5 minutes.

title: Vegetable Pasta Salad
description: Heat the vegetable fat (until small bubbles appear on a wooden spoon). Fry the sliced vegetables for about 5 minutes until crispy. Remove from the pot, drain on paper towels and season with salt and pepper.

title: Baked Pasta with Broccoli
description: Peel and finely chop garlic. Pat anchovy dry and finely chop. Whisk eggs with cream, crème fraîche, garlic, anchovies and half of the cheese. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Mushroom Lasagna
description: Rinse the mushrooms and cut into bite-size pieces. Heat the pieces in the olive oil for about 5 minutes until the mushrooms soften. Drain out any liquid. Cut the ham into strips.

title: Spaghetti with Mediterranean Chicken Sauce
description: Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the onions  and cook until translucent. Add the meat and saute until crumbly. Add the tomatoes, broth and the bay leaf and simmer, stirring occasionally for 30 minutes.

title: Tortellini with Seafood Sauce
description: For the filling: In a bowl, mix together the ricotta and mascarpone. Finely chop the anchovies, peel the garlic and squeeze through a garlic press into the ricotta cream along with the anchovies, lemon juice and zest, season with salt and pepper.

title: Ravioli with Tomato
description: For the filling: separate the egg yolk from the white. Pluck and finely chop the herbs. Peel and finely chop the shallot and garlic and fry in a pan with butter. Remove from heat and mix in a bowl with the herbs, the yolk, the well-drained ricotta and Parmesan. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Fettucine with Chicken
description: Rinse chicken, pat dry and chop. Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, fry chicken and garlic in hot oil until chicken is golden-brown, 3-4 minutes. Add broth and simmer 2-3 minutes. Stir in crème légère and basil and season with salt and pepper. Add a little pasta water to loosen sauce if needed.

title: Pasta with Zucchini
description: Rinse, trim and slice zucchini. Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, sauté garlic and zucchini in hot, melted butter, 1-2 minutes. Add broth and cook 2-3 minutes more.

title: Pasta Salad with Bell Peppers and Bacon
description: Cut bacon into strips. Peel onion and garlic and finely dice both. Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, clean inside and chop. Rinse tomatoes, core and cut into quarters. Remove seeds and chop into small cubes.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
description: Brown the chicken in a pan in hot oil briefly and take out of pan. In the same pan, sauté the shallots with the garlic and the sun-dried tomato pieces and pour in the wine. Simmer about 5 minutes.

title: Pasta Dough from Scratch and Noodle Shaping
description: Portion out the dough for easy preparation.

title: Spinach Ravioli with Sage Butter
description: For the filling: Rinse and trim spinach, remove any coarse stems and blanch for 1-2 minutes in boiling salted water. Drain, rinse with cold water, squeeze out well and chop finely. Peel shallot and garlic, finely chop, fry in butter and let cool. Then mix with the spinach, Parmesan and quark. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Vegetable', 'Dumpling', 'Gnocchi', 'Pasta', 'Dough', 'Dumpling', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Home Cooking', 'Country Style', 'European', 'Italian', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Spinach Tortellini
description: For the dough, mix the flour, eggs, 80 ml of water (approximately 5 tablespoons), olive oil and 1 teaspoon salt in a bowl and knead into a smooth dough. Form a ball, wrap in a kitchen towel and let rest for a good 30 minutes at room temperature. Roll out the dough in portions as thin as possible with a rolling pin on a floured surface or use a pasta machine. Cut out circles measuring 6 cm in diameter (approximately 2 inches). This can be done easily using the edge of a glass. Add a spoonful of filling to each circle and fold in half, pressing the edges together. Take each crescent by the corners and pull lengthwise first and then put corners together to make a tortellini shape. Pinch edges to adhere. Let rest on a floured surface for 2 hours.

title: Spinach and Potato Tortellini
description: For the dough: Rinse spinach and blanch for 3-4 minutes. Drain and squeeze out thoroughly. Mince spinach and squeeze again, making it as dry as possible.

title: Tortellini with Ricotta
description: For the pasta dough: In a bowl, mix the flour, eggs, 80 ml (approximately 2 1/2 ounces) of water, olive oil and 1 teaspoon of salt. Knead into a smooth dough. Form a ball, wrap in a kitchen towel and let it rest for about 30 minutes at room temperature. Roll out the dough on a floured surface in portions as thin as possible or put in the pasta machine. Cut the dough into circles with a diameter of about 6 cm (approximately 2 1/2 inches). The best way to do that is to take a glass, place it on the sheet of dough and cut around it. You can also use a cookie cutter on the dough. Put 1 hazelnut sized filling on each circle. Fold the circles into crescents and press the edges together. Grasp each dumpling at the two pointed ends and gently pull it lengthwise. Connect the two ends and squeeze well. Repeat for all dumplings. Let the tortellini rest on a floured kitchen towel for 1-2 hours.

title: Pasta with Asparagus Sauce
description: Peel the bottom third of the asparagus and cut the stalks into pieces. Add the tops during the last 5 minutes of the pasta and allow to cook.

title: Farfalle with Cheese Sauce and Herbs
description: Heat the vegetable broth, crème fraîche, and cheese (minus 2 tablespoons for garnish) in a small pot. Stir constantly, and don't allow to come to a boil. Mix in the herbs, then season to taste with lemon juice, salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Tortellini, Prosciutto and Vegetables with Alfredo Sauce
description: For the filling, drain ricotta well. Mix ricotta, herbs, Parmesan and egg yolk and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Macaroni with Shredded Turkey and Mushrooms
description: Peel and chop the onion. Trim and wipe the mushrooms and cut into slices. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop the leaves.

title: Turkey Fillets with Tagliatelle and Watercress Sauce
description: Rinse watercress and chervil, shake dry and pluck leaves. Set aside some leaves for garnish and finely chop the rest. Peel and press garlic.

title: Dumplings with Cheese and Herb Filling
description: For the filling: In a bowl, stir together the cottage cheese, breadcrumbs, herbs and egg. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Salmon, Broccoli and Pesto Sauce
description: Rinse peas and broccoli and drain. Place vegetables and salmon into buttered steamer insert and cook, covered, over boiling water for about 5 minutes.

title: Baked Pasta with Zucchini and Tomatoes
description: Rinse and dry tomatoes and zucchini. Cut zucchini into slices and tomatoes into half-slices. Peel garlic and chop finely. Rinse and dry chile pepper, halve and remove seeds and ribs, chop finely. Combine pasta with tomatoes, zucchini, rosemary, garlic, chile pepper, lemon zest and capers and season with salt lightly.

title: Pasta with Cheese and Herb Sauce
description: Finely dice pecorino cheese. Rinse parsley and chervil, shake dry and strip leaves from stems. Roughly puree pine nuts with parsley, peeled garlic clove, mustard, oil, lemon juice and a little pasta water. Stir in cheese and season with salt and pepper.

title: Vegetable Soup with Pasta Shells
description: Bring the broth to a boil and add the potatoes, carrots, peppers, leeks and celery. Add the salt and simmer for about 20 minutes on low heat.

title: Clam and Shrimp with Creamy Stuffed Pasta
description: For the first filling, rinse spinach and blanch in salted water. Squeeze out water and chop finely. Peel garlic and finely grate and combine with spinach, dill, parmesan, lemon zest and ricotta. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Porcini Stuffed Potato Ravioli
description: For the vinaigrette: Whisk together the vinegar, Madeira, cream, mustard and oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Basil Pesto
description: Puree the remaining basil with 1-2 tablespoons of lemon juice, half of the pine nuts, and 80 ml (approximately 3 ounces) of olive oil. Mix in the parmesan cheese and season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Potato and Cabbage Crusted Salmon with Pappardelle
description: Rinse the cabbage and blanch in a pot of boiling salted water for 4-5 minutes. Rinse with cold water to cool, pat dry and coarsely chop. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and pluck leaves. Puree the cabbage with the parsley and creme fraiche in a blender. Separate the eggs. Stir the yolks and grated potatoes into the cabbage mixture. Season with lemon juice, salt, nutmeg and pepper to taste. In a bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff. Gently fold into the cabbage mixture and season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Pasta with Green Asparagus and Toasted Bread
description: Serve with bruschetta, if desired.

title: Spicy Cutlets
description: Mix the ground meat with the onion, garlic, chile pepper and thyme. Using your hands, combine the eggs and breadcrumbs into the meat mixture. Season with salt, pepper, mustard powder, and paprika. Melt the clarified butter in a skillet and, with wet hands, form about 10-12 patties. Cook the patties in hot butter on both sides about 8-10 minutes until done (depending on thickness). Remove from heat. Serve immediately.

title: Shrimp Pasta Salad
description: Whisk the olive oil with the vinegar, mayonnaise, ketchup, and paprika. Season with salt and pepper. Drain the shrimp and mix with the avocado, lemon juice, spring onion and tomatoes. Toss with the noodles and season again.

title: Ricotta and Herb Tortellini
description: Thaw spinach in a colander, drain and squeeze out liquid.

title: Herb Tomato Ravioli with Sage Butter
description: For the filling, cut an "x" in bottom of each tomato. Blanch tomatoes in boiling water and peel. Cut tomatoes in half, remove seeds, dice finely and drain. Peel onion and garlic and finely dice. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic until translucent. Add tomatoes to pan, sauté briefly, stir in sugar and season with salt and pepper. Rinse thyme and basil, shake dry and pluck leaves. Chop thyme finely and cut basil into thin strips.

title: Ravioli with Ricotta and Fresh Herbs
description: For the filling, briefly blanch the herbs in boiling water, rinse with cold water and drain well. Pluck the leaves and finely chop the sage leaves. Stir the Ricotta, Parmesan, egg yolk and herbs. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.

title: Macaroni with Beans and Bell Peppers
description: Slice bell peppers into quarters, removing the seeds and ribs. Rinse bell peppers and cut into small cubes. Peel and chop the onion and garlic.

title: Garlic Spaghetti
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water untl al dente.

title: Vegetables and Tagliatelle in Gorgonzola Cream Sauce
description: Bring broth and cream to a boil. Stir in garlic and gorgonzola and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Season with salt, pepper and vinegar.

title: Ravioli
description: Rinse Swiss chard and shred. Blanch Swiss chard in boiling salted water for about 2 minutes. Shock in ice water and drain well. Separate remaining egg. Combine Swiss chard, ricotta and egg yolk. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Stuffed Pasta Shells with Tarragon Hollandaise
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water combined with a little oil until al dente. Remove 2 tablespoons of cooking water from the pan and combine with mustard, toss vegetables with mustard mixture. Drain pasta well. Stuff pasta shells with vegetable mixture and spread in a greased baking dish.

title: Vegetable Lasagne
description: Preheat the oven to 220°C (approximately 425°F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

title: Spelt Pasta with Pumpkin and Vegetables
description: Cook the spelt noodles in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente. Drain the pasta.

title: Pasta Casserole
description: Rinse the leek and cut into rings. Blanch the leek in boiling salt water and drain well. Mix the drained corn, leek, noodles, chopped hotdogs and cheese.

title: Stuffed Zucchini with Tomato and Sunflower Seeds
description: Cook halved zucchini over medium heat in remaining oil on each side for about 3 minutes. Spoon into a bowl. Chop the tomatoes finely and add with ketchup to the zucchini flesh mixture. Season with salt, pepper, basil and rosemary. Spoon filling into the zucchini halves. Top each with 2 tablespoons of grated cheese. Cook in skillet, covered, over low heat about 10 minutes or until heated through.

title: Pasta with Pumpkin Seed Pesto
description: Cut the ricotta and pecorino into pieces. Add to the pesto along with the pumpkin seeds and purée. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Coconut and Chicken Sauce
description: Rinse and finely chop scallions. Halve pepperoncini and remove seeds and ribs, dice finely. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and saute scallions, pepper and chicken for a few minutes. Add broth and coconut milk and season with lime juice, salt, cayenne pepper and curry powder, simmer for 5-6 minutes on low heat.

title: Scampi Minestrone
description: Peel and dice the onion and garlic. Saute in 2 tablespoons olive oil in a saucepan. Add all vegetables (except tomatoes) and saute. Add broth and tomatoes and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.

title: Baked Pasta with Mushrooms
description: Cook tortellini and rigatoni according to package instructions in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain well.

title: Egg Noodles with Vegetables
description: Cut the cauliflower into florets and cut those florets into quarters. Share cauliflower into small florets, florets eventually into quarters. Chop the mushrooms and snow peas depending on size. Soak the noodles in plenty of cold water for about 2 minutes, then cook for 3 mintues in boiling, lightly salted water and drain. (Read the package instructions, since the preparation depending on the product may be very different).

title: Rice Noodle Salad

title: Sweetbreads with Onion Ravioli
description: For the onion ravioli: In a bowl, knead together the flour, ½ teaspoon salt, the egg and olive oil until it is a smooth dough. Form the dough into a ball, cover in plastic wrap and let rest for 30 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad
description: Mix the yogurt, creme fraiche and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Peel and press the garlic into the dressing. Mix the pasta with the dressing and let stand for about 30 minutes.

title: White Chocolate Mousse with Orange Noodles and Wine Sauce
description: For the noodles, mix flour, oil, egg, sugar, salt and orange zest to a smooth dough. Wrap dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for about 30 minutes. Knead dough and roll out thinly on a floured surface. Loosely roll up dough sheet and cut into strips. Pull noodles apart and let dry. Boil noodles in plenty of lightly sugared water until al dente. Drain noodles, rinse with cold water, drain well and spread on a baking sheet. For the syrup, mix orange juice and Cointreau over high heat and boil down until thickened. Mix noodles into syrup just before serving.

title: Pasta Salad with Shrimp and Breaded Turkey
description: For the salad: Cook pasta in plenty of salted water according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and rinse in cold water, drain well. Rinse parsley, shake dry and pluck off leaves. Chop finely adn combine with parsley. Whisk vinegar with mustard and oil, season with salt and pepper and toss pasta with the dressing.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Pesto
description: Cook spaghetti in plenty of boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente. Drain. Mix with tomato pesto and serve sprinkled with basil leaves.

title: Vegetable Tagliatelle with Turmeric and Pistachio Butter
description: Heat oil in a pot and sauté garlic, chile pepper and onions. Add okra and sauté. Season with salt and pepper. Pour in broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer about 15 minutes.

title: Asparagus and Prosciutto Pasta Salad
description: For the asparagus: Trim the asparagus, rinse and cut into 5 cm (approximately 2-inch) long pieces. Cook in salted boiling water with a pinch of sugar for about 10 minutes.

title: Fennel Gelatin with Vegetable Salad
description: Soak the gelatin in cold water. Heat the lemon juice and dissolve the gelatin in it. Remove from heat, stir in the sour cream and season with salt, cayenne pepper and orange zest to taste. Leave for about 30 minutes in the refrigerator until the mixture starts to gel. Whip the cream until stiff and fold with the fennel greens with the sour jelly mixture. Pour into 4 serving molds and cover with foil in the refrigerator for 3 hours until firm.

title: Spaghetti and Arugula Salad
description: Cook spaghetti in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and mix spaghetti in a large bowl with 5 tablespoons olive oil, tomatoes, bell pepper, scallions, parsley and pepper. Season with lemon juice and salt. Mix in arugula and pine nuts. Garnish with Parmesan and serve.

title: Pasta with Borage
description: Rinse borage, shake dry and strip leaves from stems. Set aside a few leaves for garnish and blanch remaining borage in boiling salted water, about 3 minutes. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

title: Lamb Stew with Pasta
description: Blanch tomatoes in hot water for a few seconds, rinse in cold water and peel. Quarter and remove seeds, dice.

title: Penne with Mushroom Sauce
description: Cut the ham into strips.

title: Tomato Pasta Salad
description: Rinse and halve the vine-ripened tomatoes. Blanch the other tomatoes, then peel, quarter, remove the seeds and cut into cubes.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
description: For the tomato sauce, peel onion and garlic and chop finely, then sauté in a pan in hot olive oil until translucent. Stir in tomato paste, add the peeled tomatoes and simmer about 20 minutes. After 10 minutes cooking time, add the meatballs and season with salt, sugar and pepper.

title: Pappardelle with Vegetables and Feta
description: Cook pappardelle in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Grilled Vegetables on Pasta
description: Rinse the oregano, shake dry and pluck the leaves from the stems. Drain the macaroni well. Add the remaining olive oil to the pan and press in the garlic. Sauté 1-2 seconds. Add the macaroni and oregano and mix. Arrange the grilled vegetables on the macaroni and grate the Parmesan on top.

title: Tagliatelle with Baby Artichokes
description: Meanwhile, cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and toss with the artichokes. Arrange on serving plates. Halve the garlic bulbs and serve with the pasta. Crumble the cheese over the pasta to serve.

title: Fettuccine with Squid and Peas
description: Cut basil leaves into strips, fold, and cook briefly, deglaze with wine. Crush tomatoes with tomato juice together with a spoon, add to pan, season with salt and pepper and allow to simmer at low heat for 30 minutes.

title: Tomato Pasta Salad with Dandelion Greens
description: Meanwhile, rinse the dandelion greens, trim any tough stems and pluck the leaves into bite-sized pieces. Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Peel the shallots and chop finely.

title: Tagliatelle
description: Meanwhile rinse and shake dry the parsley and pluck the leaves from the stems. Toast the pine nuts in a dry pan. Peel and coarsely chop the garlic.

title: Cream Cheese and Pasta Bake
description: Remove bell peppers from the oven, cover with a dish towel soaked in cold water and let rest 5 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 200°C (approximately 400°F) Peel bell peppers. Cook pasta in a pot with plenty of boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente.

title: Cucumbers with Salmon and Tagliatelle
description: Heat butter in a pan. Add cucumber slices it and sauté briefly. Remove from pan, add shallots, sprinkle with flour and pour in broth. Stir in cream and yogurt, bring to a boil and cook over low heat. Stir in mustard and sherry. Place the cucumber slices in the sauce and keep warm.

title: Asian-style Macaroni with Vegetables
description: Heat sesame oil in a pan and briefly cook the vegetables in the pan. Season with soy sauce, ginger, salt and sugar. Drain and halve the mushrooms and add to the vegetables.

title: Farfalle with Artichokes and Prosciutto
description: Trim and rinse zucchini and mushrooms. Cut zucchini into thin strips. Cut mushrooms into slices. Peel onion and chop finely.

title: Wholegrain Macaroni with Bacon and Chives
description: Rinse chives and cut into small rings. Mix macaroni with the bacon and onions, sprinkle with chives and serve topped with the ricotta.

title: Ribbon Pasta with Anchovies and Olives
description: Drain anchovies fillets and olives. Heat olive oil in a large skillet and saute the pine nuts and garlic.

title: Individual Vegetable Lasagnas
description: Rinse and trim the spinach. Place the dripping wet spinach in a pot and cook until wilted. Place in a colander and drain. Heat the butter with 1 pinch of nutmeg and swirl the spinach in it. Season with salt.

title: Spinach Pasta Roulade with Mushroom Stuffing
description: Mix into the flour along with 3 eggs, 2 tablespoons oil and a pinch of salt. Knead until smooth and elastic, cover and let rest for 30 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad
description: Rinse the tomatoes and halve. Rinse and finely chop the scallions. Rinse the arugula.

title: Tagliatelle Pasta with Beef Strips and Morel Sauce
description: For the morel sauce, heat olive oil in a pan and saute the shallot, oregano and morels. Pour in the port wine and beef stock, and simmer for 8-10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add the beef fillet strips and leave for 15 minutes.

title: Tagliatelle
description: Rinse and pat dry chicken, cut into fine strips. Mix with marinade and marinate, covered, for about 1 hour in the refrigerator.

title: Pasta Shells with Tuna
description: Heat the olive oil, press in the garlic and add chopped parsley and lemon zest. Sauté briefly and stir in lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Tear tuna into pieces and mix into the sauce.

title: Salmon with Pasta and Lime Hollandaise
description: For the pasta and sauce: Cook pasta according to package instructions in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta Shells with Pumpkin Sauce
description: Heat butter in a pan and saute vegetables for a few minutes. Add broth and simmer, covered, for about 15-20 minutes. Add cream and simmer, uncovered, until sauce becomes creamy.

title: Macaroni with Marinated Mushrooms
description: Season with salt, pepper and sugar. Clean and finely chop mushrooms. Place into marinade and let stand for 15-20 minutes.

title: Tagliatelle with Ratatouille
description: Peel onion and garlic and dice. Heat olive oil in a large non-stick pan. Sauté onion and garlic briefly, then add bell pepper and zucchini and sauté briefly. Add tomatoes and beans, mix everything well and cook 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Squid Ink Pasta
description: Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add chopped eggplant, onion and garlic and sauté briefly. Season with vinegar, salt and pepper.

title: Pesto Pasta
description: Cook the bavette in plenty of boiling salted water (according to package directions) until al dente. Drain and leave to cool. Serve the bavette with the pesto. Serve garnished with basil & grated parmesan.

title: Pasta Salad
description: Rinse the peas and blanch in boiling salt water. Rinse in cold water and drain well. Rinse the peppers, halve and cut into fine strips. Rinse the tomatoes and cut into eighths. Peel and slice the cucumber. Rinse the radishes and cut into matchsticks.

title: Whole Wheat Pasta with Oyster Mushrooms
description: Clean and chop the oyster mushrooms and chop. Peel and dice the onion and garlic. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet. Cook the onion and garlic until golden. Add the oyster mushrooms and cook for 3-5 minutes.

title: Marinated Turkey Breast with Vegetable Tagliatelle
description: Peel shallots and cut into quarters. Season turkey breast with salt. Heat oil in a roasting pan and fry turkey on all sides. Deglaze drippings with orange juice and white wine. Add chicken stock. Cover and cook for 50–60 minutes. Remove turkey breast and keep warm. Strain gravy into a small saucepan. Boil and stir in the cornstarch. Pour in cream and bring to a boil. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Creamy Spinach Soup
description: Rinse chervil, set aside some for garnish and coarsely chop the rest. Add chervil to the pot and puree everything with an immersion blender. Add milk, mix and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Add 100 grams (approximately 3 1/2 ounces) crème fraîche, stir and heat soup, but do not boil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve soup in bowls with a dollop of crème fraîche and garnished with chervil.

title: Baked Cannelloni Stuffed with Cod
description: Dice cod coarsely and puree in a food processor. Whisk egg and creme fraiche. Peel carrot and dice finely. Rinse scallions and chop finely. Pluck off thyme leaves. Combine carrot, scallions, thyme and capers and cod pieces, add creme fraiche mixture and season to taste.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Heat the olive oil in a pan. Add onions and garlic and sauté until golden-brown. Stir in herbs and lemon zest. Stir in carrot, parsley root and tomatoes. Mash tomatoes with a wooden spoon. Simmer sauce until thickened. Season with salt, pepper and sugar.

title: Gnocchi Alla Romana with Tomato Sauce
description: For the tomato sauce: Peel the garlic and onion chop into small cubes. Heat the olive oil in a pot and saute the garlic and onion. Pour the canned tomatoes with the liquid into the pot and crush with a wooden spoon. Bring the sauce to a boil until thickened and smooth. Season with salt, pepper and sugar.

title: Tortellini in Brodo
description: In a second pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Rinse celery greens and cut into very thin strips. Add greens to broth.

title: Tagliatelle with Salmon and Watercress
description: Cook tagliatelle in salted water according to the package instructions until al dente. Peel shallots and chop finely. In a pan, heat olive oil. Add shallots and sauté briefly. Add the salmon cubes and season with salt, pepper and lemon juice. Pour in wine, broth and cream. Cover and simmer for about 5 minutes.

title: Spaghetti with Snow Peas
description: Rinse and cut snow peas into strips. During the last minute of cooking time, pour into the pot with the spaghetti and briefly cook. Drain.

title: Spaghetti with Spicy Spring Vegetables
description: Meanwhile cut chile peppers lengthwise, remove seeds and finely chop. Peel garlic and squeeze through a garlic press. Rinse, shake dry and chop the parsley. Rinse scallions and cut into rings.

title: Lemon Spaghetti with Romano Beans and Radicchio
description: Rinse radicchio, cut into strips and spin dry. Peel and dice onion. Rinse and halve chile pepper, remove seeds and ribs and chop finely. Cook spaghetti in plenty of boiling salted water according to package instructions until al dente.

title: Radish Salad with Glass Noodles
description: Peel radish, trim and slice thinly. Season with a little salt and let stand for about 10 minutes.

title: Pasta Caprese
description: Cook tagliatelle according to package instructions in boiling salted water until al dente. Rinse basil, shake dry and pluck off leaves. Drain tagliatelle well. Add pasta and basil to tomatoes and mix well. Arrange on plates, sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.

title: Pasta Shells
description: Peel onion and garlic, chop onion and slice garlic. Heat olive oil in a nonstick skillet and saute broccoli, onion and garlic briefly. Remove broccoli from the pan and keep warm.

title: Tortellini Gratin
description: Rinse sage, pat dry well and remove leaves. Briefly fry leaves in hot butter. Season with pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Gorgonzola and Mandarin Cream
description: Cut celery into small cubes. Chop pumpkin seeds finely and mix in a bowl with celery. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté celery and pumpkin seeds for 3 minutes. Remove from the pan and keep warm. Drain mandarins and reserve juice. Mix mandarin juice in a bowl with sour cream, curry and crumbled gorgonzola. Add gorgonzola mixture to the pan, stir until smooth over low heat and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Add mandarin oranges and celery mixture to the gorgonzola sauce and heat briefly. Add pasta to the pan, mix briefly and serve on plates.

title: Baked Spinach and Feta Handpies
description: Meanwhile, for the filling: Peel the onion and dice finely. Heat the olive oil in a frying pan and sauté the onions and pine nuts for about 3 minutes, stirring. Add the spinach and stir until the moisture evaporates completely.

title: Lemon Pasta with Vegetables and Mushrooms
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Piccata with Tomatoes, Pasta and Olives
description: Rinse veal cutlets, pat dry and flatten, if necessary. Season with salt and pepper. Whisk eggs with Parmesan in a shallow dish. Coat cutlets with flour, dip cutlets into egg mixture and lightly coat with flour again.

title: Pasta Salad with Tomatoes and Artichokes
description: Combine pasta with arugula, tomatoes and artichokes. Toss salad with the dressing and place into bowls. Sprinkle with parmesan and serve.

title: Chicken Pasta Salad
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain.

title: Sun-dried Tomato and Ricotta Ravioli with Fresh Tomato Sauce
description: For the filling: Drain the sun-dried tomatoes, reserving the oil, mince and then mix with the ricotta and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta Salad with Chicken and Vegetables
description: Meanwhile, bring the broth to a boil. Rinse the chicken breasts and add to the broth. Bring to a boil and then turn off the heat. Let sit for about 15 minutes. Drain on paper towels and cut into strips.

title: Bean Pasta
description: Rinse beans, trim and cut into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2 inch)  long pieces. Cook with savory about 8 minutes in salted boiling water until al dente. Drain.

title: Tagliatelle Pasta with Freshly Ground Truffles
description: Melt the butter in a large frying pan and let it melt. Add the drained pasta with a little of the remaining pasta water. Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.

title: Italian Tortellini in Broth
description: For the filling: Chop the ham very fine. Purée the ricotta through a sieve into a bowl and mix in the ham, Parmesan cheese, and the egg yolk. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Ricotta and Lemon Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve about 1 cup pasta water and drain pasta.

title: Macaroni with Mascarpone, Hazelnuts and Pistachios
description: Cook the macaroni according to package directions until al dente, drain well and toss with the mascarpone sauce.

title: Pasta and Spinach Gratin
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until not quite al dente, and then drain.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
description: Heat the oil in a large nonstick frying pan and sauté the chicken until golden brown on both sides. Add the peppers and celery and sauté briefly. Season with salt and pepper.

description: Sauté the mushrooms in hot butter for 1-2 minutes. Add the leek and the spinach, sauté 1-2 minutes, then remove from the heat. Crumble the feta, stir 1/2 into the mixture and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta Nests with Asparagus and Tomatoes
description: Cook the asparagus in salted water for about 5 minutes, it should still be firm. Rinse the herbs, shake dry and finely chop. Stir in the oil.

description: Rinse, trim and slice the scallions. Rinse the chilies, slit lengthwise, remove the seeds and white ribs and finely chop. Peel the garlic and chop finely. Heat the oil in a skillet and sauté the scallions, chilies and garlic until tender, 2-3 minutes. Deglaze with the wine and add the shredded crabmeat and chives, season with salt and pepper. Add the drained pasta, toss to combine, add a little pasta water if necessary to coat and serve.

title: Baked Spaghetti in Cheese Sauce
description: Rinse the parsley, shake dry, pluck and finely chop.

title: Ricotta Filled Pasta with Meat Sauce
description: For the filling, mix ricotta in a bowl with lemon zest, herbs and 2 tablespoons Parmesan and season with salt and pepper.

title: Baked Bacon and Spinach Ravioli
description: For the filling: Rinse and trim spinach and blanch in salted boiling water. Remove, squeeze out excess moisture and chop finely. Cut bacon into wide strips. Peel shallot peel, dice finely and sauté in the hot butter until translucent. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Add spinach and ground meat, half of the cheese and egg and mix well. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Ground Meat and Tomato Sauce
description: Heat oil in a pan and then fry ground meat in hot until browned and crumbly. Add prepared vegetables and fry together for 2-3 minutes. Add tomatoes and broth and simmer for about 20 minutes until slightly creamy.

title: Pasta with Raisins, Onions and Cauliflower
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Cannelloni with Ricotta and Spinach Filling
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Pastry Wrapped Beef Fillet
description: Rinse fillet and pat dry. Trim meat and rub with salt and pepper. Fry in hot oil over high heat on all sides. Remove from pan and let fillet rest. Meanwhile, brush puff pastry with a little water and roll out into a large rectangle. Stir foie gras spread onto pastry, leaving a 1 cm (approximately 1/3 inch) wide edge free. Spread mushroom mixture on top. Place fillet on the upper third of the pastry and sprinkle with egg yolk. Wrap the pastry around the fillet, firmly pressing the edges. Place the pastry-wrapped fillet with the edge down on a parchment-lined baking tray and brush with egg yolk. Cook in a hot oven at 200°C (approximately 390°F) until golden brown for about 40-50 minutes. Let rest for at least 10 minutes before cutting. Cut and serve.

title: Fish with Rice and Vegetables
description: Rinse vegetables and cut into bite-sized pieces. Add to the steamer and lightly season with salt and pepper, cover.

title: Breakfast with Muesli and Rolls
description: Mix yogurt with lemon juice, honey, and vanilla bean seeds. Season to taste. Divide among bowls and top with muesli and drained, dried fruit. Halve rolls, spread thinly with butter and layer with ham, cheese, and cherry tomatoes. Serve with muesli.

title: Pasta Salad
description: Set the fennel fronds aside. Trim the fennel, rinse, cut in half lengthwise, core then cut into thin wedges. Trim the scallions, rinse and finely chop, keeping the white and green parts separate. Peel the garlic and finely chop.

title: Mixed Meat Tortellini
description: For the filling: Peel and mince onion and garlic. Heat oil in a pan and cook onion and garlic. Add egg and meat. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Cooking Al Dente Spaghetti
description: Add the spaghetti, and cook a few minutes until al dente stirring occasionally. Check the spaghetti from time to time, to make sure it doesn't overcook. Drain in a colander, then use in a recipe of your choice.

title: Spinach and Ricotta Ravioli
description: Roll out pasta dough into two thin sheets (or create thin sheets of dough with a pasta machine). On one sheet, about 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) apart, place about 1 teaspoon of spinach filling. Brush around the filling lightly with beaten egg. Place other sheet of dough over the filling and gently press around filling with your fingers.

description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and add with parsley to mussels and clams. Season to taste and arrange on warmed plates. Serve.

title: Tortellini Gratin
description: For the filling: Cut the ham finely. Mix with the ricotta, Parmesan and egg yolk and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Mussels
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente and drain. Add pasta and parsley to mussels and mix well. Arrange on warmed plates and serve.

title: Meat Stew with Vegetables and Noodles
description: Peel the onion and garlic then finely chop. Crush the chile pepper. Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water then peel, scrape out seeds and cut the flesh into small pieces. Rinse the celery and thinly slice. Peel the carrot and coarsely grate. Heat the oil in a large saucepan and sauté the vegetables over low heat for 5-10 minutes, stirring. Deglaze with a little beef broth (about 100 ml) (approximately 1/2 cup).

title: Green Pasta with Pumpkin and Prosciutto
description: Remove seeds and strings from pumpkin. With a vegetable peeler, shave pumpkin into thin strips. Peel some of the pumpkin shell and cut into very thin strips (or "zest"). Set aside. Peel and finely chop garlic. In a pan, sauté garlic in 2 tablespoons hot olive oil until translucent. Add pumpkin strips and cook until translucent, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Drain pasta and mix with pumpkin sauce until coated. Fold in pine nuts and Parmesan. Divide pasta among plates, top with prosciutto and drizzle with remaining olive oil. Serve garnished with pumpkin "zest" and basil.

title: Chestnut Pappardelle with Walnut Sauce
description: Meanwhile, put the ricotta, cream, half of the walnuts, salt, pepper, nutmeg and parmesan into a blender and puree.

title: Penne Pasta with Wild Mushrooms
description: Cook the penne in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain thoroughly, then arrange on plates. Top the penne with the sauce and serve.
