title: Mushroom Ravioli
description: For the filling, peel the shallot and chop finely. Clean the mushrooms and dice into very small cubes. Sauté the shallots in the hot butter until translucent. Add the mushrooms and saute until the remaining liquid evaporates. Remove from the heat and mix into a bowl with the egg yolks, thyme, parmesan and breadcrumbs. Season with salt and pepper and let cool.

title: Beet Pasta with Onions, Raisins and Walnuts
description: Place the flour in a bowl and season with salt. Add the eggs and 1 tablespoon oil and knead into a smooth, pliable dough. Add the beet puree and knead to combine. If it's too dry, add a little of the cooking liquid, if it's too wet, add some flour. Shape the dough into a ball, wrap in plastic wrap and let rest about 30 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Penne Pasta
description: Cook the penne in salted water until al dente. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain.

title: Salmon Cannelloni with Tomato and Mozzarella
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Rinse the salmon, pat dry and chop very small.

title: Pasta with Herbed Ricotta Sauce
description: Rinse herbs, shake dry and finely chop or crush in a food processor. Peel garlic and fry in a pan with hot oil. Reduce heat, add herbs and ricotta and mix well. Stir in sesame seeds and season with salt and pepper.

Drain the spaghetti, then add to the pan with the shrimp and toss to combine. Arrange the spaghetti on plates, garnish with the dill, and serve.

title: Seafood Pasta
description: Add seafood to the sauce and simmer, covered, for about 6 minutes on low heat (discard any unopened shells). Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and place into seafood pan, toss well and sprinkle with parsley. Serve.

title: Seafood Noodles
description: Cook pasta in a pot of salted water until al dente.

title: Pea Soup with Ravioli
description: Prepare the ravioli according to the package.

title: Pappardelle with Tomato Sauce
description: Peel and finely dice the onion and garlic. Rinse and quarter the tomatoes. Remove the seeds and finely dice. Rinse and halve the chili. Trim the chili and finely dice. Heat the oil in a pan, and sauté the onion, garlic, and the chili. Add the white wine and the tomatoes. and simmer for 5 minutes until thickened. Season to taste with salt.

title: Bell Pepper Ragout with Pasta
description: Pour the oil into a large, hot pot and sauté the onions until translucent. Add the meat and cook everything together until light brown. Stir in tomato paste, sauté briefly, then add tomatoes and enough broth that everything is well covered. Cook for about 2.5 hours, at medium high heat, stirring occasionally. If necessary add some more broth.

title: Seafood Pasta

title: Shrimp Pasta Salad

Immediately sprinkle with 1-2 tablespoons of lemon juice. Drain the pasta. In a bowl, toss the tomatoes with the spring onions and chives. Whisk the oil, vinegar, remaining lemon juice, salt, pepper, sugar, and lemon zest together. Toss with the vegetables. transfer to a deep serving plate and cover with prawns and avocado.

title: Fresh Tomato and Mozzarella Lasagna
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain, rinse under cold water and spread on a dish towel.

title: Herb Ravioli
description: For the filling: Rinse the herbs, shake dry and pluck. Set some aside for garnish as desired. Blanch the rest in salted water. Drain and finely chop. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Saute the onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon of butter and let cool. Mix with the herbs and parmesan. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.

title: Pork and Pepper Sauce

title: Pasta Salad with Olives, Feta Cheese and Tomatoes

title: Penne with Spicy Tomato Sauce
description: Cook the penne in boiling salted water according to the package directions until al dente. Drain the penne, add to the sauce, and mix until combined. Garnish with the basil and serve.

title: Tuna and Spinach Pasta
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato and Olives
description: Mix in the olive paste and breadcrumbs, then simmer an additional 5 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water according to the package directions until al dente. Drain the pasta, and divide on plates. Top with the tomato sauce, garnish with basil and parmesan cheese, and serve.

title: Pasta with Shrimp
description: Season shrimp with salt, pepper, and olive oil and fry for about 3 minutes on each side. Peel and press the garlic into the pan. Stir and sauteé for a few minutes. Remove all from the pan and keep warm.

title: Spaghetti with Tomatoes
description: Heat the olive oil in a pan. Sauté the bacon, garlic, and parsley, stirring constantly. Drain the spaghetti, reserving 1/8 l (approximately 4 ounces) of the cooking water. title: Spaghetti with Arugula
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Asparagus and Salmon
description: Heat the butter in a pan. Briefly sauté the vegetables, pour in the broth and cook the vegetables, covered, over medium heat 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Season with salt and pepper.

description: Oil a baking dish.

title: Ravioli with Broad Beans
description: For the filling: Stir the ricotta until smooth. Stir in the pecorino and the egg yolk and season with salt, pepper and red pepper flakes.

title: Pasta with Goat Cheese and Basil
description: Rinse basil, shake dry and pluck leaves from stems. Set some leaves aside for garnish. Toast pine nuts in a dry skillet until golden brown. Peel garlic.

title: Garganelli with Sausage and Tomato
description: Remove the sausage from the casings, and coarsely chop if necessary. Peel and finely dice the onion and garlic. Rinse the tomatoes, and cut into halves or quarters.

title: Orzo Pesto Salad
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.
types: ['Chicken', 'Healthy Eating', 'European', 'Mediterranean', 'Spring', 'Summer Salad', 'cooking for one', 'Poultry', 'leafy green vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Grain', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'salad', 'Light Salad', 'Pasta Salad', 'Classic Sauce', 'Pesto', 'Basil pesto', 'Pesto with pine nuts', 'Lunch', 'Side Dish', 'Rice Side Dish', 'hearty side dish']

title: Pumpkin Lasagna
description: For the béchamel sauce: Melt butter in a small saucepan. Stir in the flour and after stirring well, incorporate the milk. Let simmer for several minutes until creamy and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Crispy Jerusalem Artichoke Ravioli
description: For the filling, rinse the Jerusalem artichokes, peel and cut into about 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) pieces. Simmer in vegetable broth until tender, about 20 minutes then puree. Transfer the Jerusalem artichoke puree to a bowl and let cool 10 minutes. Grate the Gruyere. Mix the Gruyere, breadcrumbs and egg yolk with the puree. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Vegetable Stew with Chicken and Pasta
description: Rinse the chicken breasts, pat dry, cut into bite-sized pieces and fry until golden brown in a pan in hot oil. Remove the chicken breast pieces from the pan and keep warm.

title: Tortellini with Spicy Ricotta
description: For the dough: Soak saffron in 80 ml (approximately 3 ounces) of water. Mix the saffron water with flour, eggs, olive oil and 1 teaspoon of salt in a bowl. Knead into a smooth dough and roll into a ball. Wrap in a kitchen towel and let rest for 30 minutes at room temperature. Using a pasta machine or rolling pin on a floured surface, roll out dough as thin as possible. Cut out 6 cm (approximately 2.5 inch) rounds using the rim of a glass. Place a small amount of the filling in each round, then fold in half to make crescents and press the edges to seal. Holding pasta at both pointed ends, gently pull lengthwise and then fold ends over each other, pinching together to seal. Let rest on a floured kitchen towel for 1-2 hours.

title: Pasta with Pesto, Potatoes and Beans
description: Peel the potatoes and dice finely. Rinse beans, trim, cut ends and break into pieces. Boil the potatoes and beans in boiling salted water for about 7 minutes. Cook the trenette pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Goat Cheese Wontons with Eggplant and Tomatoes
description: Cook in a pot of boiling salt water for about 6 minutes.

title: Pasta with Spicy Tomato Sauce
description: Cook pasta according to package directions in a pot with plenty of salted water until al dente. Season the tomato sauce with salt, pepper and sugar. Add chile peppers. Drain pasta and mix with the sauce. Then transfer to plates and serve garnished with grated pecorino.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F).

title: Pasta with Broccoli
description: Rinse and cut the broccoli into florets. Blanch the broccoli in salt water, rinse and drain well.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
description: Cook the macaroni in boiling salted water untl al dente. Remove from the water and drain thoroughly. Cut the ham into strips or cubes. Whisk the eggs with the cream, crème fraîche, and half of the cheese. Season the mixture to taste with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Lamb Stew with Pasta
description: Heat olive oil in a pan and brown the lamb pieces in it while stirring vigorously. Add the onions, garlic and the tomato paste, and fry for 2 minutes. Pour the red wine and allow to simmer. Pour a little beef broth and the pureed tomatoes. Add the rosemary and the bay leaf and simmer gently for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally. If necessary, add extra beef broth.

title: Asian Soup with Noodles and Beef
description: Rinse and trim the scallions and cut into thin rings. Rinse the chile, cut in half, remove the seeds and ribs, and dice finely. Rinse the herbs, shake dry and remove the leaves. Cut the meat into thin slices. Cook the pasta according to package directions and drain.

title: Pasta Salad with Tomatoes, Ham and Olives
description: Rinse the basil, shake dry, pluck the leaves and cut into fine strips. Stir the mayonnaise with yogurt and lemon juice until smooth in a bowl. Press the peeled garlic into the bowl, mix well and season with salt and pepper. Combine all salad ingredients with the dressing in a large bowl, mix together, season to taste and serve.

title: Mache Salad
description: To make the croutons, cut bread slices into small cubes. In a pan, fry breadcrumbs in melted butter until golden-brown. Just before serving, toss together lettuce, mushrooms and scallions with salad dressing. Sprinkle with croutons.

title: Penne with Salmon in Tomato-dill Sauce
description: Cook penne in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Penne with Tomato Sauce and Meat Patties
description: For the meat patties, drain the olives and chop finely. Rinse scallions, trim and chop very finely. Add the olives and scallions to a bowl with with ground meat and egg. Season with salt, pepper. lemon zest and oregano. Knead into a smooth meat batter, adding breadcrumbs as needed. Shape into 8 patties.

title: Farfalle with Cucumber and Yogurt
description: Halve the cucumber, remove the seeds, and cut into thin 5 cm (approximately 2 inch) long strips. Heat the butter in a pan, and sauté the cucumber for 5 minutes.

title: Pasta with Creamy Salmon Sauce
description: Rinse salmon, pat dry, chop, sprinkle with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Heat fish stock in a saucepan. Dissolve saffron in 1 tablespoon hot water, add to the saucepan and mix. Add lemon zest, heavy cream and dill to the saucepan, stir and season with salt and pepper. Simmer over low heat until broth thickens. Remove pot from heat, add fish pieces, cover and let rest for 4 minutes. Cook pasta according to package directions in a pot with plenty of salted water and drain.Arrange pasta on plates, Drain spinach and mingle with pasta on plates. Cover with salmon sauce and serve garnished with remaining dill.

title: Pappardelle with Arugula and Tomatoes
description: Rinse, trim, and dry the arugula. Add to the pasta water 1 minute before the pasta is done cooking.

title: Spaghetti with Pepper Sauce
description: Cook peppers and onions in hot olive oil 3-4 minutes. Add red wine vinegar and tomatoes with the juice. Chop tomatoes coarsely and season strongly with vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper. Simmer for about 7 minutes. Mix in the capers.

title: Artichoke Pasta
description: Cook artichokes in boiling salted water with lemon juice for about 30 minutes. Drain.

title: Farfalle Pasta Salad
description: To make dressing: Whisk together oil and vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Peel garlic and press through a garlic press into the dressing. Rinse herbs, shake dry and set aside a few basil leaves as garnish. Coarsely chop remaining basil and parsley and mix into dressing. Peel salami and cut into thin strips. Peel and coarsely grate carrot. Rinse and halve cucumber and scrape seeds out with a spoon. Finely chop cucumber. Wipe mushrooms clean with a paper towel and thinly slice. Mix pasta with vegetables, salami and dressing and let stand several hours to develop flavor. Garnish pasta with remaining basil leaves.

title: Tagliatelle with Turkey Breast and Mushrooms
description: Trim oyster mushrooms, remove stems and cut into strips. Core the chile peppers and cut into rings. Cut turkey into bite-sized pieces and sauté in hot butter for 3 minutes over high heat. Add oyster mushrooms and cook for another 3 minutes. Add tagliatelle, tomatoes and chile peppers and cook until heated through. Season with salt and pepper. Chop the herbs. Toss the pasta with the herbs before serving.

title: Pasta with Ricotta Zucchini Sauce
description: Heat oil and butter in a pan. Peel onion and garlic, dice, add to the pan, sauté while stirring for about 2 minutes. Add zucchini and fry for about 5 minutes and season with salt and pepper. Add lemon zest, mix, cover and set aside.

title: Spinach Ricotta Tortellini
description: For the filling, thaw spinach and chop finely. Drain ricotta through a sieve, mix in a bowl with spinach, Parmesan and egg yolk and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Artichoke Hearts
description: Rinse the zucchini and cut into thin sticks. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop small. Peel garlic and shallots and dice. Cook the tagliatelle in artichoke water until al dente, drain (save a little pasta water) and keep warm in the oven (70°C, approximately 160°F).
types: ['Pasta', 'European', 'Italian', 'Spring', 'What to Cook Today?', 'Easy', 'Simple vegetarian', 'Home Cooking', 'Vegetable', 'Sprout', 'Pasta', 'Classic Sauce', 'Herb Sauce', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Oranges Noodles
description: Peel 2 of the oranges with a sharp knife, remove all of the pith, cut in half lengthwise and cut into half-slices, season with plenty of pepper and mix with the olive oil.

title: Pappardelle with Vegetable Pesto Sauce
description: Cook pasta in a pot of boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente, add vegetables to the pot 3 minutes before the end of the cooking time, mix and continue cooking. Drain and arrange on plates. Cover with pesto (directions below) and serve garnished with walnuts.

title: Tortellini and Ham Gratin with Mushrooms
description: Cook the tortellini in a pot of boiling salted water until they float to the surface.

title: Salmon Pasta Rolls
description: Chop salmon and process in a blender or food processor with ice cube, 1 egg white and shrimp. Then place salmon mixture in a bowl, add cream, mix until a spreadable mixture is created and season with salt and pepper.

title: Penne with Tomato and Olives
description: Cook the penne in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Meat Sauce
description: Cook pasta in a pot with plenty of salted water until al dente, drain well and add to the pan. Mix with the sauce and serve garnished with parsley.

title: Autumn Salad
description: Rinse the oranges under hot water and pat dry. Peel the skin from one orange, remove the pith and cut out the segments with a sharp knife. Grate the zest, cut in half and squeeze the juice from the other orange. Cut the beetroot into bite size pieces.

title: Pasta with Broccoli and Sesame Sauce
description: Cook tagliatelle in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Asparagus
description: Cook pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain.

title: Pasta with Meatballs and Cream Sauce
description: Boil the broth in a pot, add meatballs and cook about 10 minutes until done on low heat; do not allow to boil.

title: Pasta with Tuna
description: Rinse beans, trim and cut into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2 inch) long pieces. Cook in a pot of boiling salted water for about 8 minutes until al dente. Cook pasta in a pot of salted water until al dente.

title: Macaroni and Ground Beef Casserole
description: Rinse tomatoes and cut half in 5 mm (approximately 2 inches) thick slices; chop the rest.

title: Pasta with Vegetables
description: Peel onion, finely dice and sauté briefly in olive oil. Add the vegetables, pour in broth and simmer for 7 minutes. Add the thawed peas and cook another 3-4 minutes. Season with oregano, salt and pepper.

title: Linguine with Vegetables
description: Bring 1 liter (approximately 4 1/2 cups) of water to a boil in a pot with vinegar and salt to taste. Add linguine, zucchini, carrot, parsnip and leek and cook until al dente, 6-8 minutes. Drain in a colander drain, season with salt and pepper and mix in tomatoes, paprika and butter. Divide among plates, sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Mix the egg yolks and cream in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper, and whisk until combined. Finely dice the bacon. Peel and finely dice the onion and garlic. Heat the olive oil in a pan and sauté the bacon. Add the onions and garlic, sauté briefly, then mix in the drained spaghetti. Remove the pan from the heat, mix in the egg-cream mixture, and toss to combine.

title: Broccoli and Tomatoes with Spaghetti
description: Drain corn.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta Casserole
description: Mix eggs in a bowl with cream, Parmesan, vegetables, mushrooms and pasta and season with salt and pepper. Place pasta mixture in a buttered casserole dish and cover with small pieces of butter.

title: Stuffed Turkey Rolls and Orecchiette
description: Spread the filling on the turkey cutlets, roll tightly and wrap each with 2 slices of bacon. Tie with kitchen twine.

title: Spinach and Cheese Lasagna
description: For the filling, cut mozzarella cheese into cubes. Rinse mushrooms, clean and slice. Rinse spinach thoroughly and drain. Bring 500 mL (approximately 17 ounces) of water to a boil in a large pot. Add spinach and stir. Bring to a boil, drain and squeeze spinach. Chop spinach coarsely and mix with ricotta, mozzarella, mushrooms, crushed garlic and herbs. Season with lemon juice, broth grains, salt and pepper. Stir in cream.

title: Spinach and Salmon Lasagne
description: Add wet spinach and cook 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'baked dish', 'Fish', 'saltwater\xa0Fish', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Lasagne', 'Spinach Lasagne', 'Pasta with spinach']

title: Spaghetti with Carrots and Capers
description: Peel and julienne the carrots. Peel and finely dice the onion. Cut the lemon into slices.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water. Remove the tomatoes, rinse with cold water, and peel. Cut into quarters, remove the core, and chop. Remove the basil leaves from the stems. Set some aside for garnish, and finely chop the rest. Add the tomatoes to a pot, and pour in the vegetable broth. Season to taste with salt and pepper, then simmer for 10 minutes. Mix the spaghetti into the tomato sauce. Arrange the spaghetti on plates, garnish with freshly grated parmesan and the reserved basil, and serve.

title: Pasta Salad with Bell Peppers and Mozzarella
description: Allow to marinate for ½ hour in the refrigerator and garnish with basil leaves before serving.

title: Ricotta and Spinach Tortellini
description: Cut out squares or circles abour 4-5 cm (approximately 2 inch) wide. Place filling into the center of each square or circle, fold dough into triangles or crescents. Press together firmly at the edges. Wrap each pastry around a finger and press the ends firmly to make rings.

title: Lettuce and Tomato Lasagna
description: Heat butter in a pot until foaming, add flour and  milk, stirring. Simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 10 minutes or until creamy. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg, remove from heat.

title: Monkfish Wrapped in Ham with Pasta
description: Halve proscuitto slices and cut fish into serving pieces. Lay ham on the flat surface and sprinkle with tomato mixture. Place fish on top and wrap tightly.

title: Pasta in Coconut Sauce with Shrimp Skewers
description: Rinse the shrimp, pat dry and stick on 8 wooden skewers.

title: Date Mousse
description: For the second layer: Soak the gelatin in cold water. Warm the date juice in a saucepan, squeeze out the excess water from the gelatin, add to the warm juice and stir until melted. Pour over the first layer and chill for another 2 hours in the refrigerator.

title: Salmon with Pasta and Lime Sauce
description: Whisk cream with lime juice and zest, season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and reduce heat, simmer for about 2-3 minutes on low heat. Heat butter in a pan and cook salmon for about 2 minutes per side. Drain pasta (collect some cooking water). Toss pasta with cream sauce, add 2-3 tablespoons of cooking water, if desired. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange pasta on plates and top with salmon, sprinkle with lime zest and garnish with mint leaves, serve immediately.

title: Spinach and Garlic Raviioli
description: For the filling: Rinse spinach and blanch for 2-3 minutes. Shock in cold water and drain. Mince and place in a bowl. Peel and mince onion and garlic. Heat butter in a pan and cook onion and garlic until soft, about 2-3 minutes. Add spinach, pot and egg. Season with salt and pepper.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Dough', 'Dumpling', 'European', 'Italian', 'Mediterranean', 'Austrian', 'Winter cabin', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Autumn Wild Boar Roast
description: For the wild boar: Rinse wild boar and pat dry. Crush peppercorns and juniper berries with a mortar and rub onto boar.

title: Salmon-wrapped Monkfish with Pasta
description: Rinse and peel the vegetables. Cut the carrots and celery into long, thin strips. Halve zucchini lengthwise, scrape out the seeds, then cut one half lengthwise into 8 narrow strips and cut the other half crosswise into thin half-slices.

title: Pasta with Walnut Cheese Sauce
description: Heat oil in a pan and toast walnuts for a few minutes. Peel garlic and squeeze through a garlic press. Add to walnuts and saute for a few seconds. Add white wine, broth and cream, whisk well. Cut cheese coarsely and add to the sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Rinse arugula and cut into fine strips. Drain pasta and place into sauce pan, toss well. Add arugula and mix well. Arrange on four plates and sprinkle with grated Parmesan. Serve.

title: Pasta Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse and halve the radishes. Rinse, shake dry and pluck the watercress. Drain the tuna and cut into large pieces.

title: Pasta Bean Casserole
description: For the casserole: cook pasta according to package instructions in plenty of salted boiling water, drain about 4 minutes before the end of cooking. Butter large baking dish (about 30 x 15cm) (approximately 12 x 6 inches).

title: Tagliolini with Endive and Bacon
description: Rinse and trim the endive. Remove the outer leaves and the stalk and cut into 1 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) wide strips. Finely dice the bacon. Heat the olive oil in a pan, and sauté the bacon, chili, and garlic for 1-2 minutes.

title: Pasta with Salmon
description: Meanwhile, peel shallots for the sauce and finely dice. Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a pan and sauté shallots until translucent. Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon flour, stir and add wine. Add fish stock, let boil and gradually stir in cream. Simmer for about 5 minutes until slightly creamy.

title: Tagliatelle with Brussels Sprouts and Bacon
description: Heat the oil in a skillet and saute the shallots and garlic until translucent. Add the rosemary and the Brussels sprouts leaves and cook, stirring for about 2 minutes, season with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta and toss briefly in the pan with the shallot mixture. Divide the pasta among bowls, sprinkle the bacon over and grate the Parmesan for serving. Toast the seeds in a dry skillet, sprinkle over the pasta and serve.

title: Ravioli with Pumpkin Filling
description: For the pasta dough, pile the flour onto a clean work surface and make a well in the center. Pour in the eggs, oil and salt.

title: Chicken Noodle Stir-fry
description: Cook the penne in plenty of boiling, salted water until al dente. Heat the oil in a pan and sauté the shallots and garlic until translucent. Add the chicken and brown on all sides for 2-3 minutes. Mix the Tahin ipaste with the remaining soy sauce and broth and add to the pan slowly. Drain the beans drain and add to the pan. Season with salt, pepper and lemon juice. Serve in bowls over the drained pasta.

title: Spaghetti with Chicken Breast and Vegetables
description: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot with salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta Roll Stuffed with Ham and Ricotta
description: For the filling: Preheat the broiler. Rinse the peppers, halve lengthwise, remove the seeds and white ribs and quarter. Place the peppers skin side up on a broiler pan and broil until the skin chars and blisters, about 10 minutes. Then remove to a plate, cover with a damp tea towel and let cool. Remove the skin. Drain the tomatoes. Stir the ricotta until smooth. Peel the shallot and chop finely. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet and saute the shallot until translucent. Cool to room temperature and stir into the ricotta. Season with salt, pepper and lemon juice.

title: Linguine Pasta in Cheese Sauce with Walnuts
description: For the sauce, peel the shallot and garlic, and finely dice both. Saute the shallot and garlic in a pan in oil until translucent over medium heat. Pour in the white wine and stir in the mozzarella cheese gradually. Mix the vegetable broth and cream together in a bowl. While stirring, pour in the broth-cream mixture and simmer for 5-10 minutes until creamy.

title: Pasta with Ham and Zucchini
description: Cut ham into about 1.5 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) pieces.

title: Baked Meatloaf with Lasagna Noodles and Tomato Sauce
description: Cook shallot and garlic in a little oil until translucent.

title: Macaroni with Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse and thinly slice the celery.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetable Sauce
description: Sweat the shallots with the crushed garlic until translucent. Add all the vegetables and sauté for about 3 minutes. Stir in the tomato paste, season with salt and pepper and simmer for about 15 minutes. Finally, stir in the herbs.

title: Minestrone
description: Cube the bacon and fry in oil. Peel and finely chop the onions. Peel, rinse and finely dice the potatoes. Add the carrots, celery, celery root and bacon. Saute while stirring. Pour in 1 liter (approximately 4.5 cups) and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse, peel and slice carrots. Rinse broccoli and divide into florets. Blanch carrots in boiling salted water for about 8 minutes. Blanch broccoli in boiling salted water for about 5 minutes. Rinse with cold water and drain well. Rinse tomatoes and cut into quarters. Rinse scallions, trim ends and cut into small rings. Mix vegetables with pasta. Divide lettuce into leaves, rinse and spin dry. Line a large bowl with lettuce leaves. Whisk vinegar, oil, mustard, salt and pepper together to create marinade. Drizzle over salad and mix well. Serve pasta salad on lettuce leaves.

title: Pappardelle with Mushrooms and Basil
description: Sweat the shallots in butter. Press the garlic and add to the shallots. Add the mushrooms, and cook for about 4 minutes. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice.

title: Pasta with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: Peel shallots and chop, crush garlic cloves and sauté both in olive oil. Add tomato paste and cook for 3-4 minutes. Rinse herbs.

title: Tomato Spaghetti with Meatballs and Broccoli
description: Form little balls with the tartare and egg mixture and fry in oil. Cook spaghetti until al dente in boiling salted water. Remove some broccoli florets from the broth and puree the rest.

title: Rigatoni with Green Pesto and Bell Pepper
description: Rinse bell pepper, trim, cut in half, remove seeds, remove ribs and cut into strips. Cook the rigatoni in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. After cooking rigatoni for 5 minutes, add the bell pepper strips and continue to cook. Remove about 4 tablespoons pasta cooking water and stir into the pesto, then drain rigatoni with pepper strips. Place rigatoni and bell pepper strips on plates, spread some pesto on top and serve garnished with a little pecorino.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetable Sauce
description: Blanch tomatoes in hot water, rinse with cold water, peel, quarter and remove the seeds. Finely chop tomatoes and finely dice zucchini. Add to garlic and onion and simmer for 15 minutes over low heat. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Baked Macaroni with Potatoes, Cheese and Apple Compote
description: Mix cream with the grated Emmentaler and Gruyère and pour mixture over the baking dish. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes. Peel the onions and cut into thin slices. Heat the clarified butter in a frying pan and fry the onions until golden brown.

title: Vegetable Pasta Gratin
description: Grease the baking dish with butter. Alternately layer the vegetables and pasta in the baking dish, ending with the zucchini slices. Pour the egg-cream mixture over the gratin and sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for about 30 minutes at 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Pappardelle with Salmon
description: Cook pappardelle in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, drain and serve with the salmon sauce.

title: Spaghetti with Tuna and Tomatoes
description: Break tuna into pieces using 2 forks. Peel and chop onion and garlic. Rinse parsley and chop finely.

title: Stuffed Cannelloni with Tomato Sauce
description: Drizzle with remaining oil and bake for 30 minutes in a preheated 200°C (approximately 400°F). Serve immediately.

title: Pasta with Eggplant and Basil Sauce
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, drain and toss with eggplant sauce. Sprinkle with freshly grated Parmesan and serve.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Vegetables
description: Lightly salt chicken breasts, season with pepper and cook in a pan with hot butter for about 10 minutes. Keep warm.

title: Beef Roulades with Mushrooms
description: Pluck thyme leaves from stems.

title: Tagliatelle with Roasted Chicken and Chervil Cream Sauce
description: Meanwhile, cook the tagliatelle in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Lasagna with Spinach
description: For the filling: Blanch tomatoes, remove from pot, peel, remove seeds and cut tomatoes into small cubes. Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
types: ['Lasagne', 'Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'baked dish', 'Meat', 'Vegetable', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Spinach Lasagne', 'Pasta with spinach']

title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
description: Rinse cherry tomatoes, core if necessary and cut into pieces. Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, remove ribs and seeds and cut into pieces. Chop olives. Toast pine nuts in a frying pan until browned.

title: Pasta with Meatballs
description: Cook pasta in plenty of salted water al dente. Heat butter in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides.

title: Baked Cod with Vegetables and Pasta
description: For the fish, rinse the cod fillet and pat dry. Cut into portions, season with salt and pepper and drizzle with lemon juice.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Add clams  to a pot with wine and half of the carrot, cover and cook over low heat until the shells have opened, about 8 minutes. Peel onion and garlic and chop finely. Remove clams from the broth and keep warm. Discard closed shells.

title: Baked Macaroni and Ground Meat Casserole
description: To make bechamel: In a saucepan, melt 40g (approximately 1 1/2 oz) butter. Add flour and sauté. Gradually pour in milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook until thickened, about 10 minutes. Stir in half the cheese. Let cool.

title: Pasta Primavera
description: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and blanch cauliflower for 8 minutes. Remove, rinse in cold water and drain. Blanch snow peas, carrots and zucchini strips for 5 minutes, remove, rinse in cold water and drain well. Cook pappardelle according to package directions.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Remove the leaves from the herbs and add to the sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover the pan and simmer for 30 minutes over low heat.

title: Penne Pasta Salad
description: Cut ham into strips. Mix cream curds with cucumber water and ketchup. Stir, season with salt and pepper to taste and pour over pasta and salad ingredients. Cut eggs into eighths and fold in.

title: Tuna Pasta
description: Cut green olives in half, remove pits and cut into strips. Drain capers. Add capers and olives to the pan, mix and season with salt and pepper. Simmer over low heat for 10 minutes.

title: Smoked Pork Ravioli
description: For the filling: Trim, rinse and slice leek. Heat butter in a pan and sauté leek. Remove pork from bone and process through a meat grinder with pistachios and leeks. Season with salt, pepper and thyme, to taste, then stir in egg yolk.

title: Pasta with Cinnamon and Creme Fraiche
description: Drain penne and toss with grated Parmesan cheese and creme fraiche. Season with cinnamon, salt, and pepper. Fold in half of the chervil. Serve pasta sprinkled with remaining chervil and Parmesan.

title: Pasta with Creamy Mushroom Sauce
description: Wipe the mushrooms and cut into slices. Peel and finely chop the onion.

title: Tortellini Vegetable Soup
description: Peel celery and cut into 1 inch long pieces. Heat broth in a pot, add tortellini and cook for 16 minutes. 10 minutes before the end of cooking, add vegetables and seasonwith salt and pepper. Serve garnished with dill sprigs.

title: Pasta with Clams and Pumpkin
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Meatball Macaroni Casserole
description: Scald the tomatoes, rinse, peel, quarter, core and dice finely. Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop. Sauté together in a hot pot glazed in 1 tablespoon oil. Add the tomato and oregano, mix and simmer for a few minutes until creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste, take from the heat and stir in the meatballs.

title: Pumpkin-stuffed Noodles
description: For the filling: boil salt water. Cube the pumpkin and cook in the boiling water for about 15 minutes, or until very soft. Drain and place the pumpkin back in the dry pot. Keep the pumpkin heated on low heat for another 5 minutes, or until the pieces are nice and dry, then leave to cool. Peel and coarsely chop the onion. Coarsely chop the parmesan and mix with onion and almonds. Finely crush the pumpkin. Mix the onion mixture with the mustard and beaten egg, and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste, as spicy as desired.

title: Lamb Rolls with Peanuts and Pesto
description: Cut lamb shoulder into 4 equal slices. Season with salt and pepper and cover with remaining garlic. Roll up and secure with toothpicks.

title: Pork Skewers with Carrot Salad
description: The next day, rinse the cilantro, shake dry and chop the leaves. Peel the carrots, cut into thin strips and blanch for about 2 minutes in boiling salted water. Quench in ice water and let drain well.

title: Sole Fillets with Tagliatelle and Cherry Tomatoes
description: If you can't get a fillet of sole, another fish will do it - try the low-fat cod or the high-fat salmon.

title: Tagliatelle with Asparagus and Cream Sauce
description: Rinse the lemon in hot water and pat dry. Finely grate the zest, and squeeze the juice from the lemon. Peel and finely dice the shallot and garlic.

title: Eggplant and Pepper Lasagna
description: Rinse the peppers, cut in half, remove the stems, seeds and pith and place, skin-side up, on an oiled baking sheet. Brush with oil and broil for about 10 minutes, until the skin blisters. Remove from the oven and let cool, covered with a damp tea towel.

title: Linguine Puttanesca
description: Rinse tomatoes, cut into quarters, remove core and dice into small pieces. Peel garlic and finely chop with dry anchovy, drained capers and chile pepper. Heat oil in a pan and saute garlic mixture briefly. Deglaze the pan with wine and simmer 1-2 minutes. Drain olives and chop coarsely. Add tomatoes, olives and basil to the pan, mix and season with salt and pepper. Add drained pasta to the pan, mix and serve arranged on plates.

title: Spaghetti with Beets and Bacon
description: Cut the bacon into quarters. Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water according to the package directions until al dente. Remove from the water and drain well.

title: Ostrich Steaks
description: Rinse steaks, pat dry and tie with kitchen twine. Season with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a pan and sear steaks on both sides. Remove from pan.

title: Pasta with Squid, Zucchini and Pepperoncini
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta Salad with Beef Strips
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Rinse and halve figs, slice thinly. Drain tomatoes, collecting 4 tablespoons of oil. Rinse arugula and parsley, shake dry and remove tough stems. Whisk tomato oil with almonds, Parmesan and vinegar. Slice meat thinly.

title: Pasta with Beef Mushroom Sauce
description: Cook pasta in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce and Parmesan
description: If you're vegan, simpy replace the parmesan with dairy-free cheese.

title: Seafood Pasta Salad
description: Rinse and clean the mussels thoroughly. Boil the wine and pour in the mussels. Cover and cook until the mussels have opened, 6-8 minutes. Then allow to cool and pull the mussels from shells or leave whole, as desired.

title: Parmesan Pasta with Chicken
description: Heat grill pan and grill chicken fillets for about 2-3 minutes per side. Heat butter and olive oil in a large nonstick pan and saute pasta for about 3 minutes, stirring. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Open Lasagna with Leeks and Mushrooms
description: Clean the mushrooms, cut into slices and cook lightly in hot oil in a pan 2-4 minutes. Trim the leeks, rinse and cut into rings. Blanch in salted water for about 3 minutes to plenty of bite, drain, rinse and drain well. Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, drain, rinse and drain well.

title: Pasta Salad with Gorgonzola and Eggplant
description: Just before serving, mix the remaining vinegar and remaining olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Dice the cheese, and mix with the eggplant and the pappardelle. Mix the dressing into the pasta mixture, garnish with the parsley, and serve.

title: Stir-Fried Hoisin Duck Breast with Noodles and Vegetables
description: Rinse the duck, pat dry, remove the skin and cut into fine strips. Cut the duck into slices and mix with the hoisin sauce. Rinse the cabbage and cut into strips. Rinse the sprouts and drain. Peel the skin and white pith from the oranges, quarter lengthwise and cut into slices.

title: Potato Ravioli with Vegetable Broth
description: Meanwhile, peel and halve potatoes. Cook in water for about 30 minutes ot until tender. Drain well and press through a potato ricer or mash with a potato masher. Add egg yolk, season well with salt, pepper and truffle oil. Mix until smooth.

title: Farfalle with Vegetables and Avocado Sauce
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente.

title: Cheese Ravioli with Basil Pea Sauce
description: Cook the ravioli according to package directions. Heat the mushy peas in a large skillet, add the drained ravioli and toss to coat. Serve in shallow soup bowls, sprinkle with Parmesan and garnish with the remaining basil leaves.

title: Chinese Egg Noodles with Chicken
description: Heat the peanut oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add the carrot and saute briefly. Pour in 50 ml (approximately 3 tablespoons) of water and simmer, stirring until the water has evaporated. Add the chicken and the garlic and saute, tossing occasionally until the chicken is cooked through,  2-3 minutes.

title: Linguine with Shrimp
description: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet. Add the shrimp and cook for 1 minute per side. Mix in the garlic and tomato, then add the white wine. Add the chicken broth and the basil to the pan. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, then season to taste with salt and pepper.  Drain the linguine, add to the pan, and toss to combine.

title: Mexican Penne and Meatballs
description: In a pan of hot oil, cook the meatballs until well browned for about 10 minutes.

title: Pasta with Prosciutto and Chestnuts
description: Using a small, sharp knife, cut an X into the skin of each chestnut. Place on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for about 20 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool briefly. Peel and chop coarsely.

title: Linguine Aglio E Olio
description: Heat the oil in a large pan. Pass the garlic through a press into the pan, and sauté over medium heat. Add the chilis, drained linguine, lemon juice, and lemon zest. Toss to combine, then season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to plates, top with the arugula, and serve.

title: Broccoli Pasta Gratin
description: Melt the butter in a pan. Stir in the flour and gradually stir in the cream. Stir in the broth. Let the sauce simmer for about 5 minutes until creamy.

title: Scallop and Asparagus Tagliatelle with Zucchini Blossoms
description: Cook the pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.

title: Black Pasta with Salmon and Asparagus
description: Rinse salmon, pat dry with kitchen paper and dice. Peel shallots and finely dice. Rinse asparagus and halve crosswise.

title: Snow Pea Pappardelle with Walnuts
description: Place half of the walnuts in a blender jar with the ginger, garlic and lime juice and puree. Gradually add oil until a thick pesto forms. Stir in half the Parmesan and season with salt and pepper.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Cook the lasagna noodles in boiling salt water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Mussels
description: Cook pasta in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Dandelion Whole Wheat Pasta
description: Meanwhile, rinse the dandelion leaves, spin dry and chop coarsely. Peel garlic and chop finely. Fry garlic in a hot pan with oil along with pine nuts until light golden brown. Deglaze with wine and let simmer a little. Toss in drained pasta with dandelions and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta Al Pomodoro
description: Cook pasta in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Season the sauce with salt, pepper and a pinch of sugar. Distribute drained pasta on plates and cover with sauce. Serve garnished with Parmesan and basil.

title: Pasta with Bell Peppers and Onion Sauce
description: Cook pasta in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Then drain. Melt butter in a pan, add pasta, mix and season with a little salt. Add herbs and mix.

title: Sea Bass with Herbs and Tomato Pasta
description: Chop tomatoes into small cubes. Peel onion and garlic and dice finely. Rinse herbs and pat dry with paper towels. Pluck off leaves. Chop parsley and lovage, cu basil into small pieces.

title: Asian Meatballs and Noodles
description: Cook the noodles according to the package directions, drain then toss with the sesame oil, soy sauce and remaining chile and cilantro in a hot pan.

title: Mushroom Pasta with Tomato and Basil
description: Clean the mushrooms and cut into slices. Rinse and halve the cherry tomatoes. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large frying pan and cook the mushrooms until lightly browned on all sides. Season with salt and pepper. Add the cherry tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes while stirring.

title: Baked Spaghetti Nests with Bacon and Cheese
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Rinse the tomatoes, cut in half, core then dice. Rinse the arugula, shake dry and chop about 1/2. Coarsely chop the mozzarella. Rinse the thyme and pluck the leaves. Drain the spaghetti, add the Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. Use a fork to form into 8 nests and place in a greased baking dish. Whisk the eggs and cream together, season with salt and pepper and then stir in the bacon, tomatoes, arugula, mozzarella and thyme. Spoon 1-2 tablespoons over the nests and bake for about 15 minutes. Divide the remaining arugula between serving plates and arrange the pasta nests over top.

title: Macaroni with White Beans and Zucchini
description: Rinse the lemon, and remove the zest with a peeler. Squeeze the juice. Add the olive oil to a pan and sauté the zucchini and chard, stirring often. Deglaze with the lemon juice and broth. Add the beans, season to taste with salt and pepper, and cook for 4-5 minutes.

title: Gorgonzola and Walnut Sauce
description: 40 mins

title: Pasta Salad with Tomatoes
description: Rinse the tomatoes, quarter, remove the stalks and the seeds and chop into small pieces. Drain and chop the capers and olives. Rinse the scallions and cut into thin rings. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and coarsely chop.

title: Baked Macaroni and Ham with Creamed Spinach
description: Meanwhile, for the creamed spinach: Trim the spinach, rinse and shake dry. Peel the garlic and mince. Melt the butter in a saucepan and sauté the spinach and garlic until the spinach wilts. Add the cream and cook over low heat for about 5 minutes. Purée and season with salt and pepper. Serve with the baked macaroni.

title: Linguine Alla Carbonara
description: Mix the egg yolks and the cream in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper, and whisk until combined. Mix in the chopped basil.

title: Linguine with Tomatoes and Arugula
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Rinse and dry the arugula, then separate the leaves. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Heat the oil in a pan, and sauté the garlic. Add the tomatoes and sauté briefly. Drain the pasta and mix into the tomato mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer the pasta to plates, sprinkle with the arugula, and serve.

title: Vegetarian Potato Casserole
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F). Saute the onions in hot oil until soft. Add the spinach and saute, stirring constantly. Add the potatoes and leeks. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Pour the vegetables into a baking dish. Mix the eggs and milk. Season to taste and pour over the vegetables.

title: Pasta with Spring Vegetables
description: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in the pan, saute garlic briefly and then add wine. Add peas and beans and simmer for about 3-4 minutes until tender. Add tomatoes and lemon zest to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes and season with salt and pepper. Add drained pasta and mix well. Rinse arugula and basil and shake dry. Arrange everything together on plates, sprinkle with a few drops of olive oil and serve garnished with Parmesan.

title: Vegetable Cannelloni
description: Peel onion and garlic and finely dice both. Sauté together in a hot pan with butter until translucent. Sprinkle with flour, sauté and pour in the wine. Add broth and cream and simmer until smooth while stirring. Remove from the heat, add 2-3 tablespoons Parmesan, stir in parsley and season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Mussels, Chervil and Spinach
description: For the pasta: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain.

title: Pappardelle with Pecorino and Spinach
description: Cook the pappardelle in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Sautéed Tofu with Noodles, Hoisin and Sweet Chili Sauce
description: Rinse the chard, separate the leaves from the stalks and cut into strips. Peel and slice the garlic. Rinse the chile, slit lengthwise, remove the seeds and white ribs and chop as desired.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Tomatoes
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Farfalle with Tuna, Cheese and Cilantro-chile Oil
description: Rinse the tuna, pat dry and if necessary, cut into 1.5 cm (approximately 1/2-inch) thick slices and season with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet and saute the tuna until golden brown on each side, 1-2 minutes.

title: Frisee Salad with Ravioli and Bacon
description: Heat the butter in a pan and saute the bacon along with the ravioli until lightly browned, stirring   occasionally. Season with pepper.

title: Egg Noodles with Chicken and Vegetables
description: Cook pasta according to package directions in a pot of boiling salt water until al dente, drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

title: Chickpea Ravioli with Shrimp and Mussels
description: For the filling: Peel and finely chop the shallot and garlic. Fry in hot oil until translucent. Let cool slightly. Rinse the chickpeas in a colander and drain well. Mash finely in a bowl with a fork. Mix the shallot with the garlic and tahini. Season with lemon juice, cumin, salt and pepper.

title: Ribbon Pasta with Meatballs
description: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente according to package directions. Drain well. Heat olive oil in a pan and fry the meatballs over medium temperature until all sides are lightly browned.

title: Spaghetti with Anchovies, Capers and Olives
description: Rinse and halve the cherry tomatoes. Rinse and drain the capers and anchovies. Coarsely chop the olives. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Mix the capers, olives, garlic, and anchovies in a large preheated dish.

title: Spicy Shrimp and Ravioli
description: Rinse shrimp and pat dry with paper towels.

title: Pasta Salad with Kiwi and Tomato
description: Rinse basil, shake dry and strip leaves. Peel kiwis and cut into small pieces. Blanch tomatoes in boiling water. Remove tomatoes and peel, quarter, core and dice finely.

title: Pork Loin Stuffed with Basil
description: Cook pasta according to package instructions in plenty of salted water until al dente, drain well. Rinse basil. Peel garlic. Puree basil, garlic and pine nuts, season with salt and pepper. Fill meat with basil paste and tie with a kitchen twine.

title: Pasta with Tomatoes, Olives and Chicken Breast
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Salmon and a Poached Egg
description: For poaching the egg: Crack each egg into a small bowl or cup. In a small pot, set 1 liter (approximately 1 quart) of water to boil. When nearly boiling, add in the vinegar. Slide each egg carefully into the water. with a table spoon, shape the egg into round shape. Ideally, the yolk should be completely surrounded by the egg white. Poach for about 4 minutes.

title: Mussels, Tomatoes and Pasta
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente and drain.

title: Rice Noodles with Fish Balls
description: Soak rice noodles for about 10 minutes in cold water. Rinse fish fillets, pat dry and chop. In a blender, puree fish together with curry paste and fish sauce. Add flour and form fish mixture into balls. In a pan, heat frying oil to 170°C (approximately 350°F) and fry fish balls in portions until slightly browned.

title: Pork Chops with Pesto and Tagliatelle
description: Rinse the pork chops and pat dry. Trim the fat from the pork chops, and season with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan, and sear the pork chops on both sides. Remove from the pan and top with the pesto. Place on a greased baking sheet, and cook for 20 minutes until golden brown.

title: Green Pasta with Sole
description: Toast the pine nuts in a dry pan until golden brown, remove from heat and set aside.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Dice the pancetta. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Heat the oil in a pan, then sauté the pancetta and garlic for 2 minutes. Whisk the eggs, cream, and parmesan together. Drain the pasta, add to the pan with the pancetta, and mix in the cream mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer the pasta into bowls, and serve immediately.

title: Cannelloni Stuffed with Mushrooms
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).

title: Spaghetti with Tomatoes and Mozzarella
description: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water, then remove. Peel, quarter, remove the core, and dice into small cubes. Drain the mozzarella and cut into cubes of the same size. Rinse and dry the basil and parsley. Remove the leaves from the stems, and set aside some of the basil for garnish. Chop the remaining basil with the parsley. Mix the herbs with oil, and lemon juice. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Mix the tomatoes with the mozzarella in a bow. Drain the pasta, and mix the herb vinaigrette until combined. Serve in bowls garnished with the remaining basil.

title: Penne with Sun-dried Tomatoes and Scallions
description: Rinse and trim the scallions, then thinly slice. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Sweat the garlic and scallions in a pan with the oil. Add the tomato and peppercorns, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.

title: Spaghetti with Garlic and Chili
description: Drain the pasta, and add with the parsley to the pan. Toss everything thoroughly to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper, then divide onto warmed plates. Garnish each plate with one of the chili peppers.

title: Classic Lasagna with Turkey
description: Soak the mushrooms for 15 minutes in lukewarm water. Drain and finely chop. Reserve the soaking liquid.

title: Pasta Shells with Ham and Vegetables
description: Rinse and halve pepper, remove seeds and ribs, and cut into strips. Cut ham into strips. Rinse basil leaves and thinly slice. Peel and finely chop garlic. Heat butter in a pan and sauté garlic and vegetables, 5-6 minutes. Stir in pasta and ham and cook until warmed through. Season with salt, pepper and lemon zest. Divide pasta among plates and garnish with basil.

title: Beef Stew with Vegetables and Whole-wheat Pasta
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water according to package instructions. Drain and serve alongside beef and vegetable stew.

title: Rigatoni with Ham and Scallions
description: Drain the tomatoes, reserving the oil. Blend the tomatoes with the peeld garlic, pine nuts, and olive oil to form a creamy pesto. Mix in the parmesan cheese, and season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Saffron, Mussels and Chorizo
description: Rinse and halve the tomatoes. Peel and finely dice the onion. Rinse and dry the parsely, then finely chop the leaves. Set some of the leaves aside for garnish.

title: Chicken Penne with Tomato and Pepper Sauce
description: Blanch the tomatoes, peel, quarter and cut into small cubes. Drain the olives well and cut in half. Peel the garlic and finely chop.

title: Pasta Salad with Olives, Tomatoes and Basil
description: In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon oil. Add zucchini and cook until translucent. Remove and let cool.

title: Soba Noodles with Carrots and Peanuts
description: Peel the carrots and cut into matchsticks. Rinse the cilantro, dry, and coarsely chop the leaves. Peel and finely grate the ginger. In a dry wok, cook the peanuts until golden brown. Remove and coarsely chop. Coat the wok with oil and cook the ginger with the carrots.
types: ['Pasta', 'High-Carb Diet', 'lactose-free', 'Lactose-free Pasta', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'Asian', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Meal for Four', 'Legume', 'Root Vegetable', 'Herb', 'Main Course']

title: Pasta with Peas, Watercress and Parmesan
description: Rinse the watercress, spin dry and add to the pan with the peas. Drain the pasta, and toss in the pan with the sauce. Serve on warmed plates garnished with Parmesan shavings and pass the peppermill separately.

title: Pasta with Scallops, Baby Carrots and Macadamia Nuts
description: This pasta tastes delicious with chicken instead of scallops.
types: ['Mussel and Clam', 'egg-free', 'meat-free', 'Pescetarian', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Mediterranean', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Meal for Four', 'Guest', 'weekend cooking', 'Root Vegetable', 'Seafood', 'Pasta', 'Spaghetti', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Meatballs Skewers with Ravioli
description: For the filling: Rinse spinach and blanch in boiling salted water. Drain, squeeze out excess water and chop finely. Peel and finely chop shallot and garlic; fry in hot butter. In a bowl, combine shallot and garlic mixture, spinach, goat cheese and Parmesan. Season to taste with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
description: Cook the macaroni according to package directions in boiling salted water, until al dente. Rinse with cold water and drain in a colander.

title: Pasta and Vegetable Salad
description: Rinse, quarter, remove seeds and dice tomatoes. Peel and finely grate carrots. Peel and finely chop garlic. Mix garlic with balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, oil and crumbled feta.

title: Penne with Turkey Meatballs
description: Add the vegetables and sauté briefly, then add the tomato. Season with salt, pepper and oregano, and simmer for 10-15 minutes over medium heat.

title: Spaghetti with Watercress Pesto
description: Toast the pine nuts in a dry pan until golden brown. Remove from the pan and let cool. Rinse and trim the watercress, then dry thoroughly. Peel the garlic, then puree with the watercress, and pine nuts in a blender. Heat the oil, then add to the puree gradually until a thick pesto forms. Mix in the parmesan, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.

title: Ravioli with Sage Butter
description: For filling, peel the shallots, finely chop, fry in butter.  Add the finely diced ham and sauté briefly. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. In a bowl combine the ground meat, breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and egg yolk and mix well. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Saffron and Octopus
description: Rinse the peppers, remove the stems, seeds and pith and cut into small cubes. Sweat in 1 tablespoon hot oil briefly then deglaze with a little stock. Simmer for about 5 minutes until soft. Stir in the crème fraîche and mash until creamy. If necessary, add some more stock. Season with salt and cayenne pepper.

title: Pasta Bake with Ground Beef Sauce
description: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente. Rinse with cold water and drain well.

title: Pasta with Creamy Lobster Sauce
description: In a saucepan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil and brown the shells, turning occasionally. Deglaze with the wine and lobster stock. Simmer about 30 minutes over medium heat.

title: Tortellini with Sage Butter
description: This classic from Italy provides lots of high-quality protein and plenty of biotin. In addition, one portion of the delicious pasta already puts almost a third of the daily calcium requirement on the plate.

title: Smoked Trout Dumplings with Pasta and Peas
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F) convection. Brush a baking sheet with oil.

title: Linguine with Lobster
description: Tear the lobster into bite-sized pieces. Heal the oil in a pan, and sauté the garlic and the chili. Add the lobster meat, sauté briefly, then deglaze with the wine. Mix in the cream and season to taste with salt and pepper. Simmer over medium heat until thickened slightly.

title: Noodle and Tuna Gratin
description: Drain tuna and separate with a fork. Add to tomato sauce and simmer for another 5 minutes.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Rinse the clams under cold water to remove any sand or debris from the shells. Discard any clams that are already open.

title: Farfalle with Bacon and Tomato Sauce
description: Drain the mozzarella and tear into pieces. Rinse and dry the basil. Remove the leaves and coarsely chop. Drain the pasta, and add to the pan with the tomato sauce. Mix in the mozzarella and the basil, and toss until thoroughly combined. Adjust the seasoning if necessary, then divide into preheat deep plates. Garnish with freshly cracked black pepper. Serve with a fresh baguette or ciabatta.

title: Pasta with Butternut Squash
description: Cook noodles in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente.

title: Pasta with Broad Beans and Pesto
description: Bring a generous amount of salted water and 1 tablespoon olive oil to a boil in a large saucepan. Cook the tagliatelle according to package directions until al dente. About 2-3 minutes before the end of cooking add the green beans. Drain the pasta and beans in a colander and rinse briefly with cold water.

title: Warm Pasta and Chicken Salad
description: Rinse the broccoli and drain. Peel garlic and chop finely.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs and Tomato Sauce
description: Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, clean and roughly chop. Fry the remaining onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons hot oil. Add bell peppers, paprika and tomatoes. Add broth and simmer for about 4-5 minutes. Then add the meatballs and simmer, covered, until done, about 5 minutes.

title: Asian Noodles with Beef and Vegetables
description: Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half and remove seeds and white inner ribs, then cut into narrow strips. Peel carrots and cut into fine matchsticks. Peel the onions and roughly chop. Rinse the sprouts in a colander and drain well. Rinse the chile pepper, halve, remove seeds and finely chop. Rinse the meat, pat dry and cut into strips. Peel the ginger and grate finely.

title: Pappardelle with Tomato and Pepper Sauce
description: Peel and trim the peppers. Remove the seeds, quarter, and julienne. Add to the sauce, and continue to simmer. Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Ravioli with Goat Cheese and Spinach
description: Meanwhile, rinse the spinach and blanch in boiling salted water for 1 minute. Drain and chop finely.

title: Filled Pasta Parcels on Peppers
description: For the filling, rinse, the fennel and cut into very small cubes. Peel garlic, finely chop and sauté in a pan with hot oil. Add the fennel, sauté and pour in the wine, season with salt and pepper and simmer over medium heat for 5-8 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.

title: Potato Dumplings with Onions
description: For the filling: Rinse potatoes and boil in salted water for about 30 minutes until done. Then peel and press through a potato masher. Peel shallots, finely dice and sauté in butter until golden. Mix cooked shallots with quark and egg yolks and stir into potatoes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Ravioli with Butter and Fried Sage Leaves
description: For the filling: Peel onion and chop finely. Peel garlic and press through garlic press. Rinse sage leaves, shake dry and chop finely. Mix onion, garlic, hazelnuts, sage, cream cheese, Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs together well, sprinkle with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Roll out dough as thin as possible on a floured surface. Cut out circles with wave edge cutter about 8 cm (approximately 3 inches) round. On each circle, place 1 tablespoon of filling, brush edges with slightly beaten egg white and fold over circles. Press edges well with a fork.

title: Spaghetti with Fried Garlic and Lime
description: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the lime wedges, the garlic bulb and the thyme. Pour the finished cooked pasta into the pan. If desired, pour in a little pasta water. Toss together briefly.
types: ['Spaghetti', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Italian', 'Mediterranean', 'Easy', 'Meal for Four', 'College Cooking', 'Onion', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Main Course']

title: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce and Olives
description: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions in plenty of salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta Salad with Artichokes
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Remove from the water, and drain well. Peel, halve, and julienne the onion. Dice the mozzarella, and chop the tomatoes and olives. Mix the tomatoes olives, mozzarella, onion, parsley, artichokes, pasta, and balsamic vinegar. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Divide into glasses and serve.

title: Asian-Style Pasta Salad
description: Peel and finely grate the ginger. PLace the sprouts in a strainer and blanch for 3-5 minutes in boiling water. Remove and drain. For the vinaigrette, mix the soy sauce with the oil, 1 tablespoon of lime juice, the chili, and the ginger. Add 2 tablespoons of oil to a pan, and sauté the vegetables and walnuts for 2-4 minutes. Mix the pasta, vegetables, and the vinaigrette. Transfer to a serving platter, and garnish with the cilantro leaves.

title: Baked Ravioli with Cheese
description: For the filling, trim the herbs and blanch in salted water. Rinse in cold water, squeeze out excess, and chop finely. Peel the shallot and garlic, and chop finely and sauté in hot butter. Mix with herbs, cream cheese, and Parmesan. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Anchovies and Capers
description: Toast the bread crumbs in the remaining olive oil until golden brown.

title: Perch with Fennel and Tagliatelle
description: Sauté the drained tagliatelle in butter and transfer to plates. Place the fish on top and serve garnished with fennel leaves and lemon wedges.

title: Pasta with Spinach, Feta Cheese and Bacon
description: Peel, halve and slice the shallot. Rinse and chop the chile.

title: Pasta with Bacon and Tomato Sauce
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Rinse basil and pluck off leaves, chop coarsely. Season sauce with salt and pepper and add basil.

title: Pasta with Cream Cheese, Sausage, Olives and Pesto
description: For the sauce, peel garlic and mince. In a bowl, mix garlic with cream cheese, yogurt and parsley until smooth. Season with salt.

title: Pasta with Peas and Bacon
description: Cut the bacon into strips and fry until golden brown in hot oil. Add the peas and the broth. Simmer for 1-2 minutes. Add the drained pasta with the lemon zest. Season with the lemon juice, salt, and white pepper. Arrange on the plates and sprinkle with Parmesan, serve immediately.

title: Tomato Soup with Pasta Spirals
description: Peel shallot and garlic and finely chop. Peel celery, trim and finely dice. Scald tomatoes in hot water, rinse in cold water, peel, quarter and core.
types: ['soup', 'Low-fat', 'Low-fat Appetizer', 'Low-fat Soup', 'lactose-free', 'lactose-free vegetarian', 'Lactose-free Soup', 'meat-free', 'Milk-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Soups', 'Vegetarian Appetizers', 'Easy', 'cooking for kids', 'Classic', 'College Cooking', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Onion', 'Pasta', 'Tomato Soup', 'Vegetable Soup', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Appetizer', 'Main Course']

title: Noodles and Chicken with Sesame Seeds
description: Cook the tagliatelle according to package directions in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Tomato Bacon Sauce
description: Scald the tomatoes and peel. Quarter, core, and dice. Add the onion and garlic. Peel and finely chop. Rinse the chili, cut in half, and finely chop. Cut the bacon into strips and sauté with the garlic, onion, and chilies in hot oil for 2-3 minutes. Deglaze with the white wine. Add the tomatoes and simmer for 5-10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add the chopped herbs.

title: Pasta with Mushroom Sauce
description: Heat the oil and saute the garlic and mushrooms for 3-5 minutes. Deglaze with the cream and simmer over medium heat for 5-7 minutes.

title: Ravioli Minstrone
description: Divide the dough in half and roll out thinly on a floured surface. Spoon out 1 teaspoon of filling, about 3-4 cm (approximately 1 3/4 inch) apart onto one-half of the dough. Cover with the second half of dough and press down between mounds of filling. Cut out square raviolis with a pastry wheel. Press the edges firmly together. Cover completed raviolis and set aside.

title: Green Minestrone with Ravioli
description: In a saucepan, melt the butter and sauté the garlic and onion strips 1-2 minutes until translucent. Add the remaining vegetables and pour in the broth. Season with salt and pepper and simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes.

title: Pasta with Bacon and Egg Sauce (Carbonara)
description: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta following package directions until al dente. Cut bacon into strips and add to a pan with a little oil. Cook bacon over medium heat. Peel garlic and press into pan using a garlic press.

title: Cannelloni Stuffed with Arugula and Crab
description: Rinse arugula, shake dry, trim and chop. Put 1-2 tablespoons of arugula aside for garnish. Mix remaining arugula in a bowl with drained crabmeat, ricotta, lemon zest, creme fraiche and half Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. Stuff cannelloni with crabmeat mixture place in a baking dish. Mix cream with remaining Parmesan, pour over pasta and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes until golden brown. Serve immediately garnished with reserved arugula.

title: Pasta with Ricotta, Eggplant and Tomatoes
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente.

title: Rice Noodles with Chicken and Broccoli
description: Rinse broccoli and bok choy and pat dry. Coarsely chop the bok choy.
types: ['Chicken', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Meal for Four', 'weekend cooking', 'Poultry', 'flowering vegetables', 'Cabbage', 'Pasta', 'Rice', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Tagliatele with Porcini Mushrooms and Radicchio
description: Rinse, trim, and julienne the radicchio. Sauté quicklu in butter, season with salt, and mix in the drained tagliatelle. Transfer to plates, add the sliced mushrooms, and top with the sauce.

title: Lasagna with Cherry Tomatoes
description: For the meat sauce, peel and finely chop the shallots and carrots with a mincing knife. Chop the meat as small as possible with a sharp knife (put through a meat grinder if possible).

title: Noodle Soup with Spicy Italian Sausage
description: In the last 5-6 minutes of cooking time, add pasta to the soup and cook until al dente, according to package directions. Add herbs and tomatoes and season with salt and pepper.

title: Farfalle with Roasted Vegetables and Balsamic
description: Rinse the peppers, cut in half, and remove the seeds. Peel the carrot. Rinse the beans, and snip off the ends. Rinse the zucchini. Cut all of the vegetables into bite-sized pieces. Peel and finely dice the shallot and garlic. Add the vegetables, garlic, and diced onions to a roasting pan. Drizzle with 5 tablespoons of olive oil, then season with salt and pepper. Roast for 25-30 minutes in the oven.

title: Pasta with Zucchini Sauce
description: Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until golden brown. Season with salt and pepper. Drain the spaghetti and divide among four plates. Top with the vegetables and serve.

title: Orecchiette with Vegetables
description: Cook pasta in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain. Mix pasta with reserved broccoli cooking water, pureed broccoli, asparagus, 2 tablespoons oil and chopped tomatoes. Season generously with pepper and add salt if necessary. Serve immediately, with freshly grated Pecorino or Parmesan if desired.

title: Pasta with Tomato and Sausage Sauce
description: Rinse the tomatoes, remove stems and cut into wedges. Peel onion, halve and cut into strips the. Strip the sausage meat from the casings and form into small balls. Fry in a pan in hot oil until golden brown, 2-3 minutes. Remove sausage from pot and sauté the onion until translucent. Mix in tomatoes and pour in the wine. Simmer about 5 minutes, and if necessary add a little pasta water. Add meatballs and the drained pasta to pan, let stand briefly and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pork and Beef Lasagna
description: For the lasagna: Peel and chop the onion and garlic. Peel the carrot and chop. Rinse the celery and chop finely.

title: Pasta with Green Pesto
description: Cook spaghetti in pot with plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain pasta, mix with pesto and transfer to plates. Season with freshly ground pepper.

title: Beef Roulade with Pasta and Red Wine Sauce
description: Peel the carrot, celery and onion and cut into small cubes. Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a large Dutch oven and sear the rolls on all sides. Add the diced vegetables and sauté until just tender. Add the tomato paste and cook briefly. Deglaze with the wine and stock. Bring to a boil then reduce the heat and simmer for about 45 minutes, turning the rolls occasionally. Remove the roulades and keep warm. Strain the sauce then stir in 1 teaspoon butter and season with salt and pepper. Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente, drain then toss with a little butter. Distribute the pasta between serving bowls, top with the roulades and sauce. Serve.

title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F). Rinse the spinach and blanch in boiling salt water. Remove, rinse in cold water and shake dry.

title: Shrimp and Tomato Pasta
description: Heat 3-4 tablespoons oil in a pan and sweat the onion until translucent. Add the tomatoes and cook, covered, for 2-3 minutes. Stir in 2-3 tbsp water. Thoroughly rinse the capers under cold running water, drain and add to the tomatoes along with the olives. Simmer for 1 minute, add the parsley and season with salt and pepper. Add the shrimp, cover and simmer for 2-3 minutes, until just pink. Meanwhile, cook the pasta in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain, toss with the sauce and serve immediately.

title: Spicy Shrimp Spaghetti
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain, reserving the pasta liquid.

title: Pasta with Cabbage and Feta Cheese
description: Cut cabbage into quarters and rinse, remove stalk and cut into wide strips. Coarsely ground caraway seeds and peppercorn in a mortar. Peel shallots and chop finely. Heat oil in a ssaucepan and saute shallots with cumin and pepper for a few minutes. Add cabagge and saute briefly. Add wine and season with salt. Simmer, covered, for about 7 minutes. Add drained pasta and sour cream, season with a little pepper. Sprinkle with chives and crumbled feta (if desired, season  with a little pepper and paprika). Place into bowls and serve.

title: Fish Lasagna with Olives
description: For the tomato sauce, heat 4 tablespoons olive oil in a saucepan and briefly sauté chopped vegetables. Add tomatoes and briefly sauté, then pour in wine. Simmer gently 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Mache Pesto
description: Meanwhile, rinse the mache thoroughly, then spin dry and set aside a few leaves for garnish. Peel the garlic cloves and finely chop. Toast the pine nuts until golden brown in a dry frying pan, allow to cool and chop coarsely. Place the mache, garlic, pine nuts, half the Parmesan and half the olive oil in a blender and puree. Gradually incorporate the remaining olive oil to make a thick pesto. Add salt to taste. (Only process the pesto in the blender as long as necessary. Heat generated makes the pesto bitter.)

title: Broth with Rice Noodles and Cilantro
description: Rinse the leeks and cut into thin rings. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large pot, sauté the leek about 2 minutes, deglaze with the broth and cook for 3 minutes. Add the rice noodles and cook 8-10 more minutes. Season with lime juice and soy sauce. Pour into a small bowl and serve garnished with chopped chile pepper and cilantro leaves.

title: Pasta with Tomatoes and Parmesan
description: Rinse the tomatoes, remove the stalks and cut off the bottom. Blanch in boiling water for about 2 minutes. Remove from the water, peel and rinse in cold water.

title: Pappardelle with Vegetables
description: Cook the pappardelle in boiling salted water until al dente. Peel the garlic, chop finely and sauté in a pan with hot oil until translucent. Add leek and tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, pour in the wine and simmer for 3-4 minutes.

title: Pasta with Ground Beef and Tomatoes
description: Peel and finely chop onion and garlic. Rinse and cut cherry tomatoes into quarters.

title: Tomato Lasagna
description: For the tomatoes, peel and chop the garlic and mix with the tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Pluck the basil leaves. Cut the mozzarella into slices.

title: Spaghetti with Arugula Pesto and Green Beans
description: Meanwhile, rinse the arugula and spin dry. Cut off the hard stems, cut the arugula roughly and puree in a blender with capers, pine nuts and the oil. Stir in the Parmesan and season with salt and pepper.

title: Wild Herb Lasagna
description: Rinse the scallions and cut into pieces. Chop the remaining herbs coarsely. Combine everything with chili, mustard, lemon juice and oil. Season with salt and pepper and mix well.

title: Tagliatelle with Mussels and Leeks
description: In a large pot, sauté the leeks with the garlic in butter. Deglaze with wine, season with salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Add the mussels and fish stock and cook covered for about 8 minutes over high heat, occasionally shaking vigorously. Remove closed shells. Season with creme fraiche and thicken broth with a little cornstarch. Arrange the tagiatelle with the sauce and parsley on plates and serve immediately.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce, Parmesan and Basil
description: Add tomatoes, season with salt, pepper and sugar and simmer, covered, for about 15 minutes over low heat. Season to taste.

title: Pasta Shells with Peas and Pancetta
description: Peel onion and garlic and finely chop. Sauté both with the pancetta in hot oil for 2-3 minutes. Deglaze with some lemon juice add the zest and the chives. Add the drained pasta and peas to the pan, thinning with a little cooking water as needed. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

title: Asian Noodle Stir-fry with Pork and Peanuts
description: For the marinade, mix 3 tablespoons soy sauce and rice wine together. Rinse the meat, pat dry, cut into cubes and add to the marinade. Let stand while you prepare vegetables.
types: ['Pork', '250-400 Calorie', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Guest', 'weekend cooking', 'Meat', 'Vegetable', 'Legume', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Pasta', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Spaghetti with Mushroom-tomato Sauce
description: Trim the mushrooms and cut into slices. Rinse tomatoes, remove seeds and chop. Peel garlic and cut into slices.

title: Pepper and Vegetable Sauce on Penne
