description: Heat oil in a pot. Add bell peppers and tomatoes and sauté for about 8 minutes. Add corn and capers. Heat through and season with salt, pepper, balsamic vinegars and honey. Drain the penne and mix with the vegetables. Shave the parmesan over the pasta and serve immediately.

title: Pasta Salad with Chicken, Mushrooms and Vegetables
description: Place the chicken breast in boiling salted water and cook until done, 5-6 minutes, lift out the meat and shred with a fork or cut into thin slices.

title: Penne with Meatballs
description: Rinse and finely chop the parsley. Soak the toast in water briefly, then squeeze and mix with the parsley, ground meat, eggs, and mustard. Season to taste with salt and pepper, and knead briefly until combined. With wet hands, form small balls, and cook in boiling salted water for 6 minutes. Remove from the water and set aside.

title: Filled Pasta with Sage Butter
description: For the filling, peel the onion and chop finely. Peel garlic and press. Rinse the sage leaves, shake dry and chop finely. Mix the onion, garlic, hazelnuts, sage, cream cheese, Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs together and season with lemon juice, salt and pepper. Roll out the dough as thin as possible on a floured surface. On top of one sheet of the dough, place 1 tablespoon of the filling evenly distributed with a little space between each. Brush some egg white on the dough around each spoonful of filling. Place the second sheet of dough over the filling and press around the filling with your fingers. Cut the ravioli into squares using a zig zag pasta cutter.

title: Spaghetti with Spicy Sicilian Tomato Sauce
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Mix the capers and chopped olives into the sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta thoroughly, then add to the sauce and toss until combined. Garnish with parsley and serve.

title: Fish Ravioli with Mussels and Vegetables
description: For the filling, puree the fish with Noilly Prat and whipping cream in a blender. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into a piping bag with a smooth tip.

title: Pasta with Vegetables and Tuna
description: Rinse and dry zucchini, cut into small cubes. Peel onions, halve and cut into strips. Rinse and halve tomatoes. Rinse tuna and chop. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute onions, garlic and zucchini for 2-3 minutes or until translucent. Deglaze pan with a little white wine and add tomatoes and fish, cook for 1-2 minutes and season with salt, lemon juice and pepper. Add drained pasta and toss well. Arrange on plates and garnish with basil. Serve.

title: Pappardelle with Leeks, Peas and Mint
description: Rinse, trim, and slice the leeks. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Heat the oil and sauté the leeks for 1-2 minutes.

title: Pasta with Red Pesto
description: Cook the rigatoni in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente. Meanwhile, rinse the parsley and finely chop.

title: Pasta with Herb Sauce
description: Mix ricotta with 4-5 tablespoons of cooking water, herbs, 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, pepper and Parmesan. Add more cooking water if needed.

title: Pasta with Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
description: Combine ground meat with remaining onion and garlic mixture, add breadcrumbs and egg and mix well, season with salt and pepper. If mixtuure is too thin, add more breadcrumbs. Shape mixture into small meatballs. Heat 2-3 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan and cook meatballs, few at a time, until golden brown on all sides.

title: Roast Beef with Noodles and Vegetable Sauce
description: Peel the carrot, celery root and parsnip and cut each into fine strips.

title: Pappardelle with Wild Boar
description: Strongly sear the meat in a pan with the oil, then add the prepared vegetables and sauté for 1-2 minutes. Add half of the wine and the broth. Reduce the heat, cover, and simmer gently for 1.5 hours stirring occasionally. Add more wine if necessary.

title: Green Lasagna with Parmesan
description: Heat olive oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Sauté the onion, garlic, and ground meat. Add the carrot and celery and briefly cook. Stir in the tomato paste, add wine and tomatoes with the juice. Crush the tomatoes slightly, season with salt and pepper and simmer for about 15 minutes.

title: Ukranian-style Dumplings with Sauerkraut and Mushrooms
description: For the filling: Peel the onion and chop fine. Drain the sauerkraut well. In a sauté pan over low heat, render the bacon in butter. Add the onion and sauté. Add the sauerkraut and mix well. Add the spices and the white wine and bring to a simmer for about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.

title: Pesto Lasagne with Potatoes
description: For the pesto, rinse the basil, drain and chop coarsely. Peel the garlic and coarsely chop. Place the basil, garlic, Pecorino, Parmesan, pine nuts, and olive oil in a blender and puree to make a creamy sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
types: ['Lasagne', 'Dough', 'Casserole', 'Noodle Casserole', 'baked dish', 'Vegetable', 'Root Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pesto with pine nuts']

title: Farfalle with Zucchini and Parmesan
description: Cook the farfalle in boiling salted water until al dente, then remove. Mix the pasta with 2 tablespoons of butter and 2-3 tablespoons pasta cooking water. Toss to combine, then add the zucchini (minus the sage leaves). Mix thoroughly and season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide into plates and garnish with plenty of grated parmesan cheese.

title: Cannelloni with Asparagus
description: Peel the bottom third of the asparagus and blanch for about 10 minutes in boiling salted water. Rinse in cold water and drain. Cut in half.

title: Spinach Dumplings in Broth
description: For the filling: Cut bread into cubes and soak in a little cold water. Peel and mince small onion. Heat 1/2 tablespoon butter in a pan and cook onion. Rinse and mince parsley.

title: Lemon Pasta with Lobster
description: Cook the linguine in plenty of salted water until al dente. Meanwhile, melt 2-3 tablespoons of butter in a pan over low heat and saute the lemon zest in it briefly, then put the lemon fillets in the cooking butter. Cook briefly, then remove the pan from the heat. Drain the linguine, set some of the pasta water aside and mix immediately with the pan contents. Stir in 2-3 tablespoons of the cooking water and season with pepper vigorously. Distribute the pasta immediately on plates and serve with 2-3 lobster pieces. Sprinkle with basil leaves and serve immediately.

title: Linguine with Pesto and Cherry Tomatoes
description: Peel the garlic. Rinse and dry the basil. Reserve some of the leaves for garnish. Rinse, trim, and dry the arugula. Puree with the basil, garlic, and almonds in a blender. Mix in 6 tablespoons of oil until a slightly creamy consistencry has been reached. Grate the parmesan and mix into the pesto. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Champagne Lemon Sauce
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Chicken, Leeks and Horseradish
description: Rinse leek and cut into rings. Rinse the chicken breasts, pat dry and cut into strips. Cook in 2 tablespoons hot oil until browned on all sides. Add leeks and sauté. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Pour in the cream and simmer for 4 to 5 minutes. If necessary, add a little more broth. Stir in the horseradish, crème fraîche, parsley and drained pasta. Season with salt.

title: Capellini Aglio Olio E Peperoncino
description: Peel and finely dice the pumpkin. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil, add the onions, and sauté briefly. Remove from the pan and set aside.

title: Pan-Fried Redfish Fillets with Tomatoes
description: Rinse fish, pat dry and season with salt and pepper. Coat fish with flour. In a deep mixing bowl, beat eggs with parmesan and finely chopped lovage leaves. Dip redfish in egg mixture and fry in remaining hot oil until golden brown on each side, 2-3 minutes.

title: Lobster Towers with Spinach
description: Cut the lobster meat into thin slices.

title: Green Pesto Pasta Salad
description: Rinse tarragon and shake dry. Peel garlic cloves and chop coarsely. Toast pine nuts in a dry pan until golden brown.

title: Cannelloni with Pumpkin Filling
description: Cook the lasagne sheets in salted water until al dente, rinse, drain and spread out to dry on clean kitchen towels.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce and Meatballs
description: Knead together the ground meat, egg, parsley and breadcrumbs and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Shape mixture into small walnut-sized meatballs. Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a skillet and cook the meatballs and until browned on all sides.

title: Fettuccine with Artichokes and Capers
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Peel and halve the onions, then julienne. Rinse and halve the chili. Remove the seeds and finely dice. Drain the tomatoes, and finely chop. Sauté the tomatoes with the chili and onion in the oil for 1-2 minutes. Deglaze with the wine, and add the capers and thyme. Simmer for 2-3 minutes then add the artichokes and al dente pasta. If the mixture is too dry, add a little of the pasta cooking liquid. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Lasagna with Hard-Boiled Eggs
description: For the bechamel: Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Blend in the flour to create a paste. Gradually whisk in the milk and simmer until thickened, about 1 minute. Stir in the Parmesan and season with the salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Lentil Tomato Sauce and Crumbled Feta
description: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente and drain.

title: Trout and Crayfish Ravioli with Beet Sauce
description: For the filling, finely dice trout fillets and place in freezer to chill, about 15 minutes. Puree diced trout with cream and dill and season with salt and pepper. Cut crayfish meat into cubes and fold into filling mixture.

title: Pasta Salad with Turkey
description: Rinse the turkey, pat dry and cut into strips. Rinse the scallions, trim and cut into rings. Peel the garlic and chop finely. Drain the corn well.

title: Pasta with Nettles and Pine Nuts
description: Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic.

title: Chicken Soup with Glass Noodles, Mushrooms and Vegetables
description: Rinse, trim and slice the leeks. Peel the celery root, carrot, onion and garlic and coarsely chop. Skim the foam from the soup and add the vegetables and the pepper. Simmer about 45 more minutes.

title: Pasta with Chicken and Vegetables
description: Rinse snow peas, trim and cook in a pot of boiling salted water for 3 minutes. Blanch snow peas, drain and allow to cool. Rinse tomatoes and cut in half. Saute snow peas and tomatoes in remaining olive oil in the frying pan.

title: Macaroni with Tomato and Bratwürst
description: Coarsely dice the sausage. Peel and finely chop the garlic. Heat the oil in a pan, and sauté the garlic and the sausage. Add the tomato and simmer for 1-2 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Agnolotti Pasta with Parmesan and Sage
description: For the filling, rinse the spinach and remove the coarse stems. Blanch for 1-2 minutes in salted water. Rinse, drain and chop finely. Peel and chop the onion and garlic. Fry in butter and allow to cool. Mix with the spinach, the Parmesan cheese and the quark. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.

title: Noodle Casserole with Cheese and Tomatoes
description: 50 mins

title: Spaghetti with Shrimp and Tomato Sauce
description: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water. Peel, halve, and remove the seeds. Puree the pulp finely in blender. Heat the oil in a saucepan. Cook the unpeeled shrimp for 4-5 minutes, then remove from the pot. Sauté the remaining shrimp with the garlic and parsley in the remaining oil. Add the tomato puree, white wine, and bay leaves. Season the sauce lightly with salt and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over low heat until reduced slightly.

title: Pappardelle with Basil Pesto
description: Puree the basil, pine nuts, garlic, and half of the oil with an immersion blender. Gradually mix in the salt, cheese, and more (as needed). Season to taste with pepper.

title: Pasta Gratin
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of salt water until very al dente. Rinse in cold water and drain. Scald the beefsteak tomatoes, rinse in cold water, peel, quarter, remove the cores and cut into small pieces. Rinse and cut the scallions into thin rings.

title: Broth with Dumplings
description: Meanwhile, for the filling, soak bread in warm milk. Peel onion, chop finely and saute in butter until translucent. Rinse and trim spinach, blanch in boiling salted water, rinse, drain and chop finely. In a bowl, mix together soaked bread, onion, meat, egg and spinach and season well with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Green Ribbon Pasta with Herbs and Creme Fraiche
description: Drain the tagliatelle, toss with the sauce, then arrange with the parsley and herb sauce on plates.

title: Tagliatelle with Lamb and Vegetables
description: Cook tagliatelle in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente and drain. Rinse lamb loin, pat dry, season with salt and pepper and brown on all sides in the remaining oil for about 5 minutes. Remove from pan and cut diagonally into slices. Arrange tagliatelle on plates with lamb and vegetables and serve sprinkled with parsley.

title: Tomato Soup with Cheese
description: Peel and finely chop the shallots and garlic. Sauté in some olive oil until soft. Add the canned tomatoes, including the juice, and allow to simmer briefly before pouring on the red wine. Pour in a little vegetable broth and simmer over low heat for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and then purée the soup.
types: ['soup', 'meat-free', 'Vegetarian Soups', 'Vegetarian Appetizers', 'Mediterranean', 'Family', 'Meal for Four', 'cooking for kids', 'Quick', 'College Cooking', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Onion', 'Cheese', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Cheese Soup', 'Tomato Soup', 'Vegetable Soup', 'Lunch', 'Dinner']

title: Spaghetti with Vegetables, Goat Cheese and Mint
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Rinse the eggplant, and remove the ends. Slice, sprinkle with salt, and let stand for 10 minutes. Rinse under cold water and drain well. Rinse the zucchini, halve lengthwise, and thinly slice. Score the tomatoes crosswise, and blanch in boiling water. Rinse under cold water, peel, remove the seeds, and cut into wedges. Rinse the chili, remove the seeds, and finely chop. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet, then briefly sauté the onions and garlic. Add the vegetables and chili and sauté for 6 minutes over medium heat, stirring often.

title: Ravioli with Chanterelles and Bacon
description: Cook the ravioli according to package directions in boiling salted water, drain and add to the chanterelles in the pan. Sprinkle with parsley.

title: Pasta Gratin with Tomatoes and Salmon
description: Rinse the tomatoes, trim, quarter, core and dice finely.

title: Turbot and Foie Gras Lasagna
description: Peel the potatoes and cut or slice into very thin slices. Pat dry and cut into 12 triangular-shaped slices. Fill a pan with about 2 inches of oil. Heat the oil over medium-high and fry the potatoes until just crispy. You should not get too much color. Using a slotted spoon, remove the potatoes from the oil and drain on a plate lined with a paper towel. Season with salt.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Rinse the clams and drain thoroughly. Discard any clams that are already open.

title: Spaghetti with Green Beans and Tomatoes
description: Drain the beans and spaghetti in a sieve, pick out the savory, mix with tomato, bacon and arugula and serve sprinkled with Parmesan to taste.

title: Pork Roulade with Spicy Tomato Sauce and Tagliatelle
description: For the tomato sauce: Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Add to the roasting pan and sauté in the hot oil until translucent. Pour in the crushed tomatoes and broth, and simmer on low heat, partially covered, for 30 minutes. Add the roulade to the sauce to finish cooking.

title: Pasta Filled with Spinach and Trout
description: Fold in half diagonally, brush the edges with a small amount of water and press the edges firmly together. Cook the pasta triangles in salted boiling water for about 4 minutes. For the garnish, rinse spinach, remove stems and blanch in salted water. Drain, squeezing out excess water and then chop coarsely. Sauté in hot oil  and add a little pasta water.

title: Vegetable and Bacon Lasagna
description: For the béchamel, melt the butter, stir in the flour and sauté briefly. Deglaze with the broth and season with salt and pepper.

title: Fried Ravioli
description: For the filling, soak the bread in water. Peel the onion, finely dice and cook until translucent in 1 tablespoon butter. Squeeze the bread well, pick apart and mix with the minced meat, sausage meat, cooked onion, parsley and egg. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg and marjoram. Divide the dough in half and roll thinly on a lightly floured surface. Cut with a pastry cutter with serrated edge into squares about 10 x 10 cm (approximately 4 inches). Distribute the filling using two teaspoons onto each dough square. Brush the edges with a little water and fold diagonally. Press well to seal and carefully drop into boiling salted water. Simmer until done over low heat for about 12-15 minutes. Heat the butter in a pan. Drain the ravioli well, add to the pan and swirl to coat with the butter. Cook for a few minutes until lightly browned, sprinkle with chives and dust with icing sugar. Caramelize slightly and serve the ravioli on plates.

title: Pasta with Tomatoes, Red Peppers and Cheese
description: Heat some olive oil in a pan and fry the garlic until golden brown. Remove it from the oil and set aside. The garlic should not be roasted too dark because it may taste bitter.

title: Colorful Pasta with Walnut Pesto
description: Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Bring a second pot of salted water to a boil with lemon juice, sugar and butter. For the pesto, rinse the basil. Add basil along with the remaining pesto ingredients to a blender and season with salt and pepper. Puree at the highest setting. Put the vegetables into the prepared, flavored water and blanch for 2-3 minutes, remove from water and allow to drain briefly. Drain the pasta well, mix gently with the vegetables and the pesto and rotate using a serving fork, arranging each serving into a nest and arranging on warmed plates. Garnish with Parmesan cheese to taste.

title: Pork Stew with Almonds over Pasta
description: Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to package directions for al dente.  Toast the almonds in a dry skillet until golden brown. Add the parsley and almonds to the stew and season with maple syrup, salt and pepper.

title: Lasagne with Arugula and Vegetables
description: Put pasta sheets crosswise in cold water and soak.
types: ['Lasagne', 'Casserole', 'Noodle Casserole', 'Asparagus Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'Vegetarian Casserole', 'baked dish', 'European', 'Italian', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Vegetable', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Pasta', 'asparagus lasagna', 'Spinach Lasagne', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Asparagus Pasta', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Tagliatelle with Duck Breasts and Black Olives
description: Cook tagliatelle according to package directions in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente.
types: ['Duck', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Meal for Four', 'Guest', 'Sunday cooking', 'Poultry', 'Pasta', 'Main Course']

title: Pasta with a Creamy Walnut Sauce
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic and shallot. Using hot butter, fry the walnuts and deglaze with the white wine. Allow to boil down almost completely and then add the broth. Add the cream and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer. Mix in the sour cream, dripping wet noodles and parsley. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

title: Baked Macaroni
description: Blanch the tomatoes, peel, halve, remove the seeds and cut into cubes. Mix with the remaining butter and add to the casserole. Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F) for 25-30 minutes. Cover with aluminum foil if the casserole is browning too quickly.

title: Cannelloni Au Gratin with Tomatoes
description: Peel and crush the garlic. Toast the pine nuts in a dry pan, then chop finely. Mix the chopped pine nuts and spinach with crushed garlic.

title: Pasta with Mushroom Sauce and Parmesan
description: Trim the mushrooms and cut into slices. Peel the garlic and shallot and chop finely.

title: Taglierini Pasta with Zucchini and Ricotta Sauce
description: Rinse the zucchini, cut in half lengthwise and cut into thin strips.

title: Shrimp and Rice Noodle Soup
description: Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop coarsely. Rinse the chilies, cut into rings and optionally remove the seeds for less heat. Add the chiles to the soup along with the shrimp and simmer 5-10 minutes.

title: Baked Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
description: Peel and chop onion and garlic.

title: Pasta with Broccoli, Garlic and Walnuts
description: Rinse broccoli and divide into florets. Blanch broccoli in plenty of salted boiling water, 4-6 minutes. Cook pasta in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Wild Salmon and Sun-dried Tomatoes
description: Drain sun-dried tomatoes, reserving oil, and cut into strips. In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato oil with the olive oil. Add salmon and chile and fry gently, 2-3 minutes. Add scallions and sun-dried tomatoes. Deglaze with broth.

title: Penne and Zucchini Gratin with Ham
description: Trim scallions and cut into thin rings. Trim zucchini and cut crosswise into thin slices. Rinse bell peppers, trim, cut in half, remove seeds, remove all white ribs and cut crosswise into thin strips. Cut ham into cubes approximately 5 mm (approximately 1/4 inch). Heat the oil in a pan and add scallions, bell peppers and zucchini. Fry for 2-3 minutes, then add the diced ham and fry briefly. Add the cooked penne to the pan and season with salt, pepper and paprika. Toss with the parsley. Remove rind from the Camembert and cut into about 5 mm (approximately 1/4 inch) cubes.

title: Ravioli with Ricotta Filling
description: Mix together the ricotta, spices, parmesan, breadcrumbs and egg.

title: Pasta with Walnut and Sun-dried Tomato Pesto
description: Drain pasta, mix with pesto, and season to taste. Serve immediately.

title: Stuffed Pasta in South Tyrolean Style
description: For the filling: Peel and finely chop the shallot. Rinse basil leaves, spin dry and cut into strips. Sauté shallot in 1 tablespoon butter until translucent, add basil, mix with the quark and season with salt and pepper.

title: Pasta with Broad Beans and Bacon
description: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Beet Ravioli with Sage
description: For the filling, peel the beet and finely chop (best with a chopping knife). Peel the garlic and finely grind with a little salt in a mortar. Mix the beet, chile, garlic and sage. Heat the oil in a pan and saute the beets over medium heat for 1-2 minutes. Season with salt and allow to cool.

title: Homemade Orecchiette with Nut Sauce
description: For the nut sauce: Toast the nuts in a dry frying pan until golden and fragrant. Remove and allow to cool. Chop coarsely. Rinse the parsley, shake dry, and crush with the nuts, garlic and salt in a mortar. Blend in the ricotta and oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Rinse the cilantro, shake dry and finely chop. Stir into the nut sauce.

title: Fusilli with Tomato Vinaigrette
description: Mix diced tomatoes and the purée with the olive oil and vinegar. Peel the garlic, press through a garlic press into the tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Fold in the strips of basil.

title: Pasta and Avocado Salad with Walnuts
description: Peel the garlic, very finely chop and mix with oil. Rinse the peppers, halve, remove seeds and ribs, and cut lengthwise into thin strips. Peel and pit avocado and cut into slices, reserve 4 slices for garnish and cube the remaining slices. Mix with the citrus juice.

title: Pasta with Spinach and Goat Cheese
description: Drain the asparagus. Cook the spaghetti and asparagus in boiling water until al dente. Drain, making sure to catch 1 cup of the cooking water. Mix the spaghetti with 3-4 tablespoons of olive oil, the spinach and the asparagus pieces.

title: Baked Pork Medallions with Marsala and Noodles
description: Remove crusts from the bread and finely crumble. Whisk the eggs with 1 tablespoon cold water, season with thyme, salt and pepper and stir in the breadcrumbs. Stir in the tomatoes, pine nuts and Parmesan with a fork. Rinse the pork, pat dry, cut into 12 slices, season with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons of tomato oil.

title: Turkey with Vegetables and Asian Pasta
description: Peel the carrot and cut into sticks. Peel the onion and garlic and cut into cubes.
types: ['Pasta', 'High-fiber Poultry Dish', 'Low-fat Poultry Dish', 'Healthy Eating', 'Milk-free', 'Turkey Ragout', 'skillet dish', 'skillet vegetables', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Meal for Four', 'Poultry', 'Turkey', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Spinach Ravioli with Fried Onions
description: Peel the onion and garlic, and chop finely.

title: Meat-Filled Tortellini with Tomato Sauce
description: For the filling: Peel and finely chop the garlic. Place in a bowl with the ground beef, mustard, egg, basil and paprika,  season with salt and pepper and mix well.

title: Stir Fry with Pork with Bamboo Shoots, Sugar Peas and Asian Noodles
description: Rinse and dry sugar snap peas, trim ends and halve diagonally.
types: ['Pork', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Asian', 'Easy', 'Meal for Four', 'Guest', 'weekend cooking', 'Meat', 'Legume', 'Sprout', 'Root Vegetable', 'Spices', 'Pasta', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Cannelloni with Zucchini Filling
description: Add in the ricotta, parsley and half of the Parmesan and mix well. Stuff the zucchini-cheese mixture into the cannelloni pasta.

title: Ravioli with Spinach and Parmesan
description: Trim the mushrooms, chop and sauté in 1 tablespoon hot butter in a pan for 2-3 minutes, until the liquid has evaporated. Remove from the heat, stir in the parsley and half the Parmesan and allow to cool. Then mix with the ricotta and season with nutmeg, pepper and salt.

title: Colorful Pasta Salad
description: Cook the rigatoni in boiling salt water until al dente. Drain, rinse in cold water and place in a bowl. Mix in 2 tablespoons of olive oil, olives, tomatoes and onions. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Tortellini with Rustic Bread, Cheese and Spinach
description: Cut bacon into 2 cm (approximately 3/4 inch) cubes and fry in a skillet.
types: ['Pasta', 'Bread', 'skillet dish', 'skillet noodle dish', 'Quick', 'Easy', 'Meal for Four', 'Home Cooking', 'College Cooking', 'Meat', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Cheese', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Lunch', 'Main Course']

title: Filled Pasta with Black Truffles
description: Trim the mushrooms, chop and sauté in 1 tablespoon hot butter in a pan for 2-3 minutes, until the liquid has evaporated. Remove from the heat and mix in the ricotta and Parmesan. Season with nutmeg, pepper and salt.

title: Ravioli with Creamy Herb Sauce and Pine Nuts
description: For the filling: Rinse arugula, trim, sort, spin dry, remove hard stems as needed and finely chop the leaves. Peel onion and finely chop. Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onion until translucent, add arugula and, stirring constantly, cook over medium heat until the liquid evaporates and then leave to cool until lukewarm. Mix in ricotta and pecorino and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Noodle Soup with Vegetables and Bacon
description: Cut bacon into small cubes.

title: Pasta, Bacon and Parmesan Frittata
description: Rinse, trim and finely chop the zucchini.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetable Sauce
description: Cook spaghetti in a pot of boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente. Then drain and let rest.

title: Chicken with Vegetables, Pasta and Sweet Chili Sauce
description: Rinse chicken breasts, pat dry and cut into bite-sized pieces. Season with salt and pepper. In a wok, stir-fry chicken in 1 tablespoon sesame oil. Remove chicken and keep warm. Rinse scallions, trim and shake dry. Cut scallions on the diagonal. Rinse and halve bell peppers, remove seeds and ribs and thinly slice. Peel garlic and press through a garlic press. Rinse and halve chile pepper lengthwise, remove seeds and ribs and cut into thin strips. Add remaining oil to wok. Stir-fry scallions and garlic. Add bell peppers and chile pepper and stir-fry. Deglaze with broth. Add soy sauce and chili sauce and season with salt and pepper. Cover wok and simmer about 6 minutes. Return chicken to wok along with pasta. Heat a few minutes. Serve sprinkled with cilantro leaves.

title: Lasagna
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, then drain, rinse and drain again. Place in one layer on a damp kitchen towel.

title: Sausage Ravioli with Sautéed Onions
description: For the filling: Soak the bread in lukewarm water. Peel 1 onion, finely chop and sweat in 1 tablespoon butter until translucent. Trim the spinach, rinse, blanch in boiling salted water, drain, rinse until cold water until cool, drain, squeeze out excess water and chop finely.

title: Spaghetti with Tuna and Tomato Sugo
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. For the sauce: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, sauté garlic until fragrant, add the diced tomatoes, capers and wine, season with salt and pepper and simmer for 4-5 minutes.

title: Lasagna with Herb Cream Cheese and Walnuts
description: Peel the onion and garlic and chop finely. Heat the olive oil in a frying pan and gently sweat the onion and garlic until translucent. Transfer to a mixing bowl and mix with the cream cheese, lemon juice, herbs and nuts. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Spaghetti with Clams
description: Meanwhile, cook pasta in a pot of plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, drain, rinse with cold water and drain again. Boil clams in fish stock, add parsley and simmer all for 3-4 minutes. Season with salt. Add pasta to clams and let stand briefly. To serve, arrange pasta into a nest on serving plates and place shells decoratively next to pasta.

title: Linguine with Pesto
description: Cook linguine according to package instructions.
types: ['Pesto', 'Dough', 'European', 'Italian', 'Quick', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Green Sauce', 'Basil pesto', 'Green pesto', 'Pesto with pine nuts', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Spaghetti with Pesto Sauce
description: Rinse basil and shake dry. Pluck off the leaves and keep some for garnish.
types: ['Pesto', 'Dough', 'European', 'Italian', 'Quick', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Classic', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Basil pesto', 'Green pesto', 'Pesto with pine nuts', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Classic Mixed Meat Lasagna
description: Trim and peel the carrot. Trim and rinse the celery stalks. Cut the carrot and celery in small dice.

title: Spaghetti with Almond Pesto
description: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Peel the garlic. Rinse and dry the herbs, then finely chop the leaves. Add the parmesan and herbs to the almond paste. Pass the garlic through a press, then add to the almond mixture with the oil. Stir in up to 1/2 cup of pasta cooking water until your desired consistency is reached. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
types: ['Pesto', 'food-combining', 'Food-Combining Lunch', 'Food-Combining Dinner', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Dinner', 'Vegetarian Entree', 'Italian', '25-Minute', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Spaghetti', 'Green pesto', 'Pesto with almonds', 'Parsley pesto', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Ravioli Stuffed with Pumpkin
description: For the filling, boil salted water. Cut the pumpkin flesh into cubes and cook about 15 minutes, until very soft. Drain and place in a dry pot. Cook over low heat for another 5 minutes, until the pieces are nice and dry. Set aside to cool. Peel the onion and chop coarsely. Chop Parmesan coarsely and mix with onion and almonds. Puree the pumpkin. Mix the mustard and egg, stir in the onion mixture and season to taste with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Macaroni Gratin with Ham and Cheese
description: Cook macaroni in salted water until al dente, then rinse and drain. Cube ham. Peel garlic and finely chop. Stir together garlic, cream, creme fraiche, eggs, Parmesan and parsley until smooth. Season generously with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

title: Pasta with Mushroom Sauce
description: Heat oil in a large frying pan and fry chanterelles until no more liquid forms and season with salt and pepper. Add mushrooms add soaking liquid to the pan, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 5 minutes. Add lemon zest and parsley and season to taste. Mix pasta with mushrooms and arrange on plates. Serve with plenty of Parmesan.

title: Cannelloni with Shrimp and Ricotta Filling
description: Add remaining butter in small pieces over cannelloni and sprinkle with remaining Parmeson. Pour wine over top and bake for about 25 minutes in the oven until golden brown. For the sauce, scald tomatoes in hot water, drain, rinse with cold water, peel, quarter, core and dice finely. Peel garlic and chop finely.

title: Turkey and Vegetables with Farfalle
description: Remove turkey from pan and keep warm. Add butter to pan, sauté onion and garlic, deglaze with white wine, then stir in cream, balsamic and broccoli florets. Let sauce boil down and possibly thicken.

title: Spaghetti with Pesto Verde
description: Toast pine nuts in a dry skillet and let cool. Rinse basil, shake dry, pluck off leaves, put some aside for garnish and chop remaining. Peel garlic and chop. Mix garlic in a bowl with basil, pine nuts, pecorino and some oil and salt and puree with an immersion blender. Add olive oil in a thin stream to puree until a thick pesto forms and season with salt.
types: ['Pesto', 'Dough', 'European', 'Italian', 'Quick', 'Herb', 'Pasta', 'Sauce', 'Green Sauce', 'Classic Sauce', 'Basil pesto', 'Green pesto', 'Pesto with pine nuts', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Mozzarella-Stuffed Meatballs and Pasta
description: Shape the meat mixture into 8 equal size patties, pressing them very flat. Top 4 of the patties with mozzarella, top with the remaining 4 patties and shape into meatballs. Heat the remaining oil in a skillet over medium heat and saute the meatballs until golden brown. Reduce the heat and saute the meatballs, turning them occasionally until cooked through, about 10 minutes. Rinse the tomatoes and add to the pan.

title: Duck Breast with Oranges, Spinach and Noodles
description: Rinse the duck breasts, pat dry and score the skin with a knife into diamond shapes. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, and brown about 5 minutes in a hot pan on the skin side. Turn over, cook briefly and place on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle with the parsley and cook 30-35 minutes in preheated oven until pink.
types: ['Duck', 'Dough', 'Home Cooking', 'Poultry', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach', 'Tropical Fruit']

title: Tagliatelle Pasta with Artichokes and Olives
description: Toast the almonds in a dry frying pan until fragrant, remove and set aside. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan and sauté the garlic. Add the artichokes and olives and season with salt, pepper and lemon juice.

title: Pasta with Peas and Italian Sausage
description: Remove the sausage from the casing, knead with the herbs, shape into small balls and fry on all sides in a hot pan with the oil. Add the peas, creme fraiche and heavy cream. Season with salt and pepper and simmer for 2-3 minutes.

title: Pasta Salad with Shrimp
description: Soak the pasta for about 30 minutes in cold water. Peel the garlic and ginger, press through a press, mix with 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, soy sauce and oil.

title: Pasta with Haddock, Capers and Tomatoes
description: Rinse the fish, pat dry and season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with lemon juice. Cook in a hot pan with 2 tablespoons of oil until golden brown on both sides. Lower the heat and leave the fish to finish. Then pull apart the fish with a fork.

title: Pasta with Mushroom Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water according to package directions until al dente.

title: Zucchini Lasagna
description: Pat zucchini dry and cook in 1-2 tablespoons hot margarine, making sure to pan-fry both sides. Remove from the pan.

title: Pasta with Peppers, Tomatoes and Salsa Verde
description: For the pasta, cook the penne pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Red Peppers and Chorizo
description: Peel the garlic and shallot and chop finely. Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and white pith and cut into narrow strips.

title: Swiss Chard and Ricotta Lasagna
description: For the pasta: Blanch the lasagna sheets in boiling salted water for about 3 minutes, remove, rinse, drain and pat dry with a paper towel.

title: Pasta and Spinach Gratin
description: Rinse and trim the spinach. Blanche quickly in boiling salted water. Drain, rinse with cold water, squeeze well and coarsely chop.
types: ['leafy green vegetable', 'Casserole', 'Noodle Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'Vegetarian Casserole', 'baked dish', 'Home Cooking', 'Vegetable', 'Pasta', 'Pasta with spinach']

title: Pasta with Italian Broccoli
description: Remove sausage casing and shape small balls out of sausage meat. Rinse and dry broccoletto. Cut stems into very small cubes and finely chop leaves. Peel garlic and shallot and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and cook meatballs until golden brown on all sides. Remove from pan and set aside. Saute shallot and garlic in the same pan, add broccoletto and saute briefly. Deglaze pan with wine, season with salt and pepper and simmer for 3-4 minutes on medium heat or until almost all liquid is  evaporated. Return meatballs to the pan and add drained pasta. Sprinkle with Parmesan. Season to taste and transfer to warmed plates. Serve.

title: Tagliatelle with Creamy Sauce and Arugula
description: Cut ham into 2 cm (approximately 3/4 inch) wide strips and then into 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) long pieces. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan and saute garlic for a few seconds. Add ham and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add cream and season with salt and pepper, simmer for  5-7 minutes, stirring.
